talks.synopsis: While the power of the priesthood is unlimited, our individual power in the priesthood is limited by our degree of righteousness or purity.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: “Them That Honour Me I Will Honour”
talks.synopsis: Honor four sacred principles in your lives: reverence for Deity; respecting and honoring family relationships; reverence for and obedience to the ordinances and covenants of the holy priesthood; respect for yourself as a son of God.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: To the Rescue
talks.synopsis: Brethren, the world is in need of your help. There are feet to steady, hands to grasp, minds to encourage, hearts to inspire, and souls to save.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: The Perpetual Education Fund
talks.synopsis: Where there is widespread poverty among our people, we must do all we can to help them to lift themselves, to establish their lives upon a foundation of self-reliance that can come of training. Education is the key to opportunity.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: Born Again
talks.synopsis: The full benefit of forgiveness of sin through the Savior’s Atonement begins with repentance and baptism and then expands upon receiving the Holy Ghost.

talks.author: Neal A. Maxwell
talks.title: “Plow in Hope”
talks.synopsis: By utilizing the Atonement, we access the gifts of the Holy Ghost, which “filleth with hope and perfect love” (Moro. 8:26).

talks.author: Keith B. McMullin
talks.title: An Invitation with Promise
talks.synopsis: Just being a member of this Church is not enough. Nor is merely going through the motions of membership sufficient.

talks.author: Carol B. Thomas
talks.title: Sacrifice: An Eternal Investment
talks.synopsis: Sacrifice is an amazing principle. … It can develop within us a profound love for each other and our Savior, Jesus Christ.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: “His Word Ye Shall Receive”
talks.synopsis: It is no small thing, my brothers and sisters, to have a prophet of God in our midst. Great and wonderful are the blessings that come into our lives as we listen to the word of the Lord given to us through him.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: The Miracle of Faith
talks.synopsis: Faith is the basis of testimony. Faith underlies loyalty to the Church. Faith represents sacrifice, gladly given in moving forward the work of the Lord.

talks.author: David B. Haight
talks.title: Gratitude and Service
talks.synopsis: May you have a burning feeling in your heart. May you feel as I do on this day that this work is true and that it is meant for us to help bring about the eternal plan of salvation and exaltation.

talks.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
talks.title: The Law of the Fast
talks.synopsis: Fasting, coupled with mighty prayer, is powerful. It can fill our minds with the revelations of the Spirit. It can strengthen us against times of temptation.

talks.author: John K. Carmack
talks.title: United in Love and Testimony
talks.synopsis: Church members are unified in Christ through love and testimony. This dispensation’s pathway to our Savior is through Joseph and the Book of Mormon.

talks.author: L. Lionel Kendrick
talks.title: Enhancing Our Temple Experience
talks.synopsis: There is a difference in just attending the temple and having a rich spiritual experience.

talks.author: Bruce D. Porter
talks.title: Building the Kingdom
talks.synopsis: From its earliest days, the Lord’s Church has been built up by ordinary people who magnified their callings in humility and devotion.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Focus and Priorities
talks.synopsis: Available information wisely used is far more valuable than multiplied information allowed to lie fallow.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Good-bye for Another Season
talks.synopsis: These conferences are held … to strengthen our testimonies of this work, to fortify us against temptation and sin, to lift our sights, to receive instruction.

talks.author: Sharon G. Larsen
talks.title: Your Celestial Guide
talks.synopsis: When you pray often and seek to know the Lord’s will like Nephi did, the Lord will show you the way.

talks.author: Carol B. Thomas
talks.title: Developing Our Talent for Spirituality
talks.synopsis: Spirituality is learning how to listen to the Spirit and then letting it govern our lives.

talks.author: Margaret D. Nadauld
talks.title: A Comforter, a Guide, a Testifier
talks.synopsis: By the gift and power of the Holy Ghost, you can be guided in your trip through life.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: How Can I Become the Woman of Whom I Dream?
talks.synopsis: You are daughters of the Almighty. Limitless is your potential. Magnificent is your future, if you will take control of it.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Living in the Fulness of Times
talks.synopsis: Notwithstanding the afflictions about us, notwithstanding the sordid things we see almost everywhere, notwithstanding the conflict that sweeps across the world, we can be better.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Sharing the Gospel
talks.synopsis: The most effective missionaries, member and full-time, always act out of love. … If we lack this love for others, we should pray for it.

talks.author: Charles A. Didier
talks.title: Building a Bridge of Faith
talks.synopsis: Our mortal life is the time for men to meet God by building a bridge of faith, opening the door into immortality and eternal life.

talks.author: Sheri L. Dew
talks.title: It Is Not Good for Man or Woman to Be Alone
talks.synopsis: No marriage or family, no ward or stake is likely to reach its full potential until husbands and wives, mothers and fathers, men and women work together in unity of purpose.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Prayer
talks.synopsis: With … faith, we will be able to pray for what we want and appreciate whatever we get. Only with that faith will we pray with the diligence God requires.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: The Atonement: Our Greatest Hope
talks.synopsis: Our salvation depends on believing in and accepting the Atonement. Such acceptance requires a continual effort to understand it more fully.

talks.author: David B. Haight
talks.title: Faith of Our Prophets
talks.synopsis: What we need is the faith of Brigham Young and the faith of Gordon B. Hinckley and the faith of people who are our prophets and leaders.

talks.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
talks.title: One Step after Another
talks.synopsis: We don’t have to be perfect today. We don’t have to be better than someone else. All we have to do is to be the very best we can.

talks.author: L. Whitney Clayton
talks.title: “Help Thou Mine Unbelief”
talks.synopsis: We promote the process of strengthening our faith when we do what is right—increased faith always follows.

talks.author: Christoffel Golden
talks.title: Our Father’s Plan
talks.synopsis: [Our Heavenly] Father’s desire is to provide all of us with the opportunity to receive a fulness of joy, even the fulness that He possesses.

talks.author: Walter F. González
talks.title: Writing Gospel Principles in Our Hearts
talks.synopsis: Knowledge alone is not enough. We must take time to apply the principles in our lives.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: “Like a Watered Garden”
talks.synopsis: We should pay [tithes and offerings] as a personal expression of love to a generous and merciful Father in Heaven.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: Doctrine of Inclusion
talks.synopsis: If we are truly disciples of the Lord Jesus Christ, we will reach out with love and understanding to all of our neighbors at all times.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: Fulfilling Our Duty to God
talks.synopsis: I promise you that your achievement of the Duty to God Award will provide you with a living testimony that will sustain you throughout your life.

talks.author: Cecil O. Samuelson Jr.
talks.title: Our Duty to God
talks.synopsis: Holding the priesthood and doing your duty to God is not only a very serious responsibility but also a remarkable privilege.

talks.author: Steven E. Snow
talks.title: Gratitude
talks.synopsis: Gratitude may be increased by constantly reflecting on our blessings and giving thanks for them in our daily prayers.

talks.author: Keith K. Hilbig
talks.title: Create or Continue Priesthood Links
talks.synopsis: When we serve righteously … , we are strengthening our priesthood link and connecting it ever more securely to those who have preceded and who will follow us.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: “Some Great Thing”
talks.synopsis: May we all be faithful in doing the day-to-day, ordinary things that prove our worthiness, for they will lead us to and qualify us for great things.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Duty Calls
talks.synopsis: All of us have a solemn duty to honor the priesthood and labor to bring many precious souls unto the Lord.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Reaching Down to Lift Another
talks.synopsis: Let us open our hearts, let us reach down and lift up, let us open our purses, let us show a greater love for our fellowmen.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Now Is the Time
talks.synopsis: May we live so that when that final summons is heard, we may have no serious regrets, no unfinished business.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: The Book of Mormon: Another Testament of Jesus Christ
talks.synopsis: The Book of Mormon: Another Testament of Jesus Christ has the nourishing power to heal starving spirits of the world.

talks.author: H. David Burton
talks.title: Standing Tall
talks.synopsis: Jesus Christ is our perfect example of one who always stood tall. He is the one who personifies integrity, strength, and courage.

talks.author: Sharon G. Larsen
talks.title: “Fear Not: For They That Be with Us Are More”
talks.synopsis: We are not alone in this sacred trust of parenting, loving, and leading. There is no greater joy. It is worth every sacrifice.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: “Set in Order Thy House”
talks.synopsis: Our family is the focus of our greatest work and joy in this life; so will it be throughout all eternity.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: The Times in Which We Live
talks.synopsis: Our safety lies in repentance. Our strength comes of obedience to the commandments of God.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: The Returned Missionary
talks.synopsis: What we need is a royal army of returned missionaries reenlisted into service.

talks.author: Neal A. Maxwell
talks.title: The Seventh Commandment: A Shield
talks.synopsis: The keeping of the seventh commandment is such a vital shield! By lowering or losing that shield, the much-needed blessings of heaven are lost.

talks.author: Robert F. Orton
talks.title: “The First and Great Commandment”
talks.synopsis: Given the purpose of our existence, if we do not love God and neighbor, whatever else we do will be of little eternal consequence.

talks.author: Wayne S. Peterson
talks.title: Our Actions Determine Our Character
talks.synopsis: In most encounters we can determine the kind of experience we are going to have by how we respond.

talks.author: H. Ross Workman
talks.title: Beware of Murmuring
talks.synopsis: Obedience is essential to realize the blessings of the Lord.

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: The Power of a Strong Testimony
talks.synopsis: Your personal security and happiness depend upon the strength of your testimony, for it will guide your actions in times of trial or uncertainty.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: “Till We Meet Again”
talks.synopsis: Our safety lies in the virtue of our lives. Our strength lies in our righteousness. God has made it clear that if we will not forsake Him, He will not forsake us.

talks.author: Mary Ellen W. Smoot
talks.title: Steadfast and Immovable
talks.synopsis: We cannot abandon our faith when challenges comes our way. We will not turn away; we will not retreat; we will not become discouraged.

talks.author: Virginia U. Jensen
talks.title: Stand Firm
talks.synopsis: Let us never forget that we are building a foundation for and with our family upon the rock of our Redeemer.

talks.author: Sheri L. Dew
talks.title: Are We Not All Mothers?
talks.synopsis: Motherhood is more than bearing children. … It is the essence of who we are as women.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: “Be Thou an Example”
talks.synopsis: Fill your mind with truth; fill your heart with love; fill your life with service.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: The Church Goes Forward
talks.synopsis: No other church to come out of the soil of America has grown so fast nor spread so widely. … It is a phenomenon without precedent.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: Children
talks.synopsis: There is in what we believe, there is in what we teach, counsel, commandments, even warnings that we are to protect, to love, to care for, and to “teach [children] to walk in the ways of truth.”

talks.author: Earl C. Tingey
talks.title: The Law of Tithing
talks.synopsis: The Lord has established the law of tithing as the law of revenue of His Church. … It is also a law by which we show our loyalty to the Lord.

talks.author: Mary Ellen W. Smoot
talks.title: Developing Inner Strength
talks.synopsis: How do you and I become so converted to the truth, so full of faith, so dependent on God that we are able to meet trials and even be strengthened by them?

talks.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
talks.title: “Follow Me”
talks.synopsis: Those who, in faith, leave their nets and follow the Savior will experience happiness beyond their ability to comprehend.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Hidden Wedges
talks.synopsis: Let’s not pass to future generations the grievances, the anger of our time. Let’s remove any hidden wedges that can do nothing but destroy.

talks.author: Wesley L. Jones
talks.title: Church Auditing Department Report
talks.synopsis: To the First Presidency of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: Full Conversion Brings Happiness
talks.synopsis: Your happiness now and forever is conditioned on your degree of conversion and the transformation that it brings to your life.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: True Friends
talks.synopsis: All of us will be tested. And all of us need true friends to love us, to listen to us, to show us the way, and to testify of truth to us.

talks.author: R. Conrad Schultz
talks.title: Faith Obedience
talks.synopsis: “Faith obedience” is a matter of trust. The question is simple: Do we trust our Heavenly Father? Do we trust our prophets?

talks.author: Robert R. Steuer
talks.title: Being Teachable
talks.synopsis: By being teachable, we activate the full force and blessings of the Atonement in our lives.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: The Gospel in Our Lives
talks.synopsis: He has given us His Atonement, His gospel, and His Church, a sacred combination that gives us the assurance of immortality and the opportunity for eternal life.

talks.author: Neal A. Maxwell
talks.title: Consecrate Thy Performance
talks.synopsis: In pondering and pursuing consecration, understandably we tremble inwardly at what may be required. Yet the Lord has said consolingly, “My grace is sufficient for you” (D&C 17:8).

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: Becoming Men in Whom the Spirit of God Is
talks.synopsis: The Lord is bound by solemn covenant to bless our lives according to our faithfulness. Only He can turn us into men in whom the Spirit of God, namely the Holy Ghost, is.

talks.author: Ben B. Banks
talks.title: This Road We Call Life
talks.synopsis: As you stay on the right path, the reward at the end of life’s journey is well worth the moments of adversity you experience along the way.

talks.author: Spencer J. Condie
talks.title: Becoming a Great Benefit to Our Fellow Beings
talks.synopsis: I pray that you wonderful young men will not only be worthy to receive ministering angels, but that you … will become a ministering angel in the lives of others.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: It Can’t Happen to Me
talks.synopsis: Your future may not hold fame or fortune, but it can be something far more lasting and fulfilling. Remember that what we do in life echoes in eternity.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: They Pray and They Go
talks.synopsis: Let us, as a mighty body of priesthood, be doers of the word, and not hearers only. Let us pray, then let us go and do.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Personal Worthiness to Exercise the Priesthood
talks.synopsis: Our behavior in public must be above reproach. Our behavior in private is even more important. It must clear the standard set by the Lord.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: The Lifeline of Prayer
talks.synopsis: Each of us has problems that we cannot solve and weaknesses that we cannot conquer without reaching out through prayer to a higher source of strength.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: The Other Prodigal
talks.synopsis: No one of us is less treasured or cherished of God than another. I testify that He loves each of us—insecurities, anxieties, self-image, and all.

talks.author: Richard C. Edgley
talks.title: For Thy Good
talks.synopsis: Out of our adversity we might seek our greatest triumphs, and the day may well come that from our challenges we will understand the familiar words “for thy good.”

talks.author: Gayle M. Clegg
talks.title: The Language of Love
talks.synopsis: Every child needs regular reports affirming, “You are known. You are valued. You have potential. You are good.”

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: Out of Darkness into His Marvelous Light
talks.synopsis: The emblems of the Savior’s Atonement remind us that we need not stumble in darkness. We can have His light with us always.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: We Walk by Faith
talks.synopsis: We reach toward the unknown, but faith lights the way. If we will cultivate that faith, we shall never walk in darkness.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: How Firm Our Foundation
talks.synopsis: The foundation of one’s individual faith, if anchored firmly to eternal truth, allows each of us to reach upward with an eternal perspective.

talks.author: John M. Madsen
talks.title: Eternal Life through Jesus Christ
talks.synopsis: To know the Lord Jesus Christ, we and all mankind must receive Him. And to receive Him, we must receive His servants.

talks.author: Carlos H. Amado
talks.title: Some Basic Teachings from the History of Joseph Smith
talks.synopsis: Conversion is a personal and spiritual process. Every individual must examine these principles for himself.

talks.author: Gene R. Cook
talks.title: Charity: Perfect and Everlasting Love
talks.synopsis: As we increasingly think and act like Him, the attributes of the natural man will slip away to be replaced by the heart and the mind of Christ.

talks.author: Bonnie D. Parkin
talks.title: Feel the Love of the Lord
talks.synopsis: If I could have one thing happen for every woman in this Church, it would be that they would feel the love of the Lord in their lives.

talks.author: Gerald N. Lund
talks.title: The Opportunity to Serve
talks.synopsis: I know how deeply He loves us and how perfectly compelling His love is for us.

talks.author: William R. Walker
talks.title: I’ll Go Where You Want Me to Go
talks.synopsis: I love Him. I want to do all that I can to serve as He would have me serve.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: The Peaceable Things of the Kingdom
talks.synopsis: Peace—real peace, whole-souled to the very core of your being—comes only in and through faith in the Lord Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: We Look to Christ
talks.synopsis: Like the polar star in the heavens, … there stands the Redeemer of the world, the Son of God, certain and sure as the anchor of our immortal lives.

talks.author: Sharon G. Larsen
talks.title: Standing in Holy Places
talks.synopsis: Standing in holy places is all about being in good company, whether you are alone or with others.

talks.author: Carol B. Thomas
talks.title: Strengthen Home and Family
talks.synopsis: Three principles that will help you strengthen your home and family are nurturing, sacrifice, and prayer.

talks.author: Margaret D. Nadauld
talks.title: Hold High the Torch
talks.synopsis: Develop the divinity that is within you. Don’t dull the brightness of the spirit you came with from heaven. The Lord needs your goodness and your influence in this world.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Pathways to Perfection
talks.synopsis: Exemplify in your lives four tested, specific virtues: an attitude of gratitude, a longing for learning, a devotion to discipline, and a willingness to work.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: “O That I Were an Angel, and Could Have the Wish of Mine Heart”
talks.synopsis: I urge you … to utilize the temples of the Church. Go there and carry forward the great and marvelous work which the God of heaven has outlined for us.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: Called of God
talks.synopsis: We have been given the great power of the priesthood. It blesses us individually and provides blessings for our family.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: The Global Church Blessed by the Voice of the Prophets
talks.synopsis: Let us listen to the prophets of our days as they help us to focus on the things that are central to the Creator’s plan.

talks.author: Coleen K. Menlove
talks.title: A Voice of Gladness for Our Children
talks.synopsis: This is our charge, this is our opportunity, to diligently teach and testify to our children of the truthfulness of the gospel of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Neal A. Maxwell
talks.title: Encircled in the Arms of His Love
talks.synopsis: Perplexing things will still happen, but, like Nephi, we can still know that God loves us, a … fact which can and will sustain us through so much!

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: What’s in It for Me?
talks.synopsis: Taking up one’s cross and following the Savior means overcoming selfishness; it is a commitment to serve others.

talks.author: David B. Haight
talks.title: Were There Not Ten Cleansed?
talks.synopsis: If we’re ever going to show gratitude properly to our Heavenly Father, we should do it with all of our heart, might, mind, and strength.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: Tithing: A Test of Faith with Eternal Blessings
talks.synopsis: Pay your tithing. Unlock the windows of heaven. You will be abundantly blessed for your obedience and faithfulness to the Lord’s laws and commandments.

talks.author: Lance B. Wickman
talks.title: But If Not
talks.synopsis: Mortality’s supreme test is to face the “why” and then let it go, trusting humbly in the Lord’s promise that “all things must come to pass in their time.”

talks.author: Robert K. Dellenbach
talks.title: Sacrifice Brings Forth the Blessings of Heaven
talks.synopsis: If we are caring, if we are charitable, if we are obedient to God and follow His prophets, our sacrifices will bring forth the blessings of heaven.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: Called to Serve
talks.synopsis: To raise our families and serve faithfully in the Church, all without running faster than we have strength, require wisdom, judgment, divine help—and inevitably some sacrifice.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: “Blessed Are the Peacemakers”
talks.synopsis: Peace is a prime priority that pleads for our pursuit.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: The Stake Patriarch
talks.synopsis: The Lord has a special interest in the patriarch, who holds a unique position in the Church.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: The Greatest Generation of Missionaries
talks.synopsis: We call upon you, our young brethren of the Aaronic Priesthood, to rise up, to measure up, and to be fully prepared to serve the Lord.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: I Believe I Can, I Knew I Could
talks.synopsis: While we are not all equal in experience, aptitude, and strength, … we will all be accountable for the use of the gifts and opportunities given to us.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Peace, Be Still
talks.synopsis: His words in holy writ are sufficient: “Be still, and know that I am God.”

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: To Men of the Priesthood
talks.synopsis: You men who hold this precious priesthood, bind it to your very souls. Be worthy of it at all times and in all circumstances.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Models to Follow
talks.synopsis: All of us living in the world today need points of reference—even models to follow.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: I’ll Go Where You Want Me to Go
talks.synopsis: The full measure of [our] conversion to men and women of God happens best through our labors in His vineyard.

talks.author: D. Todd Christofferson
talks.title: That They May Be One in Us
talks.synopsis: We will not be one with God and Christ until we make Their will and interest our greatest desire.

talks.author: Margaret D. Nadauld
talks.title: A Woman of Faith
talks.synopsis: A woman of faith trusts God. … She knows of His interest in her life. She knows that He knows her. She loves His words and drinks deeply of that living water.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Rise to Your Call
talks.synopsis: The Lord will guide you by revelation just as He called you. You must ask in faith for revelation to know what you are to do.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: The Marvelous Foundation of Our Faith
talks.synopsis: God be thanked for His marvelous bestowal of testimony, authority, and doctrine associated with this, the restored Church of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
talks.title: Shall He Find Faith on the Earth?
talks.synopsis: Only when our faith is aligned with the will of our Heavenly Father will we be empowered to receive the blessings we seek.

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: To Be Free of Heavy Burdens
talks.synopsis: You must trust that the Savior has given His life so that you can make the required changes in your life, changes that will bring peace.

talks.author: Kenneth Johnson
talks.title: Yielding to the Enticings of the Holy Spirit
talks.synopsis: Stirrings within us originate from a divine source and, when followed, will help to keep us on course, thus protecting us from harmful influences and dangerous detours.

talks.author: Claudio R. M. Costa
talks.title: Fun and Happiness
talks.synopsis: We can feel happiness every day in our lives through little things we do, and we are fully happy as we keep the commandments of a loving God.

talks.author: Keith B. McMullin
talks.title: Come to Zion! Come to Zion!
talks.synopsis: Principles of love, work, self-reliance, and consecration are God given. Those who embrace them and govern themselves accordingly become pure in heart.

talks.author: F. Melvin Hammond
talks.title: Dad, Are You Awake?
talks.synopsis: Do your sons ever wonder if you are asleep when it comes to the things that are most important to them?

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Each a Better Person
talks.synopsis: There is room for improvement in every life. … Regardless of our circumstances, we can improve ourselves and while so doing have an effect on the lives of those about us.

talks.author: Bonnie D. Parkin
talks.title: With Holiness of Heart
talks.synopsis: Every time we reach out with love, patience, kindness, generosity, we honor our covenants by saying, “Here am I; send me.”

talks.author: Kathleen H. Hughes
talks.title: Blessing Our Families through Our Covenants
talks.synopsis: If we keep our covenants, the promises we receive in return are great.

talks.author: Anne C. Pingree
talks.title: Charity: One Family, One Home at a Time
talks.synopsis: As covenant women, … we can alter the face of the earth one family and one home at a time through charity, our small and simple acts of pure love.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: You Are All Heaven Sent
talks.synopsis: Your role as sisters is special and unique in the Lord’s work. You are the nurturers and the caregivers.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: The Condition of the Church
talks.synopsis: The gospel of Jesus Christ is the way of peace. To the extent we follow it and incorporate it in our lives … will we be blessed and prospered.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Sweet Power of Prayer
talks.synopsis: We should pray in accord with the will of our Heavenly Father. He wants to test us, to strengthen us, and to help us achieve our full potential.

talks.author: David E. Sorensen
talks.title: Forgiveness Will Change Bitterness to Love
talks.synopsis: Forgiveness means that problems of the past no longer dictate our destinies, and we can focus on the future with God’s love in our hearts.

talks.author: Kathleen H. Hughes
talks.title: Blessed by Living Water
talks.synopsis: Living water heals. It nourishes and sustains. It brings peace and joy.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: Faith through Tribulation Brings Peace and Joy
talks.synopsis: However dark conditions may seem in this world today, whatever the storms we are facing personally, … joy can be ours now.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: In Search of Treasure
talks.synopsis: Learn from the past, prepare for the future, live in the present.

talks.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
talks.title: The Unspeakable Gift
talks.synopsis: If [we] would open [our] hearts to the refining influence of this unspeakable gift of the Holy Ghost, a glorious new spiritual dimension would come to light.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: A Child and a Disciple
talks.synopsis: The Lord trusts His true disciples. He sends prepared people to His prepared servants.

talks.author: Craig C. Christensen
talks.title: Seek, and Ye Shall Find
talks.synopsis: As we engage our faith and commit our energy to draw closer to Jesus Christ, we begin to understand more fully who He really is.

talks.author: James M. Dunn
talks.title: Words to Live By
talks.synopsis: Successfully working our way through life, while keeping our eye on life’s true purposes, blesses us both here and hereafter.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: The Essential Role of Member Missionary Work
talks.synopsis: We must prepare ourselves to assist the missionaries in finding those of our Heavenly Father’s children who will embrace the message of the Restoration.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: The Importance of the Family
talks.synopsis: May it be our resolve this year to build a gospel-centered home, a safe harbor from the storms of the adversary.

talks.author: David B. Haight
talks.title: Growing into the Priesthood
talks.synopsis: Priesthood is the power and authority delegated to man by our Heavenly Father. The authority and majesty of it are beyond our comprehension.

talks.author: Daryl H. Garn
talks.title: Preparing for Missionary Service
talks.synopsis: How important it is for fathers and sons to work together on the basics in preparing for a mission.

talks.author: H. David Burton
talks.title: And That’s the Way It Is
talks.synopsis: We need to achieve and maintain standards in order to participate in the important spiritual events of life.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: The Devil’s Throat
talks.synopsis: Please help us push back the world. We must stand against the wind. Sometimes we must be unpopular and simply say, “This is not right.”

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Stand in Your Appointed Place
talks.synopsis: May we reach out and rescue those who have fallen by the wayside, that not one precious soul will be lost.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Loyalty
talks.synopsis: Be loyal to the best that is in you. Be faithful and true to the covenants that are associated with the priesthood of God.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: Dear Are the Sheep That Have Wandered
talks.synopsis: To those brokenhearted parents who have been righteous, diligent, and prayerful in the teaching of their disobedient children, we say to you, the Good Shepherd is watching over them.

talks.author: Neal A. Maxwell
talks.title: Care for the Life of the Soul
talks.synopsis: Truly converted disciples, though still imperfect, will pursue “the life of the soul” on any day, in any decade, amid any decadence and destruction.

talks.author: Dennis B. Neuenschwander
talks.title: Holy Place, Sacred Space
talks.synopsis: Our ability to seek, recognize, and reverence the holy above the profane, and the sacred above the secular, defines our spirituality.

talks.author: Susan W. Tanner
talks.title: Did I Tell You … ?
talks.synopsis: In the eternal scheme of things, the most crucial and fulfilling thing you will do is to build a holy home and rear a strong family in love.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: War and Peace
talks.synopsis: I hope that the Lord’s people may be at peace one with another during times of trouble, regardless of what loyalties they may have to different governments or parties.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: The Golden Years
talks.synopsis: Value the old folks for what they are, not just what they can do.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: A Prayer for the Children
talks.synopsis: As parents we can hold life together … with love and faith, passed on to the next generation, one child at a time.

talks.author: Spencer V. Jones
talks.title: Overcoming the Stench of Sin
talks.synopsis: Our loving Heavenly Father, … knowing that you and I would all sin and become unclean, provided a cleansing process from sin that … actually does work.

talks.author: D. Rex Gerratt
talks.title: Follow the Instructions
talks.synopsis: As you open your mind and heart to feel the Spirit, the Lord in His own time and in His own way will give you the instructions which will bless your life.

talks.author: F. Burton Howard
talks.title: Eternal Marriage
talks.synopsis: If you want something to last forever, you treat it differently. … It becomes special because you have made it so.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Give Thanks in All Things
talks.synopsis: When we give thanks in all things, we see hardships and adversities in the context of the purpose of life.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Benediction
talks.synopsis: I offer a plea that each of us will seek to live closer to the Lord and to commune with Him more frequently and with increased faith.

talks.author: Susan W. Tanner
talks.title: Steadfast in Our Covenants
talks.synopsis: To be steadfast in Christ implies keeping covenants. … When we do these things, … our spirits are lifted and our hearts are filled with love.

talks.author: Julie B. Beck
talks.title: There Is Hope Smiling Brightly before Us
talks.synopsis: You can wake up every day … with hope smiling brightly before you because you have a Savior.

talks.author: Elaine S. Dalton
talks.title: Press Forward and Be Steadfast
talks.synopsis: You can press forward with vision. The Holy Ghost will help you remain steadfast, and your testimony of the Savior will help you proceed with a perfect brightness of hope.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: The Virtues of Righteous Daughters of God
talks.synopsis: I encourage you to strengthen the virtues you have already acquired and resolve to develop many others.

talks.author: Gayle M. Clegg
talks.title: The Light of His Love
talks.synopsis: When I was nine years old, our family moved into a home with an unfinished basement where my sister and I slept. Sometimes at night as I lay in bed trying to go to sleep, the unfinished walls looked like shadowy figures. These shapes gave me frightening dreams. Sometimes I would sleepwalk through my house and wake up suddenly in a strange place.

talks.author: Sydney S. Reynolds
talks.title: I Can Pray to Heavenly Father Anytime, Anywhere
talks.synopsis: My young brothers and sisters, can you think of the last time you received an answer to your prayers? Was it when you lost something? Was it when you were scared? Maybe you were sick or someone you loved was sick. I have prayed in those times, too.

talks.author: Coleen K. Menlove
talks.title: Show You Know
talks.synopsis: Dear Primary children, this year we celebrate the 125th year since Primary was organized. It was organized by a prophet of God to help children learn and live the gospel of Jesus Christ with joy. Primary is important, and this will be a wonderful year as we celebrate. Most importantly, we—your parents, leaders, and teachers—honor you, the children. We love you. We rejoice in who you are and who you can become.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: You Are a Child of God
talks.synopsis: My dear young friends, my beloved boys and girls, I am so grateful to be with you when you celebrate Primary’s 125th birthday.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: The State of the Church
talks.synopsis: This is only the beginning. We have scarcely scratched the surface. We are engaged in a work for the souls of men and women everywhere.

talks.author: Sheldon F. Child
talks.title: A Sure Foundation
talks.synopsis: Our testimonies … must be built on a sure foundation, deeply rooted in the gospel of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Lynn A. Mickelsen
talks.title: The Atonement, Repentance, and Dirty Linen
talks.synopsis: The promise of the Lord is that He will cleanse our garments with His blood. … He can redeem us from our personal fall.

talks.author: Anne C. Pingree
talks.title: Seeing the Promises Afar Off
talks.synopsis: Faith, the spiritual ability to be persuaded of promises that are seen “afar off” … , is a sure measure of those who truly believe.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: Let Our Voices Be Heard
talks.synopsis: Let us speak out and encourage a more uplifting, inspiring, and acceptable media.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: “The Standard of Truth Has Been Erected”
talks.synopsis: However out of step we may seem, however much the standards are belittled, however much others yield, we will not yield, we cannot yield.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: Receiving a Testimony of the Restored Gospel of Jesus Christ
talks.synopsis: Follow the example of Joseph Smith and the pattern of the Restoration. Turn to the scriptures. Kneel in prayer. Ask in faith. Listen to the Holy Ghost.

talks.author: Shirley D. Christensen
talks.title: The Clarion Call of Prophets
talks.synopsis: Prophets and apostles stand at the head of this work today as it goes forth to all the world.

talks.author: W. Craig Zwick
talks.title: The Lord Thy God Will Hold Thy Hand
talks.synopsis: If we will … walk hand in hand with Him in His paths, we will go forward with faith and never feel alone.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Repentance and Change
talks.synopsis: Repenting means giving up all of our practices—personal, family, ethnic, and national—that are contrary to the commandments of God.

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: Realize Your Full Potential
talks.synopsis: With all my capacity I encourage you to discover who you really are. … I urge you to discern through the Spirit your divinely given capacities.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Personal Priesthood Responsibility
talks.synopsis: When ordained to an office in the priesthood, you are granted authority. But power comes from exercising that authority in righteousness.

talks.author: Monte J. Brough
talks.title: Young Men—Holders of Keys
talks.synopsis: We need young men to stand up in their calling, knowing of their ordained right to act in the office to which they are appointed.

talks.author: Merrill J. Bateman
talks.title: Priesthood, Keys, and the Power to Bless
talks.synopsis: It is expected that worthy holders of the Melchizedek Priesthood will use the power delegated to them to bless others, starting with their own families.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: The Phenomenon That Is You
talks.synopsis: Begin to unlock the knowledge of who you really are by learning more about your forebears.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Bring Him Home
talks.synopsis: We can, with the Lord’s help, reach out and rescue those for whom we have responsibility.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: The Shepherds of Israel
talks.synopsis: I thank the Lord for good bishops in this Church. … May you know that peace which comes alone from God to those who serve Him.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: The Bridge Builder
talks.synopsis: Jesus Christ … has built the bridges over which we must cross if we are to reach our heavenly home.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: The Grandeur of God
talks.synopsis: In word and in deed Jesus was trying to reveal and make personal to us the true nature of His Father, our Father in Heaven.

talks.author: Charles A. Didier
talks.title: The Message of the Restoration
talks.synopsis: The message of the Restoration is [an] invitation to know why the gospel of Jesus Christ and His true Church have been restored by a prophet in modern times.

talks.author: Sydney S. Reynolds
talks.title: He Knows Us; He Loves Us
talks.synopsis: The Lord … knows who we are and where we are, and He knows who needs our help.

talks.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
talks.title: Three Choices
talks.synopsis: I would like to offer my own self-improvement program. It consists of three steps that have been useful to me.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: An Ensign to the Nations, a Light to the World
talks.synopsis: If we are to [be] an ensign to the nations and a light to the world, we must take on more of the luster of the life of Christ.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: We Believe All That God Has Revealed
talks.synopsis: God continues to reveal His will to mankind, as He has in all periods of time when He has had authorized servants upon the earth.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: An Enduring Testimony of the Mission of the Prophet Joseph
talks.synopsis: The Prophet Joseph is an example and a teacher of enduring well in faith. … I thank and love him as the Lord’s prophet of the Restoration.

talks.author: William W. Parmley
talks.title: “Come, Follow Me”
talks.synopsis: The admonition to “Come, follow me” and the question “What would Jesus do?” provide powerful guidelines for living.

talks.author: Quentin L. Cook
talks.title: Are You a Saint?
talks.synopsis: If we are to be Saints in our day, we need to separate ourselves from evil conduct and destructive pursuits that are prevalent in the world.

talks.author: Richard C. Edgley
talks.title: The Empowerment of Humility
talks.synopsis: The strength of the Church is in the millions of humble members striving every day to do the will of the Savior.

talks.author: Neal A. Maxwell
talks.title: How Choice a Seer!
talks.synopsis: If Joseph Smith had been the conduit for only one such divine revelation, it would be, standing alone, sufficient to ensure his prophetic greatness.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Let Us Live the Gospel More Fully
talks.synopsis: What a tremendous work you are doing, you faithful Latter-day Saints all across the world, who carry in your hearts a firm and unswerving testimony.

talks.author: Bonnie D. Parkin
talks.title: Choosing Charity: That Good Part
talks.synopsis: I invite you to not only love each other more but love each other better.

talks.author: Kathleen H. Hughes
talks.title: In Covenant with Him
talks.synopsis: Our sisterhood includes all ages and backgrounds; we are connected by the covenants we have made.

talks.author: Anne C. Pingree
talks.title: Choose Ye Therefore Christ the Lord
talks.synopsis: When a woman chooses to have Christ at the center of her own heart, … she brings the Lord into the core of her home and family.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: To the Women of the Church
talks.synopsis: Thank you for being the kind of people you are and doing the things you do. May the blessings of heaven rest upon you.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: The Church Grows Stronger
talks.synopsis: There is much more yet to be done, but what has been accomplished is truly phenomenal.

talks.author: David B. Haight
talks.title: How Great the Wisdom and the Love
talks.synopsis: The gospel is true. I know it; I’m a witness of it.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Preparation for the Second Coming
talks.synopsis: We need to make … spiritual preparation for the events prophesied at the time of the Second Coming.

talks.author: D. Todd Christofferson
talks.title: When Thou Art Converted
talks.synopsis: Plead with God in the name of Christ to write the gospel in your mind that you may have understanding and in your heart that you may love to do His will.

talks.author: Gayle M. Clegg
talks.title: The Finished Story
talks.synopsis: We have to keep writing, keep walking, keep serving and accepting new challenges to the end of our own story.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: In the Strength of the Lord
talks.synopsis: We need strength beyond ourselves to keep the commandments in whatever circumstance life brings to us.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Your Personal Influence
talks.synopsis: As we follow that Man of Galilee—even the Lord Jesus Christ—our personal influence will be felt for good wherever we are, whatever our callings.

talks.author: Wesley L. Jones
talks.title: Church Auditing Department Report, 2003
talks.synopsis: To the First Presidency of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Roots and Branches
talks.synopsis: Simply summarized, life’s greatest blessings will come to us if our love of Jesus Christ is rooted deeply in our hearts.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: “Abide in Me”
talks.synopsis: For the fruit of the gospel to blossom and bless our lives, we must be firmly attached to Him, the Savior of us all.

talks.author: Keith B. McMullin
talks.title: Jesus, the Very Thought of Thee
talks.synopsis: Jesus, the very thought of Thee fills my heart with inexpressible joy. It controls every part of my being.

talks.author: W. Rolfe Kerr
talks.title: The Words of Christ—Our Spiritual Liahona
talks.synopsis: Let us in faith take the words of Christ into our minds and into our hearts.

talks.author: Francisco J. Viñas
talks.title: Applying the Simple and Plain Gospel Principles in the Family
talks.synopsis: The plain and simple principles of the gospel of Jesus Christ … should be firmly established in our homes to ensure happiness in family life.

talks.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
talks.title: Earthly Debts, Heavenly Debts
talks.synopsis: We have earthly debts and heavenly debts. Let us be wise in dealing with each of them.

talks.author: Neal A. Maxwell
talks.title: Remember How Merciful the Lord Hath Been
talks.synopsis: There are clusters of memories embedded in each of your lives. And these can help us to “remember how merciful the Lord hath been.”

talks.author: Mervyn B. Arnold
talks.title: Strengthen Thy Brethren
talks.synopsis: May each quorum and each one of us individually … follow the example of our Lord and Savior to “take … him that is weak, … that he may become strong also.”

talks.author: Earl C. Tingey
talks.title: For the Strength of Youth
talks.synopsis: The standards of the Church are firm and true. They are for your safety and eternal security.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: Choices
talks.synopsis: Tomorrow’s blessings and opportunities depend on the choices we make today.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: The Call for Courage
talks.synopsis: Let us have the courage to defy the consensus, the courage to stand for principle. Courage, not compromise, brings the smile of God’s approval.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: “I Was an Hungred, and Ye Gave Me Meat”
talks.synopsis: Wherever want has been created by whatever cause, representatives of the Church have been there. … I have been a firsthand witness to the effectiveness of our humanitarian efforts.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: Did You Get the Right Message?
talks.synopsis: We should keep our lives in order so that when we receive a … message telling us what the Lord wants us to do we will be able to respond.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: Fatherhood, an Eternal Calling
talks.synopsis: May we heed the voice of the prophets, who, from the beginning of time, have warned us about the importance of fathers in the home.

talks.author: Dennis E. Simmons
talks.title: But If Not …
talks.synopsis: Men accomplish marvelous things by trusting in the Lord and keeping His commandments—by exercising faith even when they don’t know how the Lord is shaping them.

talks.author: Julie B. Beck
talks.title: A “Mother Heart”
talks.synopsis: By developing a mother heart, each girl and woman prepares for her divine, eternal mission of motherhood.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: Do Not Fear
talks.synopsis: The moral values upon which civilization itself must depend spiral downward at an ever-increasing pace. Nevertheless, I do not fear the future.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: The Dawning of a Brighter Day
talks.synopsis: What a glorious season it has been and now is. A new day has come in the work of the Almighty.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: The Atonement and the Value of One Soul
talks.synopsis: If we could truly understand the Atonement of the Lord Jesus Christ, we would realize how precious is one son or daughter of God.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: With All the Feeling of a Tender Parent: A Message of Hope to Families
talks.synopsis: No matter how evil the world becomes, our families can be at peace. If we do what’s right, we will be guided and protected.

talks.author: Clate W. Mask Jr.
talks.title: Standing Spotless before the Lord
talks.synopsis: Because of the Atonement of Jesus Christ, we can all stand spotless, pure, and white before the Lord.

talks.author: W. Douglas Shumway
talks.title: Marriage and Family: Our Sacred Responsibility
talks.synopsis: In a society where marriage is often shunned, parenthood avoided, and families degraded, we have the responsibility to honor our marriages, nurture our children, and fortify our families.

talks.author: Bruce C. Hafen
talks.title: The Atonement: All for All
talks.synopsis: When the Savior’s all and our all come together, we will find not only forgiveness of sin, … “we shall be like him.”

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: How to Live Well amid Increasing Evil
talks.synopsis: As you continue to center your mind and heart in [the Lord], He will help you have a rich and full life no matter what happens in the world around you.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Concluding Remarks
talks.synopsis: May our testimonies of the great foundation principles of this work … shine forth from our lives and our actions.

talks.author: Susan W. Tanner
talks.title: All Things Shall Work Together for Your Good
talks.synopsis: As we search, pray, and believe, we will recognize miracles in our lives and become miracle workers in the lives of others.

talks.author: Julie B. Beck
talks.title: My Soul Delighteth in the Scriptures
talks.synopsis: If you have not already developed the habit of daily scripture study, start now and keep studying.

talks.author: Elaine S. Dalton
talks.title: Believe!
talks.synopsis: Believe in yourselves. Believe that you are never alone. Believe that you will always be guided.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Stay on the High Road
talks.synopsis: Pray for the strength to walk the high road, which at times may be lonely but which will lead to peace and happiness and joy supernal.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Condition of the Church
talks.synopsis: I believe the Church is in better condition than it has been at any time in its entire history.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: Prophets, Seers, and Revelators
talks.synopsis: The First Presidency and Quorum of the Twelve are commissioned by God and sustained … as prophets, seers, and revelators.

talks.author: John H. Groberg
talks.title: The Power of God’s Love
talks.synopsis: Filled with His love, we can endure pain, quell fear, forgive freely, avoid contention, renew strength, and bless and help others.

talks.author: Dale E. Miller
talks.title: Bringing Peace and Healing to Your Soul
talks.synopsis: As conversion matures and is sustained through the workings of the Holy Ghost, peace and healing come to the soul.

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: Peace of Conscience and Peace of Mind
talks.synopsis: For many, relief and happiness can come by understanding the relationship between peace of conscience and peace of mind.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: Where Do I Make My Stand?
talks.synopsis: To find happiness and joy, no matter what comes, we must make our stand unequivocally with the Lord.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: What Is a Quorum?
talks.synopsis: One of the greatest blessings one can receive from being a bearer of the priesthood … is belonging to a priesthood quorum.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Faith and Keys
talks.synopsis: We have to know by inspiration that the priesthood keys are held by those who lead and serve us. That requires the witness of the Spirit.

talks.author: Ned B. Roueché
talks.title: “Feed My Sheep”
talks.synopsis: We all have a great responsibility … that includes searching out those that are not with us and extending to them our love and fellowship.

talks.author: Ronald T. Halverson
talks.title: “I Stand at the Door, and Knock”
talks.synopsis: I invite you to … do whatever it takes to earnestly seek truth, to know God the Eternal Father and His Son, Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Bonnie D. Parkin
talks.title: How Has Relief Society Blessed Your Life?
talks.synopsis: Because Relief Society is divinely designed, it blesses not only women but the family and the Church.

talks.author: Donald L. Staheli
talks.title: Securing Our Testimonies
talks.synopsis: Frequently reading, pondering, and applying the lessons of the scriptures, combined with prayer, become an irreplaceable part of gaining and sustaining a strong, vibrant testimony.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: Pure Testimony
talks.synopsis: Testimony—real testimony, born of the Spirit and confirmed by the Holy Ghost—changes lives.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Be Not Deceived
talks.synopsis: The Holy Ghost will protect us against being deceived, but to realize that wonderful blessing we must always do the things necessary to retain that Spirit.

talks.author: Carl B. Pratt
talks.title: The Blessings of a Proper Fast
talks.synopsis: I fear … that too many of us are either not fasting on fast day or we are doing so in a lackadaisical manner.

talks.author: Cecil O. Samuelson Jr.
talks.title: Perilous Times
talks.synopsis: How grateful I am, in these perilous times, for the protection and guidance given to us by the sacred assurance that Jesus Christ lives today.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: The Key of the Knowledge of God
talks.synopsis: The key of the knowledge of God, administered by those who keep the oath and covenant of the Melchizedek Priesthood, will enable us to come off as the sons of God.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Anxiously Engaged
talks.synopsis: There are quorum members and those who should be our quorum members who require our help.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: A Tragic Evil among Us
talks.synopsis: [Pornography] is like a raging storm, destroying individuals and families, utterly ruining what was once wholesome and beautiful.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Choose You This Day
talks.synopsis: The choices we make determine our destiny.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: Finding Faith in the Lord Jesus Christ
talks.synopsis: Only faith in the Lord Jesus Christ and His Atonement can bring us peace, hope, and understanding.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: The Opportunity to Testify
talks.synopsis: With … tender feelings of gratitude for all who have influenced my life in past years, I commit myself to the future.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: In the Strength of the Lord
talks.synopsis: In the strength of the Lord we can do and endure and overcome all things.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Senior Missionaries and the Gospel
talks.synopsis: I express gratitude for our senior missionaries. They are young in spirit, wise, and willing to work.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: The Women in Our Lives
talks.synopsis: How thankful I am, how thankful we all must be, for the women in our lives.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: The Least of These
talks.synopsis: Let no one underestimate the power of faith in the ordinary Latter-day Saints.

talks.author: Elaine S. Dalton
talks.title: We Did This for You
talks.synopsis: Temple work is the work that we have been prepared to do. It is a work for every generation, including and especially the youth.

talks.author: Richard J. Maynes
talks.title: Keeping Our Covenants
talks.synopsis: The most important thing we can do in this life is to keep the promises or covenants we have made with the Lord.

talks.author: H. Bryan Richards
talks.title: Remember the Teachings of Your Father
talks.synopsis: The Book of Mormon can and does change lives.

talks.author: H. David Burton
talks.title: More Holiness Give Me
talks.synopsis: It is important for families and individuals to aggressively seek more of the virtues which go beyond this mortal life.

talks.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
talks.title: Press On
talks.synopsis: There is one thing the Lord expects of us no matter our difficulties and sorrows: He expects us to press on.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Closing Remarks
talks.synopsis: I would hope that we might go to the house of the Lord a little more frequently.

talks.author: Bonnie D. Parkin
talks.title: Belonging Is Our Sacred Birthright
talks.synopsis: I testify that you do fit, that you do belong to Relief Society—the Good Shepherd’s fold for women.

talks.author: Kathleen H. Hughes
talks.title: Out of Small Things
talks.synopsis: We must not become weary of doing good, and we must not become impatient; the changes we seek will come about “in their time.”

talks.author: Anne C. Pingree
talks.title: Walking towards the Light of His Love
talks.synopsis: Connections forged among covenant women in Relief Society can … enlighten, enliven, and enrich the journey of life.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: If Ye Are Prepared Ye Shall Not Fear
talks.synopsis: We do live in turbulent times. Often the future is unknown; therefore, it behooves us to prepare for uncertainties.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Opening Remarks
talks.synopsis: Our burden in going forward is tremendous. But our opportunity is glorious.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: The Book of Mormon: Another Testament of Jesus Christ—Plain and Precious Things
talks.synopsis: The Book of Mormon is an endless treasure of wisdom and inspiration, of counsel and correction.

talks.author: Richard C. Edgley
talks.title: A Still, Small Voice and a Throbbing Heart
talks.synopsis: It is a still, small voice and a throbbing heart that testifies of the miracle of the Restoration.

talks.author: Coleen K. Menlove
talks.title: All Thy Children Shall Be Taught
talks.synopsis: Children need to know that having faith in the Savior and following Him will help them receive peace in this troubled world.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Now Is the Time to Prepare
talks.synopsis: Now is the time to prepare to meet God. Tomorrow may be too late.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Constant Truths for Changing Times
talks.synopsis: We, as members of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, must stand up to the dangers which surround us and our families.

talks.author: Robert W. Cantwell
talks.title: Church Auditing Department Report, 2004
talks.synopsis: To the First Presidency of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints

talks.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
talks.title: The Virtue of Kindness
talks.synopsis: Kindness is the essence of a celestial life. Kindness is how a Christlike person treats others.

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: The Power of Preach My Gospel
talks.synopsis: I encourage you to find out how this extraordinary resource can help in your missionary efforts.

talks.author: Harold G. Hillam
talks.title: The Worth of Souls
talks.synopsis: When we see the effect one person can have … , it perhaps is no wonder that the Lord reminded us, “Remember the worth of souls.”

talks.author: Lynn G. Robbins
talks.title: Tithing—a Commandment Even for the Destitute
talks.synopsis: Genuine sacrifice has been a hallmark of the faithful from the beginning.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: The Fruits of the First Vision
talks.synopsis: I count Joseph Smith among those whose testimony of Christ helped me to develop my own testimony of the Savior.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: Couple Missionaries: Blessings from Sacrifice and Service
talks.synopsis: Your Heavenly Father needs you. His work, under the direction of our Savior Jesus Christ, needs what you are uniquely prepared to give.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: Our Most Distinguishing Feature
talks.synopsis: The priesthood of God … is as indispensable to the true Church of God as it is unique to it.

talks.author: Neil L. Andersen
talks.title: Beware of the Evil behind the Smiling Eyes
talks.synopsis: As we increase our understanding and love for the Savior, His light will illuminate everything around us. We will then see evil for what it is.

talks.author: Robert C. Oaks
talks.title: Who’s on the Lord’s Side? Who?
talks.synopsis: The Lord needs to know on whom He can rely.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: Perseverance
talks.synopsis: Perseverance is demonstrated by those who keep going when the going gets tough, who don’t give up even when others say, “It can’t be done.”

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: The Sacred Call of Service
talks.synopsis: The performance of one’s duty brings a sense of happiness and peace.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Gambling
talks.synopsis: If you have never been involved in poker games or other forms of gambling, don’t start. If you are involved, then quit now while you can do so.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: Standing in Holy Places
talks.synopsis: I encourage our Saints all over the world, wherever possible, to strive to stand more often in holy places.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: One More
talks.synopsis: We need more hardworking, testimony-enriched missionaries in order to reach more of our Heavenly Father’s children.

talks.author: David E. Sorensen
talks.title: Faith Is the Answer
talks.synopsis: Remember that faith and obedience are still the answers—even when things go wrong, perhaps especially when things go wrong.

talks.author: Kathleen H. Hughes
talks.title: What Greater Goodness Can We Know: Christlike Friends
talks.synopsis: God knows the needs of His children, and He often works through us, prompting us to help one another.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Hearts Bound Together
talks.synopsis: When you were baptized, your ancestors looked down on you with hope. … They rejoiced to see one of their descendants make a covenant to find them.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: The Great Things Which God Has Revealed
talks.synopsis: On the solid foundation of the Prophet Joseph’s divine calling and the revelations of God, which came through him, we go forward.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: What Seek Ye?
talks.synopsis: Honest seekers of truth are finding answers to their questions—they are finding the Lord through His restored Church.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Pornography
talks.synopsis: Let us all improve our personal behavior and redouble our efforts to protect our loved ones and our environment from the onslaught of pornography.

talks.author: Robert J. Whetten
talks.title: Strengthen Thy Brethren
talks.synopsis: You must do what our Savior and His prophets … have always taught: serve, strengthen the faith, and nurture those who need your love and blessing.

talks.author: Adhemar Damiani
talks.title: Be of Good Cheer and Faithful in Adversity
talks.synopsis: The gospel of Jesus Christ gives us the strength and the eternal perspective to face what is coming with good cheer.

talks.author: Stephen B. Oveson
talks.title: Appreciating the Counsel of Those Who Are Bowed in Years
talks.synopsis: May we have added insights into and greater appreciation for the power of testimony, especially as it is borne by those [who are bowed in years].

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: The Tender Mercies of the Lord
talks.synopsis: I testify that the tender mercies of the Lord are available to all of us and that the Redeemer of Israel is eager to bestow such gifts upon us.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Closing Remarks
talks.synopsis: Surely the Lord is blessing us as a people, and we must reach out to bless His needy wherever they may be.

talks.author: Susan W. Tanner
talks.title: Glad Tidings from Cumorah
talks.synopsis: You and I can not only survive but prevail, as did Moroni, in our efforts to stand for truth in perilous times.

talks.author: Julie B. Beck
talks.title: A Work for Me to Do
talks.synopsis: The Lord sent an angel to Joseph Smith to tell him that he had a work to do. That work continues today in us.

talks.author: Elaine S. Dalton
talks.title: He Knows You by Name
talks.synopsis: You may not have heard the Lord call you by name, but He knows each one of you and He knows your name.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Be Thou an Example
talks.synopsis: You can share your testimony in many ways—by the words you speak, by the example you set, by the manner in which you live your life.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Opening Remarks
talks.synopsis: The growth of the Church from its infancy to its present stature is phenomenal, and we have only scratched the surface.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: Blessings Resulting from Reading the Book of Mormon
talks.synopsis: Now it is up to us to study the Book of Mormon and learn of its principles and apply them in our lives.

talks.author: Keith B. McMullin
talks.title: Be Prepared … Be Ye Strong from Henceforth
talks.synopsis: Tragedies never triumph where personal righteousness prevails.

talks.author: Susan W. Tanner
talks.title: The Sanctity of the Body
talks.synopsis: The Lord wants us to be made over—but in His image, not in the image of the world, by receiving His image in our countenances.

talks.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
talks.title: Journey to Higher Ground
talks.synopsis: We are faced with a choice. We can trust in our own strength, or we can journey to higher ground and come unto Christ.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: The Light in Their Eyes
talks.synopsis: A sacred light comes to our eyes and countenances when we have a personal bond with our loving Heavenly Father and His Son.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Priesthood Authority in the Family and the Church
talks.synopsis: There are many similarities and some differences in the way priesthood authority functions in the family and in the Church.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: To Young Women
talks.synopsis: Be a woman of Christ. Cherish your esteemed place in the sight of God. He needs you. This Church needs you. The world needs you.

talks.author: Benjamín De Hoyos
talks.title: True Happiness: A Conscious Decision
talks.synopsis: Happiness is a condition of the soul. This joyous state comes as a result of righteous living.

talks.author: C. Scott Grow
talks.title: The Book of Mormon, the Instrument to Gather Scattered Israel
talks.synopsis: Jesus Christ gave us the Book of Mormon as the instrument to gather scattered Israel.

talks.author: Paul K. Sybrowsky
talks.title: “If Christ Had My Opportunities …”
talks.synopsis: Our Savior Jesus Christ teaches us the importance of seeking after the one who is lost.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Spiritual Preparedness: Start Early and Be Steady
talks.synopsis: The great test of life is to see whether we will hearken to and obey God’s commands in the midst of the storms of life.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: What Matters Most Is What Lasts Longest
talks.synopsis: As your leaders, we call upon members of the Church everywhere to put family first and to identify specific ways to strengthen their individual families.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: Becoming a Missionary
talks.synopsis: You and I, today and always, are to bear witness of Jesus Christ and declare the message of the Restoration. … Missionary work is a manifestation of our spiritual identity and heritage.

talks.author: Charles A. Didier
talks.title: Man’s Search for Divine Truth
talks.synopsis: Following the Lord’s pattern to hear and give heed to divine truth will help you build a personal spiritual foundation and determine what you will become.

talks.author: Paul V. Johnson
talks.title: The Blessings of General Conference
talks.synopsis: Decide now to make general conference a priority in your life. Decide to listen carefully and follow the teachings that are given.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: Called and Chosen
talks.synopsis: Those called, sustained, and set apart are entitled to our sustaining support.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Do Your Duty—That Is Best
talks.synopsis: The priesthood is not really so much a gift as it is a commission to serve, a privilege to lift, and an opportunity to bless the lives of others.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: If Ye Are Prepared Ye Shall Not Fear
talks.synopsis: We can so live that we can call upon the Lord for His protection and guidance. … We cannot expect His help if we are unwilling to keep His commandments.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: The Prophet Joseph Smith: Teacher by Example
talks.synopsis: May we incorporate into our own lives the divine principles which [Joseph Smith] so beautifully taught—by example—that we, ourselves, might live more completely the gospel of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: On Zion’s Hill
talks.synopsis: Every soul who willingly affiliates with The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints and seeks to abide by its principles and ordinances is standing “on Zion’s hill.”

talks.author: Merrill J. Bateman
talks.title: A Pattern for All
talks.synopsis: The restored gospel of Jesus Christ is a pattern for all. … It is the good news—the timeless doctrine and atoning powers of the Lord Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Cheryl C. Lant
talks.title: My Soul Delighteth in the Scriptures
talks.synopsis: There is absolutely nothing more important we can do for our families than to strengthen them in the scriptures.

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: Truth Restored
talks.synopsis: The Father’s plan of salvation and happiness … will help you overcome every challenge in life.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Forgiveness
talks.synopsis: Somehow forgiveness, with love and tolerance, accomplishes miracles that can happen in no other way.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Jesus Christ—the Master Healer
talks.synopsis: Faith, repentance, baptism, a testimony, and enduring conversion lead to the healing power of the Lord.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: Preparations for the Restoration and the Second Coming: “My Hand Shall Be over Thee”
talks.synopsis: [The Lord’s] hand has been over the work of the Restoration from before the foundation of this world and will continue until His Second Coming.

talks.author: Won Yong Ko
talks.title: Sacrifice Is a Joy and a Blessing
talks.synopsis: I pray that we will all become Saints willing to sacrifice and become eligible for the Lord’s special blessings.

talks.author: Paul E. Koelliker
talks.title: Gospel Covenants Bring Promised Blessings
talks.synopsis: By keeping the covenants of the gospel, all of the momentary trials of life can be transcended.

talks.author: Lowell M. Snow
talks.title: Compass of the Lord
talks.synopsis: Prophets and apostles through the ages are our compass from the Lord. His direction through them is plain.

talks.author: Ulisses Soares
talks.title: “Feed My Sheep”
talks.synopsis: People are most receptive to our influence when they feel that we truly love them, and not only because we have a calling to fulfill.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Christlike Attributes—the Wind beneath Our Wings
talks.synopsis: Living according to the basic gospel principles will bring power, strength, and spiritual self-reliance into the lives of all Latter-day Saints.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Benediction
talks.synopsis: God our Eternal Father lives. … Jesus is the Christ, the Redeemer of mankind. They have restored Their work in this last and final dispensation through the instrumentality of the Prophet Joseph.

talks.author: Bonnie D. Parkin
talks.title: Sweet Moments
talks.synopsis: If we are seeking the Lord and His guidance, if our direction is to return to our Father in Heaven, the sweet moments will come.

talks.author: Kathleen H. Hughes
talks.title: That We May All Sit Down in Heaven Together
talks.synopsis: When we become instruments in the hands of God, we are used by Him to do His work.

talks.author: Anne C. Pingree
talks.title: Knowing the Lord’s Will for You
talks.synopsis: May the Lord bless each of you in your personal quest to know His will for you and to submit your will to His.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: Instruments in the Hands of God
talks.synopsis: Your influence for good is incalculable and indescribable.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: To Act for Ourselves: The Gift and Blessings of Agency
talks.synopsis: Agency used righteously allows light to dispel the darkness and enables us to live with joy and happiness.

talks.author: H. David Burton
talks.title: Tender Hearts and Helping Hands
talks.synopsis: To each of you whose tender hearts and helping hands have eased the burdens of so many, please accept my heartfelt gratitude.

talks.author: Julie B. Beck
talks.title: An Outpouring of Blessings
talks.synopsis: All faithful members are equally blessed by the outpouring of blessings they receive through priesthood ordinances.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: As a Child
talks.synopsis: Our natures must be changed to become as a child to gain the strength we must have to be safe in the times of moral peril.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: True to the Faith
talks.synopsis: Let us resolve here and now to follow that straight path which leads home to the Father of us all.

talks.author: Robert W. Cantwell
talks.title: Church Auditing Department Report, 2005
talks.synopsis: To the First Presidency of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: “I Will Remember Your Sins No More”
talks.synopsis: Through the Father’s redeeming plan, those who may stumble and fall “are not cast off forever.”

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: That We May Always Have His Spirit to Be with Us
talks.synopsis: We should endeavor to discern when we “withdraw [ourselves] from the Spirit of the Lord” … [and] attend to and learn from the choices and influences that separate us from the Holy Spirit.

talks.author: David F. Evans
talks.title: Your Mission Will Change Everything
talks.synopsis: Come and be part of the greatest generation of missionaries the world has ever known.

talks.author: Wolfgang H. Paul
talks.title: The Gift of Agency
talks.synopsis: As we obey our Heavenly Father’s commandments, our faith increases, we grow in wisdom and spiritual strength, and it becomes easier for us to make right choices.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Nurturing Marriage
talks.synopsis: Marriages would be happier if nurtured more carefully.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: As Now We Take the Sacrament
talks.synopsis: Partaking of the sacrament provides us with a sacred moment in a holy place.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: See the End from the Beginning
talks.synopsis: If you trust the Lord and obey Him, … He will help you achieve the great potential He sees in you.

talks.author: Ronald A. Rasband
talks.title: Our Rising Generation
talks.synopsis: Our rising generation is worthy of our best efforts to support and strengthen them in their journey to adulthood.

talks.author: Richard G. Hinckley
talks.title: Repentance, a Blessing of Membership
talks.synopsis: Repentance … is not a harsh principle. … It is kind and merciful.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: A Royal Priesthood
talks.synopsis: While holding the priesthood brings great blessings, the priesthood also carries with it great obligations.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Our Sacred Priesthood Trust
talks.synopsis: The priesthood is not really so much a gift as it is a commission to serve, a privilege to lift, and an opportunity to bless the lives of others.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: The Need for Greater Kindness
talks.synopsis: Why do any of us have to be so mean and unkind to others? Why can’t all of us reach out in friendship to everyone about us?

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: The Restoration of All Things
talks.synopsis: We believe The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints is a restoration of the original Church established by Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: Broken Things to Mend
talks.synopsis: When He says to the poor in spirit, “Come unto me,” He means He knows the way out and He knows the way up.

talks.author: Earl C. Tingey
talks.title: The Great Plan of Happiness
talks.synopsis: Through the infinite Atonement, God has provided a means whereby we can both overcome our sins and become completely clean again.

talks.author: Anne C. Pingree
talks.title: To Grow Up unto the Lord
talks.synopsis: Determined service to others, even in difficult circumstances, is required of those who truly desire “to grow up unto the Lord.”

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: All Men Everywhere
talks.synopsis: Again and again the Book of Mormon teaches that the gospel of Jesus Christ is universal in its promise and effect.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Seek Ye the Kingdom of God
talks.synopsis: I hope that all of you will remember that on this Sabbath day you heard me bear my witness that this is God’s holy work.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: Creating a Gospel-Sharing Home
talks.synopsis: Creating a gospel-sharing home is the easiest and most effective way that we can share the gospel.

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: Now Is the Time to Serve a Mission!
talks.synopsis: Exciting fields of labor the world over allow the inspiration of the Lord to call young men and women and devoted couples to challenging assignments.
