talks.author: David R. Stone
talks.title: Zion in the Midst of Babylon
talks.synopsis: We do not need to adopt the standards, the mores, and the morals of Babylon. We can create Zion in the midst of Babylon.

talks.author: Robert S. Wood
talks.title: Instruments of the Lord’s Peace
talks.synopsis: Have we who have taken upon us the name of Christ slipped unknowingly into patterns of slander, evil speaking, and bitter stereotyping?

talks.author: H. Bruce Stucki
talks.title: Prayer, Faith, and Family: Stepping-Stones to Eternal Happiness
talks.synopsis: Heavenly Father will hear our humble prayer and will give us the comfort and guidance we seek.

talks.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
talks.title: The Abundant Life
talks.synopsis: The abundant life is within our reach if only we will drink deeply of living water, fill our hearts with love, and create of our lives a masterpiece.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Until Again We Meet
talks.synopsis: May we remember and constantly express in our lives the counsel we have received.

talks.author: Susan W. Tanner
talks.title: “I Am the Light Which Ye Shall Hold Up”
talks.synopsis: Each of our [Christlike] deeds may share only a pinpoint of light, but added together they begin to make a significant difference.

talks.author: Julie B. Beck
talks.title: You Have a Noble Birthright
talks.synopsis: You can learn more about your life and mission on earth by preparing to receive and then studying your patriarchal blessing.

talks.author: Elaine S. Dalton
talks.title: It Shows in Your Face
talks.synopsis: You reflect His light. Your example will have a powerful effect for good on the earth.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: Your Light—a Standard to All Nations
talks.synopsis: I see the light shining in your faces. That light comes from the Lord, and as you radiate that light, it will bless you and many others.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: We Bear Testimony to the World
talks.synopsis: The Lord is richly blessing His Church, and our duty is to do all we can to move it forward.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: He Heals the Heavy Laden
talks.synopsis: The healing power of the Lord Jesus Christ … is available for every affliction in mortality.

talks.author: Richard H. Winkel
talks.title: The Temple Is about Families
talks.synopsis: When you come to the temple you will love your family with a deeper love than you have ever felt before.

talks.author: Paul B. Pieper
talks.title: The First Generation
talks.synopsis: By being the first in your family to accept the gospel, you become the first generation, a chosen generation through which generations past, present, and future may be blessed.

talks.author: David S. Baxter
talks.title: Faith, Service, Constancy
talks.synopsis: As we cultivate our faith, grow through service, and stay constant and true come what may, so we feel the Savior’s love.

talks.author: Robert C. Oaks
talks.title: The Power of Patience
talks.synopsis: Patience may well be thought of as a gateway virtue, contributing to the growth and strength of its fellow virtues of forgiveness, tolerance, and faith.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: O Be Wise
talks.synopsis: May we focus on the simple ways we can serve in the kingdom of God, always striving to change lives, including our own.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: Discipleship
talks.synopsis: One of the greatest blessings of life and eternity is to be counted as one of the devoted disciples of the Lord Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: Holy Scriptures: The Power of God unto Our Salvation
talks.synopsis: Sacred records bear testimony of the Savior and lead us to Him.

talks.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
talks.title: Sunday Will Come
talks.synopsis: Because of the life and eternal sacrifice of the Savior of the world, we will be reunited with those we have cherished.

talks.author: Elaine S. Dalton
talks.title: Look toward Eternity!
talks.synopsis: Do you understand why it is so important to remain clean and pure?

talks.author: Shayne M. Bowen
talks.title: The Atonement Can Clean, Reclaim, and Sanctify Our Lives
talks.synopsis: The Atonement of Jesus Christ is available to each of us. His Atonement is infinite.

talks.author: Daniel L. Johnson
talks.title: The Law of Tithing
talks.synopsis: I invite you to put your trust in the Lord and, as He Himself said, “Prove me now herewith.”

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: The Power of a Personal Testimony
talks.synopsis: Our firm personal testimony will motivate us to change ourselves and then bless the world.

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: The Atonement Can Secure Your Peace and Happiness
talks.synopsis: True, enduring happiness, with the accompanying strength, courage, and capacity to overcome the greatest difficulties, will come as you center your life in Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: A Priesthood Quorum
talks.synopsis: The strength of a quorum comes in large measure from how completely its members are united in righteousness.

talks.author: D. Todd Christofferson
talks.title: Let Us Be Men
talks.synopsis: We who hold the priesthood of God … must arise from the dust of self-indulgence and be men!

talks.author: Marcus B. Nash
talks.title: The Great Plan of Happiness
talks.synopsis: Just like a fish needs water, you need the gospel and the companionship of the Holy Ghost to be truly, deeply happy.

talks.author: Stanley G. Ellis
talks.title: He Trusts Us!
talks.synopsis: Each of us will one day stand before God and give an accounting of our priesthood service.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: Spiritual Nutrients
talks.synopsis: We need to increase our spiritual nutrients—nutrients that come from the knowledge of the fulness of the gospel and the powers of the holy priesthood.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: True to Our Priesthood Trust
talks.synopsis: It is in doing—not just dreaming—that lives are blessed, others are guided, and souls are saved.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Rise Up, O Men of God
talks.synopsis: With this priesthood comes a great obligation to be worthy of it.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: How Firm a Foundation
talks.synopsis: We can fortify our foundations of faith, our testimonies of truth, so that we will not falter, we will not fail.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: The Plan of Salvation
talks.synopsis: We are not left alone to wander through mortality without knowing of the master plan which the Lord has designed for His children.

talks.author: Richard C. Edgley
talks.title: Three Towels and a 25-Cent Newspaper
talks.synopsis: When we are true to the sacred principles of honesty and integrity, we are true to our faith, and we are true to ourselves.

talks.author: Margaret S. Lifferth
talks.title: Behold Your Little Ones
talks.synopsis: In today’s world, children will need … each of us to protect, teach, and love them.

talks.author: Anthony D. Perkins
talks.title: “The Great and Wonderful Love”
talks.synopsis: Childlike faith in the perfect love of Heavenly Father and Jesus Christ will “divide asunder” Satan’s snares of inadequacy, imperfection, and guilt.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: The Gathering of Scattered Israel
talks.synopsis: We help to gather the elect of the Lord on both sides of the veil.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: The Faith to Move Mountains
talks.synopsis: Increased faith is what we most need. Without it, the work would stagnate. With it, no one can stop its progress.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: A Defense and a Refuge
talks.synopsis: We speak of the Church as our refuge, our defense. There is safety and protection in the Church.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: And Nothing Shall Offend Them
talks.synopsis: Through the strengthening power of the Atonement of Jesus Christ, you and I can be blessed to avoid and triumph over offense.

talks.author: A. Roger Merrill
talks.title: Receiving by the Spirit
talks.synopsis: When we focus … on seeking and receiving the Spirit, we become less concerned about a teacher or speaker holding our attention and more concerned about giving our attention to the Spirit.

talks.author: Craig A. Cardon
talks.title: Moving Closer to Him
talks.synopsis: The priesthood, through the workings of the Spirit, moves individuals closer to God through ordination, ordinances, and refinement of individual natures.

talks.author: Don R. Clarke
talks.title: Becoming Instruments in the Hands of God
talks.synopsis: A person does not need to have a Church calling, an invitation to help someone, or even good health to become an instrument in God’s hands.

talks.author: Keith R. Edwards
talks.title: That They Might Know Thee
talks.synopsis: We can learn spiritual lessons if we can approach suffering, sorrow, or grief with a focus on Christ.

talks.author: Larry W. Gibbons
talks.title: Wherefore, Settle This in Your Hearts
talks.synopsis: We cannot keep one foot in the Church and one foot in the world.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: Prophets in the Land Again
talks.synopsis: It is no trivial matter for this Church to declare to the world prophecy, seership, and revelation, but we do declare it.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Closing Remarks
talks.synopsis: We leave with you our love and our blessing. May the Spirit of the Lord dwell in your homes.

talks.author: Bonnie D. Parkin
talks.title: Eternally Encircled in His Love
talks.synopsis: I know that [Heavenly Father] loves us, sisters, as does His Son, Jesus Christ. That love will never change—it is constant.

talks.author: Kathleen H. Hughes
talks.title: Remembering the Lord’s Love
talks.synopsis: We must seek to know and feel the Lord’s love in our lives.

talks.author: Anne C. Pingree
talks.title: To Look, Reach, and Come unto Christ
talks.synopsis: The Messiah extends His arm of mercy to us, always eager to receive us—if we choose to come to Him.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: In the Arms of His Love
talks.synopsis: This is the greatest women’s organization in all the world. It is a God-given creation.

talks.author: Robert W. Cantwell
talks.title: Church Auditing Department Report, 2006
talks.synopsis: To the First Presidency of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: Using the Supernal Gift of Prayer
talks.synopsis: Prayer is a supernal gift of our Father in Heaven to every soul.

talks.author: Jay E. Jensen
talks.title: The Nourishing Power of Hymns
talks.synopsis: Hymns play an essential role in spirituality, revelation, and conversion.

talks.author: John B. Dickson
talks.title: Commitment to the Lord
talks.synopsis: Now is the time to commit yourself to the Lord as to what you will become during this mortal probation.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: The Tongue of Angels
talks.synopsis: Our words, like our deeds, should be filled with faith and hope and charity.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: Ye Must Be Born Again
talks.synopsis: Through faith in Christ, we can be spiritually prepared and cleansed from sin, immersed in and saturated with His gospel, and purified and sealed by the Holy Spirit of Promise.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: I Know That My Redeemer Lives!
talks.synopsis: Because our Savior died at Calvary, death has no hold upon any one of us.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: The Spirit of the Tabernacle
talks.synopsis: The Tabernacle … stands as a standard of the Restoration of the gospel of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Earl C. Tingey
talks.title: Prophets—Pioneer and Modern Day
talks.synopsis: Both President Brigham Young and President Gordon B. Hinckley are prophets who have led the Church by inspiration and revelation.

talks.author: H. David Burton
talks.title: If These Old Walls Could Talk
talks.synopsis: For more than a century, words of the latter-day prophets, seers, and revelators have gone forth from this podium to the world.

talks.author: Bonnie D. Parkin
talks.title: Gratitude: A Path to Happiness
talks.synopsis: Gratitude is a Spirit-filled principle. It opens our minds to a universe permeated with the richness of a living God.

talks.author: Marlin K. Jensen
talks.title: Remember and Perish Not
talks.synopsis: Remembering in the way God intends is a fundamental and saving principle of the gospel.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: Salt Lake Tabernacle Rededication
talks.synopsis: I am grateful this magnificent building has been strengthened and renewed so it can continue to be used to instruct and edify the children of God.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Tabernacle Memories
talks.synopsis: As this building is rededicated today, may we pledge to rededicate our lives to the work of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: A Tabernacle in the Wilderness
talks.synopsis: This has been a unique and wonderful place of assembly.

talks.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
talks.title: Life’s Lessons Learned
talks.synopsis: I urge you to examine your life. Determine where you are and what you need to do to be the kind of person you want to be.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: To the Aaronic Priesthood: Preparing for the Decade of Decision
talks.synopsis: How you bear [the] priesthood now will prepare you to make the most important decisions in the future.

talks.author: Keith B. McMullin
talks.title: Lay Up in Store
talks.synopsis: We call upon priesthood bearers to store sufficient so that you and your family can weather the vicissitudes of life.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: Message to My Grandsons
talks.synopsis: I hope each one of you becomes a man of God. You will become a man of God through righteous works.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: The Priesthood—a Sacred Gift
talks.synopsis: It is our responsibility to conduct our lives so that we are ever worthy of the priesthood we bear.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: “I Am Clean”
talks.synopsis: Be clean—in language, in thought, in body, in dress.

talks.author: James E. Faust
talks.title: The Healing Power of Forgiveness
talks.synopsis: If we can find forgiveness in our hearts for those who have caused us hurt and injury, we will rise to a higher level of self-esteem and well-being.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Divorce
talks.synopsis: A good marriage does not require a perfect man or a perfect woman. It only requires a man and a woman committed to strive together toward perfection.

talks.author: Neil L. Andersen
talks.title: It’s True, Isn’t It? Then What Else Matters?
talks.synopsis: Our conviction of the Savior and His latter-day work becomes the powerful lens through which we judge all else.

talks.author: Vicki F. Matsumori
talks.title: A Lesson from the Book of Mormon
talks.synopsis: As first-generation members, you are the ones who begin the cycle of teaching and strengthening the next generation.

talks.author: Glenn L. Pace
talks.title: Do You Know?
talks.synopsis: I invite you to “experiment upon my words.” Will you read and pray about the Joseph Smith story?

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: The Miracle of the Holy Bible
talks.synopsis: We are true and full believers in the Lord Jesus Christ and in His revealed word through the Holy Bible.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: The Things of Which I Know
talks.synopsis: I wish to give you my testimony of the basic truths of this work.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: The Message of the Restoration
talks.synopsis: We declare to the world that the fulness of the gospel of Jesus Christ has been restored to the earth.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: This Day
talks.synopsis: All of us will need His help to avoid the tragedy of procrastinating what we must do here and now to have eternal life.

talks.author: Gary J. Coleman
talks.title: “Mom, Are We Christians?”
talks.synopsis: I am a devout Christian who is exceedingly fortunate to have greater knowledge of the true “doctrine of Christ” since my conversion to the restored Church.

talks.author: Charles W. Dahlquist II
talks.title: Who’s on the Lord’s Side?
talks.synopsis: If you will remain on the Lord’s side of the line, the adversary cannot come there to tempt you.

talks.author: Yoshihiko Kikuchi
talks.title: Will a Man Rob God?
talks.synopsis: When you and I pay honest, true tithes to the Lord, the Lord will open the windows of heaven.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Point of Safe Return
talks.synopsis: The gift of the Atonement of Jesus Christ provides us at all times and at all places with the blessings of repentance and forgiveness.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Repentance and Conversion
talks.synopsis: A repentant soul is a converted soul, and a converted soul is a repentant soul.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Closing Remarks
talks.synopsis: What has been said by each of the speakers represents his or her prayerful attempt to impart knowledge that will inspire.

talks.author: Susan W. Tanner
talks.title: Daughters of Heavenly Father
talks.synopsis: Heavenly Father knows you and loves you. You are His special daughter. He has a plan for you.

talks.author: Julie B. Beck
talks.title: Remembering, Repenting, and Changing
talks.synopsis: The easiest, quickest path to happiness and peace is to repent and change as soon as we can.

talks.author: Elaine S. Dalton
talks.title: Stay on the Path
talks.synopsis: Sometimes we think we can live on the edge and still maintain our virtue. But that is a risky place to be.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Let Virtue Garnish Thy Thoughts Unceasingly
talks.synopsis: There is no limit to your potential. If you will take control of your lives, the future is filled with opportunity and gladness.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: The Weak and the Simple of the Church
talks.synopsis: No member of the Church is esteemed by the Lord as more or less than any other.

talks.author: Richard C. Edgley
talks.title: Enduring Together
talks.synopsis: The ward is organized to minister to the needs of those who face even the most difficult and heartbreaking trials.

talks.author: Mary N. Cook
talks.title: Strengthen Home and Family
talks.synopsis: The Lord is depending on you to assist in the exaltation of your eternal family.

talks.author: Enrique R. Falabella
talks.title: Why Are We Members of the Only True Church?
talks.synopsis: The most valuable power we can possess is the treasure of a personal testimony of our Lord Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Spencer J. Condie
talks.title: Claim the Exceeding Great and Precious Promises
talks.synopsis: The Lord makes generous promises, and He certifies that He will not vary from these promises.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Have We Not Reason to Rejoice?
talks.synopsis: This is a joyful religion, one of hope, strength, and deliverance.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Mrs. Patton—the Story Continues
talks.synopsis: I am certain our Heavenly Father was mindful of her needs and wanted her to hear the comforting truths of the gospel.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: Faith, Family, Facts, and Fruits
talks.synopsis: The growing prominence of the Church and the increasing inquiries from others present us with great opportunities to build bridges, make friends, and pass on accurate information.

talks.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
talks.title: The Great Commandment
talks.synopsis: When we reach out to assist the least of Heavenly Father’s children, we do it unto Him.

talks.author: Bruce D. Porter
talks.title: A Broken Heart and a Contrite Spirit
talks.synopsis: Those who have a broken heart and a contrite spirit are willing to do anything and everything that God asks of them.

talks.author: Erich W. Kopischke
talks.title: Preach My Gospel—the Unifying Tool between Members and Missionaries
talks.synopsis: Missionaries and members must … become one in our efforts to proclaim the gospel.

talks.author: Michael John U. Teh
talks.title: Out of Small Things
talks.synopsis: As disciples of the Lord Jesus Christ, we have a responsibility to care for and serve our brothers and sisters.

talks.author: Keith K. Hilbig
talks.title: Quench Not the Spirit Which Quickens the Inner Man
talks.synopsis: When we invite the Holy Ghost to fill our minds with light and knowledge, He “quickens” us, that is to say, enlightens and enlivens the inner man or woman.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: The Only True God and Jesus Christ Whom He Hath Sent
talks.synopsis: We declare it is self-evident from the scriptures that the Father, the Son, and the Holy Ghost are separate persons, three divine beings.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Scriptural Witnesses
talks.synopsis: Scriptures of the Restoration do not compete with the Bible; they complement the Bible.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: Raising the Bar
talks.synopsis: Be certain that you easily clear the minimum standards for service as a missionary and that you are continually raising the bar.

talks.author: Donald L. Hallstrom
talks.title: Do It Now
talks.synopsis: Now is the time to reconcile with God through the merciful process of change afforded us by the Redeemer.

talks.author: L. Whitney Clayton
talks.title: Blessed Are All the Pure in Heart
talks.synopsis: May God bless our genuine efforts to be pure of heart and mind, that “virtue [may] garnish [our] thoughts unceasingly.”

talks.author: Walter F. González
talks.title: Today Is the Time
talks.synopsis: What are we doing today to engraven in our souls the gospel principles that will uphold us in times of adversity?

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: God Helps the Faithful Priesthood Holder
talks.synopsis: The message may come in words to your mind or in a feeling or both. But it will … give you assurance and guidance in what you must do.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: A Royal Priesthood
talks.synopsis: Times may change, circumstances may alter, but the marks of a true holder of the priesthood of God remain constant.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Slow to Anger
talks.synopsis: May the Lord bless you and inspire you to walk without anger.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: O Remember, Remember
talks.synopsis: “O remember, remember,” Book of Mormon prophets often implored.1 My point is to urge you to find ways to recognize and remember God’s kindness.

talks.author: Quentin L. Cook
talks.title: Live by Faith and Not by Fear
talks.synopsis: When we choose to follow Christ in faith rather than choosing another path out of fear, we are blessed with a consequence that is consistent with our choice.

talks.author: Claudio R. M. Costa
talks.title: Don’t Leave for Tomorrow What You Can Do Today
talks.synopsis: Now is the time to perform our God-given duties concerning the family.

talks.author: Julie B. Beck
talks.title: Mothers Who Know
talks.synopsis: There is eternal influence and power in motherhood.

talks.author: Christoffel Golden
talks.title: Small and Simple Things
talks.synopsis: May we discover anew the divine power of daily prayer, the convincing influence of the Book of Mormon, and true devotion when partaking of the sacrament.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: Clean Hands and a Pure Heart
talks.synopsis: Our spiritual purpose is to overcome both sin and the desire to sin, both the taint and the tyranny of sin.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: The Stone Cut Out of the Mountain
talks.synopsis: The Lord is fulfilling His promise that His gospel shall be as the stone cut out of the mountain without hands.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: Personal Revelation: The Teachings and Examples of the Prophets
talks.synopsis: Personal revelation is the way we know for ourselves the most important truths of our existence.

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: Truth: The Foundation of Correct Decisions
talks.synopsis: A knowledge of truth is of little value unless we apply it in making correct decisions.

talks.author: Daniel K Judd
talks.title: Nourished by the Good Word of God
talks.synopsis: It is vital that we nourish those we teach and lead by focusing on the fundamental doctrines, principles, and applications emphasized in the scriptures and the words of our latter-day prophets.

talks.author: Octaviano Tenorio
talks.title: The Power of Godliness Is Manifested in the Temples of God
talks.synopsis: The power of godliness is manifested to all people who … make sacred covenants with our Heavenly Father.

talks.author: Claudio D. Zivic
talks.title: After All We Can Do
talks.synopsis: We, as members of the Church of Jesus Christ, have chosen not to be ordinary men and women.

talks.author: Douglas L. Callister
talks.title: Knowing That We Know
talks.synopsis: The testimony of others may initiate and nourish the desire for faith and testimony, but eventually every individual must find out for himself.

talks.author: Steven E. Snow
talks.title: Service
talks.synopsis: Look for ways to bless the lives of others through seemingly simple acts of service.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Good, Better, Best
talks.synopsis: We have to forego some good things in order to choose others that are better or best because they develop faith in the Lord Jesus Christ and strengthen our families.

talks.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
talks.title: Closing Remarks
talks.synopsis: We have been inspired and lifted to a higher appreciation of this wonderful gospel.

talks.author: Julie B. Beck
talks.title: What Latter-day Saint Women Do Best: Stand Strong and Immovable
talks.synopsis: We must stand strong and immovable in faith, strong and immovable in family, and strong and immovable in relief.

talks.author: Silvia H. Allred
talks.title: Feed My Sheep
talks.synopsis: Through our regular monthly visits to our sisters, we can create bonds of love, friendship, and trust.

talks.author: Barbara Thompson
talks.title: I Will Strengthen Thee; I Will Help Thee
talks.synopsis: The greatest help we will have in strengthening families is to know and follow the doctrines of Christ.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Three Goals to Guide You
talks.synopsis: Your influence ranges far beyond yourself and your home and touches others all around the globe.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Salvation and Exaltation
talks.synopsis: In God’s eternal plan, salvation is an individual matter; exaltation is a family matter.

talks.author: Ronald A. Rasband
talks.title: Special Experiences
talks.synopsis: Our personal journey through life provides us with many special experiences that become building blocks of faith and testimony.

talks.author: Cheryl C. Lant
talks.title: Righteous Traditions
talks.synopsis: Are the traditions that we are creating in our families going to make it easier for our children to follow the living prophets?

talks.author: Kenneth Johnson
talks.title: Restoring Faith in the Family
talks.synopsis: Stable families provide the fabric that holds society together, benefiting all mankind.

talks.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
talks.title: Concern for the One
talks.synopsis: Jesus Christ is our greatest example. He was surrounded by multitudes and spoke to thousands, yet He always had concern for the one.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: The True and Living Church
talks.synopsis: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints is true, and it lives on.

talks.author: Robert W. Cantwell
talks.title: Church Auditing Department Report, 2007
talks.synopsis: To the First Presidency of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Testimony
talks.synopsis: Knowledge encourages obedience, and obedience enhances knowledge.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: Gaining a Testimony of God the Father; His Son, Jesus Christ; and the Holy Ghost
talks.synopsis: What has been told to me … can be told to you by the Holy Spirit … according to your obedience and desires.

talks.author: Gerald N. Lund
talks.title: Opening Our Hearts
talks.synopsis: Let us make it a part of our everyday striving to open our hearts to the Spirit.

talks.author: Carlos H. Amado
talks.title: Service, a Divine Quality
talks.synopsis: Those who serve will strive to ennoble, build, and lift their fellowmen.

talks.author: William R. Walker
talks.title: Three Presiding High Priests
talks.synopsis: Wisdom and strength will come to us as we look to the First Presidency as our ideal and our pattern of leadership.

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: To Heal the Shattering Consequences of Abuse
talks.synopsis: The power of healing is inherent in the Atonement of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: The Gospel of Jesus Christ
talks.synopsis: The gospel teaches us all we need to know to return to live with our Father in Heaven.

talks.author: Quentin L. Cook
talks.title: Give Heed unto the Prophets’ Words
talks.synopsis: As the priesthood holders of the Church, it is our solemn responsibility to follow our prophet.

talks.author: H. David Burton
talks.title: And Who Is My Neighbor?
talks.synopsis: We express our deep appreciation to the many individuals … who are the good Samaritans of today.

talks.author: Dean R. Burgess
talks.title: Do You Know Who You Are?
talks.synopsis: Knowing who you are makes you spiritually strong, sound, and steadfast in your priesthood duties.

talks.author: John M. Madsen
talks.title: A 12-Year-Old Deacon
talks.synopsis: Each one of us, as sons of God, can fulfill our mission and destiny.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: A Matter of a Few Degrees
talks.synopsis: The difference between happiness and misery … often comes down to an error of only a few degrees.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Faith and the Oath and Covenant of the Priesthood
talks.synopsis: Go forward in faith in keeping your covenants with God and so claim the promise He has made to you with an oath.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Examples of Righteousness
talks.synopsis: It is our duty to live our lives in such a way that we may be examples of righteousness.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Faith of Our Father
talks.synopsis: True religion should not originate from what pleases men or the traditions of ancestors, but rather from what pleases God, our Eternal Father.

talks.author: D. Todd Christofferson
talks.title: Born Again
talks.synopsis: Spiritual rebirth originates with faith in Jesus Christ, by whose grace we are changed.

talks.author: Sheldon F. Child
talks.title: The Best Investment
talks.synopsis: If you always pay an honest tithing, the Lord will bless you. It will be the best investment you will ever make.

talks.author: Susan W. Tanner
talks.title: My Soul Delighteth in the Things of the Lord
talks.synopsis: Delight in the things of the Lord … will “lift” our hearts and give us cause to “rejoice.”

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: The Twelve
talks.synopsis: For the Church to be His Church, there must be a Quorum of the Twelve who hold the keys.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Looking Back and Moving Forward
talks.synopsis: Together we shall move forward doing His work.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: “My Words … Never Cease”
talks.synopsis: We invite all to inquire into the wonder of what God has said since biblical times and is saying even now.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: Ask in Faith
talks.synopsis: Meaningful prayer requires both holy communication and consecrated work.

talks.author: W. Craig Zwick
talks.title: We Will Not Yield, We Cannot Yield
talks.synopsis: Live by your standards. Stand up for what you believe in.

talks.author: Robert R. Steuer
talks.title: The Power of Light and Truth
talks.synopsis: For us to prosper in these times, spiritual light must burn within us.

talks.author: Dennis B. Neuenschwander
talks.title: One among the Crowd
talks.synopsis: Let us quietly and resolutely press forward to the Savior, having faith that He cares about us and has the power to heal and save us.

talks.author: Lance B. Wickman
talks.title: Today
talks.synopsis: Provided we have so lived Today that we have claim on the Atonement’s cleansing grace, we will live forever with God.

talks.author: Craig C. Christensen
talks.title: A Book with a Promise
talks.synopsis: I pray that we will continue to use the Book of Mormon: Another Testament of Jesus Christ to share the gospel message with family and friends.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: Daughters of God
talks.synopsis: There is no role in life more essential and more eternal than that of motherhood.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Abundantly Blessed
talks.synopsis: Our testimonies have been strengthened. I believe we are all the more determined to live the principles of the gospel of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Susan W. Tanner
talks.title: Stand as a Witness
talks.synopsis: You … can stand as a witness of God by nurturing a spirit of faith, love, peace, and testimony in your homes now.

talks.author: Elaine S. Dalton
talks.title: At All Times, in All Things, and in All Places
talks.synopsis: As you stand as a witness, obey the commandments, and press forward with “a steadfastness in Christ,” you will never be alone.

talks.author: Mary N. Cook
talks.title: Anchors of Testimony
talks.synopsis: Strengthen your faith by following this pattern of prayer, study, and obedience to the commandments.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Walk in the Light
talks.synopsis: You make choices every day and almost every hour that keep you walking in the light or moving away toward darkness.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Welcome to Conference
talks.synopsis: Our Heavenly Father is mindful of each one of us and our needs. May we be filled with His Spirit as we partake of the proceedings of this … conference.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: Let Him Do It with Simplicity
talks.synopsis: In our search to obtain relief from the stresses of life, may we earnestly seek ways to simplify our lives.

talks.author: Silvia H. Allred
talks.title: Go Ye Therefore
talks.synopsis: We can all participate in missionary work. This is the Lord’s work, and He will help us do it.

talks.author: Neil L. Andersen
talks.title: You Know Enough
talks.synopsis: As disciples of the Lord Jesus Christ, we have enormous spiritual reservoirs of light and truth available to us. … In our days of difficulty, we choose the road of faith.

talks.author: Marcos A. Aidukaitis
talks.title: Because My Father Read the Book of Mormon
talks.synopsis: I invite all who hear me today to read the Book of Mormon and to apply the promise it contains. Those who do will know that the book is true.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Sacrament Meeting and the Sacrament
talks.synopsis: The ordinance of the sacrament makes the sacrament meeting the most sacred and important meeting in the Church.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: The Infinite Power of Hope
talks.synopsis: Hope in God, His goodness, and His power refreshes us with courage during difficult challenges.

talks.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
talks.title: Come What May, and Love It
talks.synopsis: The way we react to adversity can be a major factor in how happy and successful we can be in life.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: The Ministry of Angels
talks.synopsis: God never leaves us alone, never leaves us unaided in the challenges that we face.

talks.author: Gérald Caussé
talks.title: Even a Child Can Understand
talks.synopsis: God … has ensured that the truths regarding God are understandable to all His children, whatever their level of education or intellectual faculty.

talks.author: Lawrence E. Corbridge
talks.title: The Way
talks.synopsis: There is only one way to happiness and fulfillment. Jesus Christ is the Way.

talks.author: D. Todd Christofferson
talks.title: Come to Zion
talks.synopsis: In our families and in our stakes and districts, let us seek to build up Zion through unity, godliness, and charity.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: Pray Always
talks.synopsis: Prayer becomes more meaningful as we counsel with the Lord in all of our doings, as we express heartfelt gratitude, and as we pray for others.

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: Honor the Priesthood and Use It Well
talks.synopsis: The perfect role model for use of the holy priesthood is our Savior, Jesus Christ. He ministered with love, compassion, and charity.

talks.author: Jay E. Jensen
talks.title: Arms of Safety
talks.synopsis: By coming humbly and fully repentant to sacrament meeting and worthily partaking of the sacrament, we may feel those arms [of safety] again and again.

talks.author: James J. Hamula
talks.title: Winning the War against Evil
talks.synopsis: You were entrusted to come to the earth in these last days to do again what you did before—to once again choose good over evil.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Lift Where You Stand
talks.synopsis: Every priesthood holder stands at a unique place and has an important task that only he can perform.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: O Ye That Embark
talks.synopsis: Our power to carry burdens can be increased more than enough to compensate for the increased service we will be asked to give.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: To Learn, to Do, to Be
talks.synopsis: May we learn what we should learn, do what we should do, and be what we should be.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Our Hearts Knit as One
talks.synopsis: The Saints can accomplish any purpose of the Lord when fully united in righteousness.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: Christian Courage: The Price of Discipleship
talks.synopsis: Answering our accusers in the Savior’s way.

talks.author: Keith B. McMullin
talks.title: God Loves and Helps All of His Children
talks.synopsis: We need Heavenly Father’s help. Important sources of this help come through man’s service to his fellowman, through prayer, and through focus on Christ.

talks.author: Elaine S. Dalton
talks.title: A Return to Virtue
talks.synopsis: Now is the time for each of us to arise and unfurl a banner to the world calling for a return to virtue.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: The Truth of God Shall Go Forth
talks.synopsis: This is God’s work, and God’s work will not be frustrated. But there is still much to be done.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Finding Joy in the Journey
talks.synopsis: Let us relish life as we live it, find joy in the journey, and share our love with friends and family.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: The Test
talks.synopsis: Neither mobbings nor the army could turn the Saints aside from what they knew to be true.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Celestial Marriage
talks.synopsis: [The] proclamation on the family helps us realize that celestial marriage brings greater possibilities for happiness than does any other relationship.

talks.author: William D. Oswald
talks.title: Gospel Teaching—Our Most Important Calling
talks.synopsis: When we learn a few fundamental principles about teaching and are shown how to teach, all of us can do it.

talks.author: Eduardo Gavarret
talks.title: Returning Home
talks.synopsis: What a tremendous impact we can make in the lives of so many … when we accept the Savior’s invitation to feed His sheep.

talks.author: Carlos A. Godoy
talks.title: Testimony as a Process
talks.synopsis: To receive the witness of the “still small voice” sometimes can have a stronger impact on our testimonies than the visit of an angel.

talks.author: Quentin L. Cook
talks.title: “Hope Ya Know, We Had a Hard Time”
talks.synopsis: We know from the scriptures that some trials are for our good and are suited for our own personal development.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Until We Meet Again
talks.synopsis: May we be good citizens of the nations in which we live and good neighbors in our communities, reaching out to those of other faiths, as well as to our own.

talks.author: Julie B. Beck
talks.title: Fulfilling the Purpose of Relief Society
talks.synopsis: Relief Society was established by the Lord to organize, teach, and inspire His daughters to prepare for the blessings of eternal life.

talks.author: Silvia H. Allred
talks.title: Holy Temples, Sacred Covenants
talks.synopsis: The temples are sacred, holy places. They are a source of spiritual power and strength. They are a place of revelation.

talks.author: Barbara Thompson
talks.title: Now Let Us Rejoice
talks.synopsis: Participation in Relief Society is part of our glorious heritage and blessing as women in the Lord’s Church.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Happiness, Your Heritage
talks.synopsis: Our birthright—and the purpose of our great voyage on this earth—is to seek and experience eternal happiness.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Welcome to Conference
talks.synopsis: My brothers and sisters, I am pleased to report that the Church is doing very well. The work of the Lord continues to move forward uninterrupted.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: Becoming Provident Providers Temporally and Spiritually
talks.synopsis: When we live providently, we can provide for ourselves and our families and also follow the Savior’s example to serve and bless others.

talks.author: Margaret S. Lifferth
talks.title: Respect and Reverence
talks.synopsis: We must … cultivate in our homes and classrooms respect for each other and reverence for God.

talks.author: Michael A. Neider
talks.title: Revealed Quorum Principles
talks.synopsis: Let us go forward in faith, confidence, and virtue, serving with Christ to help save our families and all of our Heavenly Father’s children.

talks.author: Allan F. Packer
talks.title: Finding Strength in Challenging Times!
talks.synopsis: Having the capacity to receive personal inspiration will be necessary in the coming days.

talks.author: D. Todd Christofferson
talks.title: The Power of Covenants
talks.synopsis: In times of distress, let your covenants be paramount and let your obedience be exact.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Adversity
talks.synopsis: I bear you my testimony that God the Father lives. He set a course for each of us that can polish and perfect us to be with Him.

talks.author: Robert W. Cantwell
talks.title: Church Auditing Department Report, 2008
talks.synopsis: To the First Presidency of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: Learning the Lessons of the Past
talks.synopsis: Learning the lessons of the past allows you to build personal testimony on a solid bedrock of obedience, faith, and the witness of the Spirit.

talks.author: Quentin L. Cook
talks.title: Our Father’s Plan—Big Enough for All His Children
talks.synopsis: Even though our journey may be fraught with tribulation, the destination is truly glorious.

talks.author: Kevin W. Pearson
talks.title: Faith in the Lord Jesus Christ
talks.synopsis: In a household of faith, there is no need to fear or doubt. Choose to live by faith and not fear.

talks.author: Rafael E. Pino
talks.title: Faith in Adversity
talks.synopsis: Living the gospel … means that we will be prepared to face and endure adversity more confidently.

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: Temple Worship: The Source of Strength and Power in Times of Need
talks.synopsis: When we keep the temple covenants we have made and when we live righteously…, we have no reason to worry or to feel despondent.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Lessons from the Lord’s Prayers
talks.synopsis: Our prayers follow patterns and teachings of the Lord Jesus Christ. He taught us how to pray.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: Counsel to Young Men
talks.synopsis: The certainties of the gospel, the truth, once you understand it, will see you through these difficult times.

talks.author: Richard C. Edgley
talks.title: This Is Your Phone Call
talks.synopsis: We now call upon you to mobilize our priesthood quorums in response to the employment and financial challenges facing our members.

talks.author: Claudio R. M. Costa
talks.title: Priesthood Responsibilities
talks.synopsis: As priesthood holders, we can be a powerful influence in the lives of others.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: We Are Doing a Great Work and Cannot Come Down
talks.synopsis: We cannot and we must not allow ourselves to get distracted from our sacred duty. We cannot and we must not lose focus on the things that matter most.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: “Man Down!”
talks.synopsis: A feeling of responsibility for others is at the heart of faithful priesthood service.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Be Your Best Self
talks.synopsis: Each must strive to learn his duty and then to do it to the best of his ability.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: The Way of the Disciple
talks.synopsis: Now is the time to embrace the gospel of Jesus Christ, become His disciples, and walk in His way.

talks.author: Neil L. Andersen
talks.title: Come unto Him
talks.synopsis: I do know with perfect and certain clarity through the power of the Holy Ghost that Jesus is the Christ, the Beloved Son of God.

talks.author: Steven E. Snow
talks.title: Get On with Our Lives
talks.synopsis: By listening to the prophets, keeping an eternal perspective, having faith, and being of good cheer, we can face life’s unexpected challenges.

talks.author: Barbara Thompson
talks.title: His Arm Is Sufficient
talks.synopsis: We seek to increase in faith and personal righteousness, strengthen our families and homes, and serve the Lord and His children.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: None Were with Him
talks.synopsis: Trumpeted from the summit of Calvary is the truth that we will never be left alone nor unaided, even if sometimes we may feel that we are.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Be of Good Cheer
talks.synopsis: Be of good cheer. The future is as bright as your faith.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Unselfish Service
talks.synopsis: Our Savior teaches us to follow Him by making the sacrifices necessary to lose ourselves in unselfish service to others.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: Honorably Hold a Name and Standing
talks.synopsis: The fire of the covenant will burn in the heart of every faithful member of this Church who shall worship and honorably hold a name and standing in the Lord’s holy house.

talks.author: Gary E. Stevenson
talks.title: Sacred Homes, Sacred Temples
talks.synopsis: Understanding the eternal nature of the temple will draw you to your family; understanding the eternal nature of the family will draw you to the temple.

talks.author: José A. Teixeira
talks.title: Gifts to Help Us Navigate Our Life
talks.synopsis: We are not left alone. God has given us the necessary gifts to help us in our mortal experience.

talks.author: F. Michael Watson
talks.title: His Servants, the Prophets
talks.synopsis: The Master speaks to us through His prophet.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: “Bring Souls unto Me”
talks.synopsis: Missionaries will continue to do the best they can, but wouldn’t it be better if you and I stepped up to do a job that is rightfully ours?

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Until We Meet Again
talks.synopsis: May we long remember that which we have heard during this conference. … I urge you to study the messages and to ponder their teachings and then to apply them in your life.

talks.author: Ann M. Dibb
talks.title: Be Thou an Example of the Believers
talks.synopsis: The small and simple things you choose to do today will be magnified into great and glorious blessings tomorrow.

talks.author: Mary N. Cook
talks.title: A Virtuous Life—Step by Step
talks.synopsis: Youth is a defining time in which you can develop patterns of virtue that will help you take necessary steps toward eternal life.

talks.author: Elaine S. Dalton
talks.title: Come Let Us Go Up to the Mountain of the Lord
talks.synopsis: Your personal virtue will … enable you to make the decisions that will help you be worthy to enter the temple.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: May You Have Courage
talks.synopsis: My earnest prayer is that you will have the courage required to refrain from judging others, the courage to be chaste and virtuous, and the courage to stand firm for truth and righteousness.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Welcome to Conference
talks.synopsis: We desire that as many members as possible have an opportunity to attend the temple without having to travel inordinate distances.

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: To Acquire Spiritual Guidance
talks.synopsis: By careful practice, through the application of correct principles, and by being sensitive to the feelings that come, you will gain spiritual guidance.

talks.author: Vicki F. Matsumori
talks.title: Helping Others Recognize the Whisperings of the Spirit
talks.synopsis: We can help others become more familiar with the promptings of the Spirit when we share our testimony of the influence of the Holy Ghost in our lives.

talks.author: L. Whitney Clayton
talks.title: That Your Burdens May Be Light
talks.synopsis: Burdens provide opportunities to practice virtues that contribute to eventual perfection.

talks.author: Russell T. Osguthorpe
talks.title: Teaching Helps Save Lives
talks.synopsis: We teach key doctrine, invite learners to do the work God has for them, and then promise that blessings will surely come.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: More Diligent and Concerned at Home
talks.synopsis: We can become more diligent and concerned at home as we are more faithful in learning, living, and loving the restored gospel of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: The Love of God
talks.synopsis: Love is the measure of our faith, the inspiration for our obedience, and the true altitude of our discipleship.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Love and Law
talks.synopsis: The love of God does not supersede His laws and His commandments, and the effect of God’s laws and commandments does not diminish the purpose and effect of His love.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: Seeking to Know God, Our Heavenly Father, and His Son, Jesus Christ
talks.synopsis: The light of belief is within you, waiting to be awakened and intensified by the Spirit of God.

talks.author: Jorge F. Zeballos
talks.title: Attempting the Impossible
talks.synopsis: Eternal life is to live with our Father and with our families forevermore. Should not this promise be the greatest incentive to do the best within our reach?

talks.author: Tad R. Callister
talks.title: Joseph Smith—Prophet of the Restoration
talks.synopsis: Through Joseph Smith have been restored all the powers, keys, teachings, and ordinances necessary for salvation and exaltation.

talks.author: Kent D. Watson
talks.title: Being Temperate in All Things
talks.synopsis: Learning to be temperate in all things is a spiritual gift available through the Holy Ghost.

talks.author: Neil L. Andersen
talks.title: “Repent … That I May Heal You”
talks.synopsis: The invitation to repent is rarely a voice of chastisement but rather a loving appeal to turn around and to “re-turn” toward God.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: Prayer and Promptings
talks.synopsis: Experiences of prompting and prayer are not uncommon in the Church. They are part of the revelation our Heavenly Father has provided for us.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: Fathers and Sons: A Remarkable Relationship
talks.synopsis: Fathers and sons can play a critical role in helping each other become the best that they can be.

talks.author: Walter F. González
talks.title: Becoming More Powerful Priesthood Holders
talks.synopsis: We can become more powerful in blessing the lives of our Heavenly Father’s sons and daughters, more powerful in serving others.

talks.author: Yoon Hwan Choi
talks.title: I Love Loud Boys
talks.synopsis: Let us love our boys—although some of them are loud boys. Let us teach them to change their lives.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Two Principles for Any Economy
talks.synopsis: It is often in the trial of adversity that we learn those most critical lessons that form our character and shape our destiny.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Be Ready
talks.synopsis: The preparation that counts will be made by the young men making choices to rise to their great destiny as priesthood servants for God.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: School Thy Feelings, O My Brother
talks.synopsis: If we desire to have a proper spirit with us at all times, we must choose to refrain from becoming angry.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Our Perfect Example
talks.synopsis: The message of the restored gospel of Jesus Christ is that we can and must expect to become better as long as we live.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: The Past Way of Facing the Future
talks.synopsis: The lessons of the past … prepare us to face the challenges of the future.

talks.author: H. David Burton
talks.title: Let Virtue Garnish Your Thoughts
talks.synopsis: We need to stand tall and be firmly fixed in perpetuating Christlike virtues.

talks.author: Ann M. Dibb
talks.title: Hold On
talks.synopsis: Heavenly Father has not left us alone during our mortal probation. He has already given us all the “safety equipment” we will need to successfully return to Him.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Ask, Seek, Knock
talks.synopsis: Every Latter-day Saint may merit personal revelation.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: What Have I Done for Someone Today?
talks.synopsis: The needs of others are ever present, and each of us can do something to help someone.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: Safety for the Soul
talks.synopsis: I want it absolutely clear when I stand before the judgment bar of God that I declared to the world … that the Book of Mormon is true.

talks.author: Quentin L. Cook
talks.title: Stewardship—a Sacred Trust
talks.synopsis: We serve our fellowmen because that is what we believe God wants us to do.

talks.author: Brent H. Nielson
talks.title: A Call to the Rising Generation
talks.synopsis: There is no greater call than teaching “all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost.”

talks.author: Dale G. Renlund
talks.title: Preserving the Heart’s Mighty Change
talks.synopsis: To endure to the end, we need to be eager to please God and worship Him with fervor.

talks.author: Michael T. Ringwood
talks.title: An Easiness and Willingness to Believe
talks.synopsis: The daily living of the gospel brings a softness of heart needed to have an easiness and willingness to believe the word of God.

talks.author: Joseph W. Sitati
talks.title: Blessings of the Gospel Available to All
talks.synopsis: God’s children on the earth today have the opportunity to understand His plan of happiness for them more fully than at any other time.

talks.author: D. Todd Christofferson
talks.title: Moral Discipline
talks.synopsis: Moral discipline is the consistent exercise of agency to choose the right because it is right, even when it is hard.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Closing Remarks
talks.synopsis: If we heed His words and live the commandments, we will survive this time of permissiveness and wickedness.

talks.author: Julie B. Beck
talks.title: Relief Society: A Sacred Work
talks.synopsis: Ours is a work of salvation, service, and becoming a holy people.

talks.author: Silvia H. Allred
talks.title: Every Woman Needs Relief Society
talks.synopsis: We want you to bless your life and home with the influence and power of Relief Society.

talks.author: Barbara Thompson
talks.title: Mind the Gap
talks.synopsis: Gaps can be reminders of ways in which we can improve or, if ignored, can be stumbling blocks in our lives.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: The Enduring Legacy of Relief Society
talks.synopsis: The history of Relief Society is recorded in words and numbers, but the heritage is passed heart to heart.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Welcome to Conference
talks.synopsis: Thank you, my brothers and sisters, for your faith and devotion to the gospel of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: The Power of the Priesthood
talks.synopsis: The priesthood does not have the strength that it should have and will not have until the power of the priesthood is firmly fixed in the families.

talks.author: Julie B. Beck
talks.title: “And upon the Handmaids in Those Days Will I Pour Out My Spirit”
talks.synopsis: We know we are successful if we live so that we qualify for, receive, and know how to follow the Spirit.

talks.author: Keith B. McMullin
talks.title: Our Path of Duty
talks.synopsis: Duty does not require perfection, but it does require diligence. It is not simply what is legal; it is what is virtuous.

talks.author: Wilford W. Andersen
talks.title: The Rock of Our Redeemer
talks.synopsis: I testify that those who keep His commandments will grow in faith and hope. They will be given strength to overcome all of life’s trials.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: Mothers and Daughters
talks.synopsis: In these last days it is essential—even critical—that parents and children listen to and learn from one another.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Help Them on Their Way Home
talks.synopsis: We help God’s children best by providing ways to build faith in Jesus Christ and His restored gospel when they are young.

talks.author: Robert W. Cantwell
talks.title: Church Auditing Department Report, 2009
talks.synopsis: To the First Presidency of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: Mothers Teaching Children in the Home
talks.synopsis: I believe it is by divine design that the role of motherhood emphasizes the nurturing and teaching of the next generation.

talks.author: D. Todd Christofferson
talks.title: The Blessing of Scripture
talks.synopsis: The central purpose of all scripture is to fill our souls with faith in God the Father and in His Son, Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Koichi Aoyagi
talks.title: Helping Hands, Saving Hands
talks.synopsis: May we follow the counsel and example of the prophet and each day seek out those in need.

talks.author: Bruce A. Carlson
talks.title: When the Lord Commands
talks.synopsis: Faithful obedience, regardless of the apparent size of the task, will bring the Lord’s guidance, assistance, and peace.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: Watching with All Perseverance
talks.synopsis: A spiritual early warning system … can help parents in Zion to be watchful and discerning concerning their children.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: Place No More for the Enemy of My Soul
talks.synopsis: May the joy of our fidelity to the highest and best within us be ours as we keep our love and our marriages, our society and our souls, as pure as they were meant to be.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Healing the Sick
talks.synopsis: We have this priesthood power, and we should all be prepared to use it properly.

talks.author: Ronald A. Rasband
talks.title: The Divine Call of a Missionary
talks.synopsis: The Lord needs every able young man to prepare and recommit, starting tonight, to be worthy of a call from the prophet of God to serve a mission.

talks.author: David L. Beck
talks.title: The Magnificent Aaronic Priesthood
talks.synopsis: There is an urgency for you to fulfill your duty to God. I am confident that you will.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Continue in Patience
talks.synopsis: The lessons we learn from patience will cultivate our character, lift our lives, and heighten our happiness.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Act in All Diligence
talks.synopsis: We are to learn our duty from the Lord, and then we are to act in all diligence, never being lazy or slothful.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Preparation Brings Blessings
talks.synopsis: Let us consider our callings, let us reflect on our responsibilities, and let us follow Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: “You Are My Hands”
talks.synopsis: As disciples of Jesus Christ, our Master, we are called to support and heal rather than condemn.

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: He Lives! All Glory to His Name!
talks.synopsis: Our understanding of and faith in the Atonement of Jesus Christ will provide strength and capacity needed for a successful life.

talks.author: Donald L. Hallstrom
talks.title: Turn to the Lord
talks.synopsis: Never let an earthly circumstance disable you spiritually.

talks.author: Cheryl C. Lant
talks.title: That Our Children Might See the Face of the Savior
talks.synopsis: It is our sacred responsibility as parents and leaders of this rising generation of children to bring them to the Savior.

talks.author: Quentin L. Cook
talks.title: We Follow Jesus Christ
talks.synopsis: We rejoice in all the Savior has done for us. He has made it possible for each of us to gain our salvation and exaltation.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: He Is Risen!
talks.synopsis: The empty tomb that first Easter morning was the answer to Job’s question, “If a man die, shall he live again?”

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Generations Linked in Love
talks.synopsis: Our inborn yearnings for family connections are fulfilled when we are linked to our ancestors through sacred ordinances of the temple.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: Our Duty to God: The Mission of Parents and Leaders to the Rising Generation
talks.synopsis: It is our imperative duty to help youth understand and believe the gospel in a deeply personal way.

talks.author: Bradley D. Foster
talks.title: Mother Told Me
talks.synopsis: Perhaps the reason we respond so universally to our mothers’ love is because it typifies the love of our Savior.

talks.author: James B. Martino
talks.title: All Things Work Together for Good
talks.synopsis: We may never know in this life why we face what we do, but we can feel confident that we can grow from the experience.

talks.author: Gregory A. Schwitzer
talks.title: Developing Good Judgment and Not Judging Others
talks.synopsis: Good judgment is needed not only in understanding people but also in facing decisions that often lead us to or away from our Heavenly Father.

talks.author: Francisco J. Viñas
talks.title: Things Pertaining to Righteousness
talks.synopsis: As parents and leaders we need to watch over our members and families, helping them to stay away from those things that could lead them to a spiritual death.

talks.author: Neil L. Andersen
talks.title: Tell Me the Stories of Jesus
talks.synopsis: A stronger personal faith in Jesus Christ will prepare [your children] for the challenges they will most surely face.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: A Word at Closing
talks.synopsis: The lighthouse of the Lord sends forth signals readily recognized and never failing.

talks.author: Ann M. Dibb
talks.title: Be of a Good Courage
talks.synopsis: [The] guides from the book of Joshua will combine to provide the most powerful source of courage and strength there is: faith in our Heavenly Father and in His Son, Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Mary N. Cook
talks.title: Never, Never, Never Give Up!
talks.synopsis: What does the Lord want you to do? He wants you to be a valiant and virtuous daughter of God, dedicated to living each day so that you can be worthy to receive the blessings of the temple.

talks.author: Elaine S. Dalton
talks.title: Remember Who You Are!
talks.synopsis: There is no more beautiful sight than a young woman who glows with the light of the Spirit, who is confident and courageous because she is virtuous.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Your Happily Ever After
talks.synopsis: Heavenly Father offers to you the greatest gift of all—eternal life—and the opportunity and infinite blessing of your own “happily ever after.”

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: As We Meet Together Again
talks.synopsis: Missionary service is a priesthood duty—an obligation the Lord expects of us who have been given so very much.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: Because of Your Faith
talks.synopsis: My thanks to all you wonderful members of the Church … for proving every day of your life that the pure love of Christ “never faileth.”

talks.author: Rosemary M. Wixom
talks.title: Stay on the Path
talks.synopsis: As we hold on to our children and follow the Savior’s lead, we will all return to our heavenly home and be safe in our Heavenly Father’s arms.

talks.author: Claudio R. M. Costa
talks.title: Obedience to the Prophets
talks.synopsis: What a great blessing it is to have prophets in our day!

talks.author: David M. McConkie
talks.title: Gospel Learning and Teaching
talks.synopsis: What matters most is the attitude or spirit by which the teacher teaches.

talks.author: D. Todd Christofferson
talks.title: Reflections on a Consecrated Life
talks.synopsis: True success in this life comes in consecrating our lives—that is, our time and choices—to God’s purposes.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Of Things That Matter Most
talks.synopsis: If life and its rushed pace and many stresses have made it difficult for you to feel like rejoicing, then perhaps now is a good time to refocus on what matters most.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: Agency: Essential to the Plan of Life
talks.synopsis: Whenever we choose to come unto Christ, take His name upon us, and follow His servants, we progress along the path to eternal life.

talks.author: Quentin L. Cook
talks.title: Let There Be Light!
talks.synopsis: In our increasingly unrighteous world, it is essential that values based on religious belief be part of the public discourse.

talks.author: Richard C. Edgley
talks.title: Faith—the Choice Is Yours
talks.synopsis: Choose faith over doubt, choose faith over fear, choose faith over the unknown and the unseen, and choose faith over pessimism.

talks.author: Kevin R. Duncan
talks.title: Our Very Survival
talks.synopsis: May we have the wisdom to trust in and follow the counsel of the living prophets and apostles.

talks.author: Gerrit W. Gong
talks.title: Temple Mirrors of Eternity: A Testimony of Family
talks.synopsis: An eternal perspective of gospel conversion and temple covenants can help us see rich blessings in each generation of our forever families.

talks.author: Neil L. Andersen
talks.title: Never Leave Him
talks.synopsis: As you choose not to be offended or ashamed, you will feel His love and approval. You will know that you are becoming more like Him.

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: The Transforming Power of Faith and Character
talks.synopsis: A consistent, righteous life produces an inner power and strength that can be permanently resistant to the eroding influence of sin and transgression.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Be Thou an Example of the Believers
talks.synopsis: Whether full-time missionaries or members, we should all be good examples of the believers in Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Patrick Kearon
talks.title: “Come unto Me with Full Purpose of Heart, and I Shall Heal You”
talks.synopsis: Our Savior is the Prince of Peace, the Great Healer, the only One who can truly cleanse us from the sting of sin.

talks.author: Juan A. Uceda
talks.title: He Teaches Us to Put Off the Natural Man
talks.synopsis: I bear witness of the reality and power of the Savior’s Atonement to cleanse, purify, and make us and our homes holy.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Pride and the Priesthood
talks.synopsis: Pride is a switch that turns off priesthood power. Humility is a switch that turns it on.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Serve with the Spirit
talks.synopsis: Let us do whatever is required to qualify for the Holy Ghost as our companion.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: The Three Rs of Choice
talks.synopsis: Each of us has come to this earth with all the tools necessary to make correct choices.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Trust in God, Then Go and Do
talks.synopsis: You show your trust in Him when you listen with the intent to learn and repent and then you go and do whatever He asks.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: Cleansing the Inner Vessel
talks.synopsis: Nowhere are the generosity and the kindness and mercy of God more manifest than in repentance.

talks.author: Jay E. Jensen
talks.title: The Holy Ghost and Revelation
talks.synopsis: The Holy Ghost is the third member of the Godhead, and with the Father and the Son, He knows all things.

talks.author: Mary N. Cook
talks.title: Be an Example of the Believers
talks.synopsis: I would like to invite you to “be … an example of the believers … in faith [and] in purity.”

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Two Lines of Communication
talks.synopsis: We must use both the personal line and the priesthood line in proper balance to achieve the growth that is the purpose of mortal life.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: The Divine Gift of Gratitude
talks.synopsis: A grateful heart … comes through expressing gratitude to our Heavenly Father for His blessings and to those around us for all that they bring into our lives.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: The Priesthood of Aaron
talks.synopsis: The priesthood you bear is a special gift, for the giver is the Lord Himself. Use it, magnify it, and live worthy of it.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: Receive the Holy Ghost
talks.synopsis: These four words—“Receive the Holy Ghost”—are not a passive pronouncement; rather, they constitute a priesthood injunction—an authoritative admonition to act and not simply to be acted upon.

talks.author: Larry R. Lawrence
talks.title: Courageous Parenting
talks.synopsis: What the world really needs is courageous parenting from mothers and fathers who are not afraid to speak up and take a stand.

talks.author: Per G. Malm
talks.title: Rest unto Your Souls
talks.synopsis: To find rest unto our souls includes peace of mind and heart, which is the result of learning and following the doctrine of Christ.

talks.author: Jairo Mazzagardi
talks.title: Avoiding the Trap of Sin
talks.synopsis: Stay strong and make good choices that will allow you to eat the fruit of the tree of life.

talks.author: Mervyn B. Arnold
talks.title: What Have You Done with My Name?
talks.synopsis: Someday each one of us will have to account to our Savior, Jesus Christ, for what we have done with His name.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: O That Cunning Plan of the Evil One
talks.synopsis: There is hope for the addicted, and this hope comes through the Atonement of the Lord Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Till We Meet Again
talks.synopsis: Endure to the end we must, for our goal is eternal life in the presence of our Father in Heaven.

talks.author: Julie B. Beck
talks.title: Daughters in My Kingdom: The History and Work of Relief Society
talks.synopsis: Studying the history of Relief Society gives definition and expression to who we are as disciples and followers of our Savior, Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Silvia H. Allred
talks.title: Steadfast and Immovable
talks.synopsis: If we are faithful and endure to the end, we will receive all of Heavenly Father’s blessings, even eternal life and exaltation.

talks.author: Barbara Thompson
talks.title: And of Some Have Compassion, Making a Difference
talks.synopsis: The beauty of visiting teaching is seeing lives changed, tears wiped away, testimonies growing, people loved, families strengthened.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Charity Never Faileth
talks.synopsis: Rather than being judgmental and critical of each other, may we have the pure love of Christ for our fellow travelers in this journey through life.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: It’s Conference Once Again
talks.synopsis: Thank you for your faith and devotion to the gospel, for the love and care you show to one another, and for the service you provide.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: The Sabbath and the Sacrament
talks.synopsis: Let your family be filled with love as you honor the Sabbath all day long and experience its spiritual blessings throughout the week.

talks.author: Jean A. Stevens
talks.title: Become as a Little Child
talks.synopsis: If we have a heart to learn and a willingness to follow the example of children, their divine attributes can hold a key to unlocking our own spiritual growth.

talks.author: Walter F. González
talks.title: Followers of Christ
talks.synopsis: Followers of Christ pattern their lives after the Savior to walk in the light.

talks.author: Kent F. Richards
talks.title: The Atonement Covers All Pain
talks.synopsis: Our great personal challenge in mortality is to become “a saint through the atonement of Christ.”

talks.author: Quentin L. Cook
talks.title: LDS Women Are Incredible!
talks.synopsis: Much of what we accomplish in the Church is due to the selfless service of women.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Opportunities to Do Good
talks.synopsis: The Lord’s way to help those in temporal need requires people who out of love have consecrated themselves and what they have to God and to His work.

talks.author: Robert W. Cantwell
talks.title: Church Auditing Department Report, 2010
talks.synopsis: To the First Presidency of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: Guided by the Holy Spirit
talks.synopsis: Every one of us can be guided by the spirit of revelation and the gift of the Holy Ghost.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Face the Future with Faith
talks.synopsis: Truth, covenants, and ordinances enable us to overcome fear and face the future with faith!

talks.author: Richard J. Maynes
talks.title: Establishing a Christ-Centered Home
talks.synopsis: We understand and believe in the eternal nature of the family. This understanding and belief should inspire us to do everything in our power to establish a Christ-centered home.

talks.author: Cecil O. Samuelson Jr.
talks.title: Testimony
talks.synopsis: The fundamentals of gaining and retaining a testimony of the gospel of Jesus Christ are straightforward, clear, and within the capacity of every person.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Desire
talks.synopsis: To achieve our eternal destiny, we will desire and work for the qualities required to become an eternal being.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: Finding Joy through Loving Service
talks.synopsis: May we show our love and appreciation for the Savior’s atoning sacrifice through our simple, compassionate acts of service.

talks.author: Neil L. Andersen
talks.title: Preparing the World for the Second Coming
talks.synopsis: Your mission will be a sacred opportunity to bring others to Christ and help prepare for the Second Coming of the Savior.

talks.author: Steven E. Snow
talks.title: Hope
talks.synopsis: Our hope in the Atonement empowers us with eternal perspective.

talks.author: Larry M. Gibson
talks.title: Sacred Keys of the Aaronic Priesthood
talks.synopsis: The Lord wants every Aaronic Priesthood holder to invite all to come unto Christ—beginning with his own family.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Your Potential, Your Privilege
talks.synopsis: As you read the scriptures and listen to the words of the prophets with all your heart and mind, the Lord will tell you how to live up to your priesthood privileges.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Learning in the Priesthood
talks.synopsis: If you will be diligent and obedient in the priesthood, treasures of spiritual knowledge will be poured out upon you.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Priesthood Power
talks.synopsis: May we be worthy recipients of the divine power of the priesthood we bear. May it bless our lives and may we use it to bless the lives of others.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Waiting on the Road to Damascus
talks.synopsis: Those who diligently seek to learn of Christ eventually will come to know Him.

talks.author: Paul V. Johnson
talks.title: More Than Conquerors through Him That Loved Us
talks.synopsis: Trials are not just to test us. They are vitally important to the process of putting on the divine nature.

talks.author: H. David Burton
talks.title: The Sanctifying Work of Welfare
talks.synopsis: The work of caring for one another and being “kind to the poor” is a sanctifying work, commanded of the Father.

talks.author: Silvia H. Allred
talks.title: The Essence of Discipleship
talks.synopsis: When love becomes the guiding principle in our care for others, our service to them becomes the gospel in action.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: The Spirit of Revelation
talks.synopsis: The spirit of revelation is real—and can and does function in our individual lives and in the Church.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: The Holy Temple—a Beacon to the World
talks.synopsis: The all-important and crowning blessings of membership in the Church are those blessings which we receive in the temples of God.

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: The Eternal Blessings of Marriage
talks.synopsis: The temple sealing has greater meaning as life unfolds. It will help you draw ever closer together and find greater joy and fulfillment.

talks.author: D. Todd Christofferson
talks.title: “As Many as I Love, I Rebuke and Chasten”
talks.synopsis: The very experience of enduring chastening can refine us and prepare us for greater spiritual privileges.

talks.author: Carl B. Pratt
talks.title: The Lord’s Richest Blessings
talks.synopsis: As we pay our tithing faithfully, the Lord will open the windows of heaven and pour out upon us His richest blessings.

talks.author: Lynn G. Robbins
talks.title: What Manner of Men and Women Ought Ye to Be?
talks.synopsis: May your efforts to develop Christlike attributes be successful so that His image may be engraven in your countenance and His attributes manifest in your behavior.

talks.author: Benjamín De Hoyos
talks.title: Called to Be Saints
talks.synopsis: How blessed we are to have been brought into this fellowship of the Latter-day Saints!

talks.author: C. Scott Grow
talks.title: The Miracle of the Atonement
talks.synopsis: There is no sin or transgression, pain or sorrow, which is outside of the healing power of His Atonement.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: An Ensign to the Nations
talks.synopsis: If we teach by the Spirit and you listen by the Spirit, some one of us will touch on your circumstance.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: At Parting
talks.synopsis: None of us can conceive the full import of what Christ did for us in Gethsemane, but I am grateful every day of my life for His atoning sacrifice.

talks.author: Ann M. Dibb
talks.title: I Believe in Being Honest and True
