talks.synopsis: Being true to our beliefs—even when doing so isn’t popular, easy, or fun—keeps us safely on the path that leads to eternal life with our Heavenly Father.

talks.author: Mary N. Cook
talks.title: “Remember This: Kindness Begins with Me”
talks.synopsis: Benevolence can bring joy and unity to your home, your class, your ward, and your school.

talks.author: Elaine S. Dalton
talks.title: Guardians of Virtue
talks.synopsis: Prepare now so that you may qualify to receive all the blessings that await you in the Lord’s holy temples.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: A Living Testimony
talks.synopsis: Testimony requires the nurturing by the prayer of faith, the hungering for the word of God in the scriptures, and the obedience to the truth.

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: The Power of Scripture
talks.synopsis: Scriptures are like packets of light that illuminate our minds and give place to guidance and inspiration from on high.

talks.author: Barbara Thompson
talks.title: Personal Revelation and Testimony
talks.synopsis: If we diligently keep the commandments and ask in faith, answers will come in the Lord’s own way and in His time.

talks.author: L. Whitney Clayton
talks.title: The Time Shall Come
talks.synopsis: With you, I stand in awe as this work moves forward miraculously, marvelously, and irresistibly.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: As We Meet Again
talks.synopsis: It is my prayer that we may be filled with the Spirit of the Lord as we listen to the messages today and tomorrow and learn those things the Lord would have us know.

talks.author: José L. Alonso
talks.title: Doing the Right Thing at the Right Time, without Delay
talks.synopsis: The Savior … gave us a great example about not waiting to administer relief to those who have lost a sense of happiness and joy.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: Counsel to Youth
talks.synopsis: Despite the opposition, trials, and temptations, you need not fail or fear.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: You Matter to Him
talks.synopsis: The Lord uses a scale very different from the world’s to weigh the worth of a soul.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: The Hearts of the Children Shall Turn
talks.synopsis: I invite the young people of the Church to learn about and experience the Spirit of Elijah.

talks.author: Neil L. Andersen
talks.title: Children
talks.synopsis: I testify of the great blessing of children and of the happiness they will bring us in this life and in the eternities.

talks.author: Ian S. Ardern
talks.title: A Time to Prepare
talks.synopsis: We must devote our time to the things that matter most.

talks.author: Carl B. Cook
talks.title: It Is Better to Look Up
talks.synopsis: If we, like President Monson, exercise our faith and look to God for help, we will not be overwhelmed with the burdens of life.

talks.author: LeGrand R. Curtis Jr.
talks.title: Redemption
talks.synopsis: Through Christ, people can and do change their lives and obtain redemption.

talks.author: D. Todd Christofferson
talks.title: The Divine Gift of Repentance
talks.synopsis: Only through repentance do we gain access to the atoning grace of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: Perfect Love Casteth Out Fear
talks.synopsis: If you will respond to the invitation to share your beliefs and feelings about the restored gospel of Jesus Christ, a spirit of love and a spirit of courage will be your constant companion.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: We Are All Enlisted
talks.synopsis: From every man, young and old, who bears the priesthood, I ask for a stronger and more devoted voice, … a voice for good, a voice for the gospel, a voice for God.

talks.author: Keith B. McMullin
talks.title: The Power of the Aaronic Priesthood
talks.synopsis: You and the Aaronic Priesthood office you hold are essential to Heavenly Father’s work with His children and the preparation of this earth for the Second Coming.

talks.author: W. Christopher Waddell
talks.title: The Opportunity of a Lifetime
talks.synopsis: Through your devoted service and willing sacrifice, your mission will become holy ground to you.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Providing in the Lord’s Way
talks.synopsis: The welfare principles of the Church are not simply good ideas; they are revealed truths from God—they are His way of helping the needy.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Preparation in the Priesthood: “I Need Your Help”
talks.synopsis: Don’t worry about how inexperienced you are or think you are, but think about what, with the Lord’s help, you can become.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Dare to Stand Alone
talks.synopsis: May we ever be courageous and prepared to stand for what we believe.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: A Witness
talks.synopsis: The Book of Mormon is the best guide to learn how well we are doing and how to do better.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: Waiting upon the Lord: Thy Will Be Done
talks.synopsis: The purpose of our life on earth is to grow, develop, and be strengthened through our own experiences.

talks.author: Tad R. Callister
talks.title: The Book of Mormon—a Book from God
talks.synopsis: Together with the Bible, the Book of Mormon is an indispensable witness of the doctrines of Christ and His divinity.

talks.author: Elaine S. Dalton
talks.title: Love Her Mother
talks.synopsis: How can a father raise a happy, well-adjusted daughter in today’s increasingly toxic world? The answer has been taught by the Lord’s prophets.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: The Importance of a Name
talks.synopsis: Let us develop the habit … of making it clear that The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints is the name by which the Lord Himself has directed that we be known.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Stand in Holy Places
talks.synopsis: Communication with our Father in Heaven—including our prayers to Him and His inspiration to us—is necessary in order for us to weather the storms and trials of life.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Covenants
talks.synopsis: When we realize that we are children of the covenant, we know who we are and what God expects of us.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Teachings of Jesus
talks.synopsis: Jesus Christ is the Only Begotten and Beloved Son of God. … He is our Savior from sin and death. This is the most important knowledge on earth.

talks.author: Matthew O. Richardson
talks.title: Teaching after the Manner of the Spirit
talks.synopsis: While we are all teachers, we must fully realize that it is the Holy Ghost who is the real teacher and witness of all truth.

talks.author: Kazuhiko Yamashita
talks.title: Missionaries Are a Treasure of the Church
talks.synopsis: I am thankful that missionaries are called by the Lord, that they respond to that call, and that they are serving throughout the world.

talks.author: Randall K. Bennett
talks.title: Choose Eternal Life
talks.synopsis: Your eternal destiny will not be the result of chance but of choice. It is never too late to begin to choose eternal life!

talks.author: J. Devn Cornish
talks.title: The Privilege of Prayer
talks.synopsis: Prayer is one of the most precious gifts of God to man.

talks.author: Quentin L. Cook
talks.title: The Songs They Could Not Sing
talks.synopsis: While we do not know all the answers, we do know important principles that allow us to face tragedies with faith and confidence.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Until We Meet Again
talks.synopsis: May the spirit we have felt here be and abide with us as we go about those things which occupy us each day.

talks.author: Julie B. Beck
talks.title: What I Hope My Granddaughters (and Grandsons) Will Understand about Relief Society
talks.synopsis: From the day the gospel began to be restored in this dispensation, the Lord has needed faithful women to participate as His disciples.

talks.author: Silvia H. Allred
talks.title: Charity Never Faileth
talks.synopsis: Plead for a desire to be filled with the gift of charity, the pure love of Christ.

talks.author: Barbara Thompson
talks.title: Cleave unto the Covenants
talks.synopsis: As we have faith in Christ and cleave unto our covenants, we will receive the joy spoken of in the holy scriptures and promised by our latter-day prophets.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Forget Me Not
talks.synopsis: It is my prayer and blessing that you will never forget that you are truly precious daughters in God’s kingdom.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: As We Gather Once Again
talks.synopsis: Our Heavenly Father is mindful of each of us and our needs. May we be filled with His Spirit as we partake of the proceedings of this conference.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: And a Little Child Shall Lead Them
talks.synopsis: Husbands and wives should understand that their first calling—from which they will never be released—is to one another and then to their children.

talks.author: Cheryl A. Esplin
talks.title: Teaching Our Children to Understand
talks.synopsis: Teaching our children to understand is more than just imparting information. It’s helping our children get the doctrine into their hearts.

talks.author: Donald L. Hallstrom
talks.title: Converted to His Gospel through His Church
talks.synopsis: The purpose of the Church is to help us live the gospel.

talks.author: Paul E. Koelliker
talks.title: He Truly Loves Us
talks.synopsis: Because of the heaven-designed pattern of the family, we more fully understand how our Heavenly Father truly loves each of us equally and fully.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Sacrifice
talks.synopsis: Our lives of service and sacrifice are the most appropriate expressions of our commitment to serve the Master and our fellowmen.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Mountains to Climb
talks.synopsis: If we have faith in Jesus Christ, the hardest as well as the easiest times in life can be a blessing.

talks.author: Robert W. Cantwell
talks.title: Church Auditing Department Report, 2011
talks.synopsis: To the First Presidency of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: The Laborers in the Vineyard
talks.synopsis: Please listen to the prompting of the Holy Spirit telling you right now, this very moment, that you should accept the atoning gift of the Lord Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: Coming to Ourselves: The Sacrament, the Temple, and Sacrifice in Service
talks.synopsis: We become converted and spiritually self-reliant as we prayerfully live our covenants.

talks.author: Ulisses Soares
talks.title: Abide in the Lord’s Territory!
talks.synopsis: Our daily question must be, “Do my actions place me in the Lord’s or in the enemy’s territory?”

talks.author: David S. Baxter
talks.title: Faith, Fortitude, Fulfillment: A Message to Single Parents
talks.synopsis: You are striving to raise your children in righteousness and truth, knowing that while you cannot change the past, you can shape the future.

talks.author: Quentin L. Cook
talks.title: In Tune with the Music of Faith
talks.synopsis: God loves all His children. He wants all of them to return to Him. He desires everyone to be in tune with the sacred music of faith.

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: How to Obtain Revelation and Inspiration for Your Personal Life
talks.synopsis: Why does the Lord want us to pray to Him and to ask? Because that is how revelation is received.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: The Powers of Heaven
talks.synopsis: Priesthood holders young and old need both authority and power—the necessary permission and the spiritual capacity to represent God in the work of salvation.

talks.author: Richard C. Edgley
talks.title: The Rescue for Real Growth
talks.synopsis: Saving souls is the work the Savior has called all of us to do.

talks.author: Adrián Ochoa
talks.title: Aaronic Priesthood: Arise and Use the Power of God
talks.synopsis: The priesthood needs to be exercised to accomplish any good. You are called to “arise and shine forth,” not to hide your light in darkness.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: The Why of Priesthood Service
talks.synopsis: Understanding the why of the gospel and the why of the priesthood will help us to see the divine purpose of all of this.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Families under Covenant
talks.synopsis: There is nothing that has come or will come into your family as important as the sealing blessings.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Willing and Worthy to Serve
talks.synopsis: Miracles are everywhere to be found when the priesthood is understood, its power is honored and used properly, and faith is exerted.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: The Merciful Obtain Mercy
talks.synopsis: When our hearts are filled with the love of God, we become “kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving.”

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Thanks Be to God
talks.synopsis: How much better it would be if all could be more aware of God’s providence and love and express that gratitude to Him.

talks.author: Ronald A. Rasband
talks.title: Special Lessons
talks.synopsis: It is my hope and prayer that we will continue to bear nobly our burdens and to reach out to those among us who are suffering.

talks.author: Julie B. Beck
talks.title: The Vision of Prophets regarding Relief Society: Faith, Family, Relief
talks.synopsis: Faith, family, and relief—these three simple words have come to express the vision of prophets for sisters in the Church.

talks.author: D. Todd Christofferson
talks.title: The Doctrine of Christ
talks.synopsis: In the Church today, just as anciently, establishing the doctrine of Christ or correcting doctrinal deviations is a matter of divine revelation.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: The Race of Life
talks.synopsis: Where did we come from? Why are we here? Where do we go after this life? No longer need these universal questions remain unanswered.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: The Power of Deliverance
talks.synopsis: We can be delivered from the ways of evil and wickedness by turning to the teachings of the holy scriptures.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: That the Lost May Be Found
talks.synopsis: As you seek to live the gospel and doctrine of Christ, the Holy Ghost will guide you and your family.

talks.author: O. Vincent Haleck
talks.title: Having the Vision to Do
talks.synopsis: If we are to prosper rather than perish, we must gain a vision of ourselves as the Savior sees us.

talks.author: Larry Y. Wilson
talks.title: Only upon the Principles of Righteousness
talks.synopsis: Wise parents prepare their children to get along without them. They provide opportunities for growth as children acquire the spiritual maturity to exercise their agency properly.

talks.author: David F. Evans
talks.title: Was It Worth It?
talks.synopsis: The work of naturally and normally sharing the gospel with those we care about and love will be the work and joy of our lives.

talks.author: Paul B. Pieper
talks.title: To Hold Sacred
talks.synopsis: Sacred things are to be treated with more care, given greater deference, and regarded with deeper reverence.

talks.author: Neil L. Andersen
talks.title: What Thinks Christ of Me?
talks.synopsis: As you love Him, trust Him, believe Him, and follow Him, you will feel His love and approval.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: As We Close This Conference
talks.synopsis: May you ponder the truths you have heard, and may they help you to become even better than you were when conference began.

talks.author: Ann M. Dibb
talks.title: Arise and Shine Forth
talks.synopsis: One of the greatest ways we can arise and shine forth is to confidently obey the commandments of God.

talks.author: Mary N. Cook
talks.title: Seek Learning: You Have a Work to Do
talks.synopsis: Bless your children and your future home by learning as much as you can now.

talks.author: Elaine S. Dalton
talks.title: Now Is the Time to Arise and Shine!
talks.synopsis: As daughters of God, you were born to lead.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Believe, Obey, and Endure
talks.synopsis: Believe that remaining strong and faithful to the truths of the gospel is of utmost importance. I testify that it is!

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Welcome to Conference
talks.synopsis: May we listen attentively to the messages…, that we may feel the Spirit of the Lord and gain the knowledge He would desire for us.

talks.author: Quentin L. Cook
talks.title: Can Ye Feel So Now?
talks.synopsis: Some in the Church believe they can’t answer Alma’s question with a resounding yes. They do not “feel so now.”

talks.author: Ann M. Dibb
talks.title: I Know It. I Live It. I Love It.
talks.synopsis: We are followers of our Savior, Jesus Christ. Such conversion and confidence is the result of diligent and deliberate effort. It is individual. It is the process of a lifetime.

talks.author: Craig C. Christensen
talks.title: An Unspeakable Gift from God
talks.synopsis: The Holy Ghost works in perfect unity with Heavenly Father and Jesus Christ, fulfilling many important roles and distinct responsibilities.

talks.author: Shayne M. Bowen
talks.title: “Because I Live, Ye Shall Live Also”
talks.synopsis: Because of Him, even our Savior, Jesus Christ, those feelings of sorrow, loneliness, and despair will one day be swallowed up in a fulness of joy.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Ask the Missionaries! They Can Help You!
talks.synopsis: All missionaries, younger and older, serve with the sole hope of making life better for other people.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Of Regrets and Resolutions
talks.synopsis: The more we devote ourselves to the pursuit of holiness and happiness, the less likely we will be on a path to regrets.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: Becoming Goodly Parents
talks.synopsis: There are many ways that goodly parents can access the help and support they need to teach the gospel of Jesus Christ to their children.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: Be Anxiously Engaged
talks.synopsis: Great things are brought about and burdens are lightened through the efforts of many hands “anxiously engaged in a good cause.”

talks.author: Larry J. Echo Hawk
talks.title: “Come unto Me, O Ye House of Israel”
talks.synopsis: As we come unto our Savior, Jesus Christ, and purify our hearts, we will all be instruments in fulfilling the mighty promises of the Book of Mormon.

talks.author: Robert C. Gay
talks.title: What Shall a Man Give in Exchange for His Soul?
talks.synopsis: We are to give up all our sins, big or small, for the Father’s reward of eternal life.

talks.author: Scott D. Whiting
talks.title: Temple Standard
talks.synopsis: The high standards of temple building employed by this Church are a type and even a symbol of how we should be living our own lives.

talks.author: Neil L. Andersen
talks.title: Trial of Your Faith
talks.synopsis: Like the intense fire that transforms iron into steel, as we remain faithful during the fiery trial of faith, we are spiritually refined and strengthened.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Protect the Children
talks.synopsis: None should resist the plea that we unite to increase our concern for the welfare and future of our children—the rising generation.

talks.author: D. Todd Christofferson
talks.title: Brethren, We Have Work to Do
talks.synopsis: As men of the priesthood, we have an essential role to play in society, at home, and in the Church.

talks.author: Gary E. Stevenson
talks.title: Be Valiant in Courage, Strength, and Activity
talks.synopsis: Qualify yourselves as did the 2,000 stripling soldiers by being valiant in courage as worthy priesthood holders.

talks.author: Anthony D. Perkins
talks.title: Beware Concerning Yourselves
talks.synopsis: Stay on the priesthood path by deepening your conversion and strengthening your family. … Avoid tragedy by heeding spiritual “Beware” signs placed along our way by God and prophets.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: The Joy of the Priesthood
talks.synopsis: Let us embrace and understand the wonder and privilege of the priesthood. Let us accept and love the responsibilities we are asked to fulfill.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Help Them Aim High
talks.synopsis: With your guidance, those you lead will be able to see, want, and believe they can achieve their full potential for service in God’s kingdom.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: See Others as They May Become
talks.synopsis: We must develop the capacity to see men not as they are at present but as they may become.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Where Is the Pavilion?
talks.synopsis: The pavilion that seems to intercept divine aid does not cover God but occasionally covers us. God is never hidden, yet sometimes we are.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: The Atonement
talks.synopsis: Wherever our members and missionaries may go, our message is one of faith and hope in the Savior Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Linda K. Burton
talks.title: First Observe, Then Serve
talks.synopsis: With practice, each of us can become more like the Savior as we serve God’s children.

talks.author: Walter F. González
talks.title: Learning with Our Hearts
talks.synopsis: One way to come unto Christ is by seeking to learn essential truths with our hearts.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: The First Great Commandment
talks.synopsis: We have a life of devoted discipleship to give in demonstrating our love of the Lord.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Consider the Blessings
talks.synopsis: Our Heavenly Father is aware of our needs and will help us as we call upon Him for assistance.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: Being a More Christian Christian
talks.synopsis: This is the call of Christ to every Christian today: “Feed my lambs. … Feed my sheep.”

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: The Joy of Redeeming the Dead
talks.synopsis: “He shall plant in the hearts of the children the promises made to the fathers, and the hearts of the children shall turn to their fathers.”

talks.author: Russell T. Osguthorpe
talks.title: One Step Closer to the Savior
talks.synopsis: Conversion is the goal of all gospel learning and teaching. Conversion is not a onetime event. It is a lifelong quest to become more like the Savior.

talks.author: Marcus B. Nash
talks.title: By Faith All Things Are Fulfilled
talks.synopsis: Faith will help us to safely climb the gospel path, overcome every challenge of mortality, and return to the majestic presence of our Heavenly Father.

talks.author: Daniel L. Johnson
talks.title: Becoming a True Disciple
talks.synopsis: As we obey His commandments and serve our fellowmen, we become better disciples of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Don R. Clarke
talks.title: Blessings of the Sacrament
talks.synopsis: We will be blessed as we feel gratitude for the Atonement of Jesus Christ, renew our baptismal covenants, feel forgiveness, and receive inspiration from the Holy Ghost.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: Converted unto the Lord
talks.synopsis: Knowing that the gospel is true is the essence of a testimony. Consistently being true to the gospel is the essence of conversion.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: God Be with You Till We Meet Again
talks.synopsis: As we take the messages of the past two days into our hearts and into our lives, we will be blessed.

talks.author: Linda K. Burton
talks.title: Is Faith in the Atonement of Jesus Christ Written in Our Hearts?
talks.synopsis: Making, keeping, and rejoicing in our covenants will be the evidence that the Atonement of Jesus Christ is truly written in our hearts.

talks.author: Carole M. Stephens
talks.title: Wide Awake to Our Duties
talks.synopsis: We must be awake to our duty and continue with faith as we draw upon the comforting, strengthening, enabling, and healing power of the Atonement.

talks.author: Linda S. Reeves
talks.title: The Lord Has Not Forgotten You
talks.synopsis: Our Heavenly Father and our Savior, Jesus Christ, know us and love us. … We can feel of Their love and compassion in our suffering.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: The Caregiver
talks.synopsis: You will be strengthened and yet inspired to know the limits and extent of your ability to serve.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Welcome to Conference
talks.synopsis: I urge you to be attentive and receptive to the messages which we will hear. That we may do so is my prayer.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: These Things I Know
talks.synopsis: Of all that I have read and taught and learned, the one most precious and sacred truth that I have to offer is my special witness of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Dean M. Davies
talks.title: A Sure Foundation
talks.synopsis: Let us accept the Savior’s invitation to come unto Him. Let us build our lives upon a safe and a sure foundation.

talks.author: Elaine S. Dalton
talks.title: We Are Daughters of Our Heavenly Father
talks.synopsis: As daughters of God we are each unique and different in our circumstances and experiences. And yet our part matters—because we matter.

talks.author: Craig A. Cardon
talks.title: The Savior Wants to Forgive
talks.synopsis: The Lord loves us and wants us to understand His willingness to forgive.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: “This Is My Work and Glory”
talks.synopsis: God has freely given His power to those who accept and honor His priesthood, which leads to the promised blessings of immortality and eternal life.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: “Come unto Me”
talks.synopsis: By His words and His example, Christ has shown us how to draw closer to Him.

talks.author: Robert W. Cantwell
talks.title: Church Auditing Department Report, 2012
talks.synopsis: To the First Presidency of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: For Peace at Home
talks.synopsis: One of the greatest blessings we can offer to the world is the power of a Christ-centered home where the gospel is taught, covenants are kept, and love abounds.

talks.author: Quentin L. Cook
talks.title: Personal Peace: The Reward of Righteousness
talks.synopsis: Even with the trials of life, because of the Savior’s Atonement and His grace, righteous living will be rewarded with personal peace.

talks.author: Stanley G. Ellis
talks.title: The Lord’s Way
talks.synopsis: The Lord’s way is that we hearken to our leaders’ teachings, understand correct principles, and govern ourselves.

talks.author: John B. Dickson
talks.title: The Gospel to All the World
talks.synopsis: The Church has moved steadily across the world from nation to nation, culture to culture, people to people, on the Lord’s calendar and in His time.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: We Believe in Being Chaste
talks.synopsis: Obedience to the law of chastity will increase our happiness in mortality and make possible our progress in eternity.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Catch the Wave
talks.synopsis: I thank God and His Son, Jesus Christ, for the Restoration and its power to propel a magnificent wave of truth and righteousness across the earth.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: Stand Strong in Holy Places
talks.synopsis: Standing obedient and strong on the doctrine of our God, we stand in holy places, for His doctrine is sacred and will not change.

talks.author: Tad R. Callister
talks.title: The Power of the Priesthood in the Boy
talks.synopsis: The priesthood in the boy is just as powerful as the priesthood in the man when exercised in righteousness.

talks.author: David L. Beck
talks.title: Your Sacred Duty to Minister
talks.synopsis: You received the power, the authority, and the sacred duty to minister the moment you were ordained to the priesthood.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Four Titles
talks.synopsis: I would like to suggest four titles … that may help us recognize our individual roles in God’s eternal plan and our potential as priesthood holders.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: We Are One
talks.synopsis: I pray that wherever we are and whatever duties we have in the priesthood of God, we will be united in the cause to bring the gospel to all the world.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Come, All Ye Sons of God
talks.synopsis: May each one of us search the scriptures with diligence, plan his life with purpose, teach the truth with testimony, and serve the Lord with love.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: The Hope of God’s Light
talks.synopsis: As we seek to increase our love for God and strive to love our neighbor, the light of the gospel will surround and uplift us.

talks.author: Neil L. Andersen
talks.title: It’s a Miracle
talks.synopsis: If you’re not a full-time missionary with a missionary badge pinned on your coat, now is the time to paint one on your heart—painted, as Paul said, “not with ink, but with the Spirit of the living God.”

talks.author: Rosemary M. Wixom
talks.title: The Words We Speak
talks.synopsis: How we speak to our children and the words we use can encourage and uplift them and strengthen their faith.

talks.author: L. Whitney Clayton
talks.title: Marriage: Watch and Learn
talks.synopsis: The promises of the Lord are extended to all those who follow the pattern of life that builds happy, holy marriage relationships.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: Obedience to Law Is Liberty
talks.synopsis: Men and women receive their agency as a gift from God, but their liberty and, in turn, their eternal happiness come from obedience to His laws.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Obedience Brings Blessings
talks.synopsis: A knowledge of truth and the answers to our greatest questions come to us as we are obedient to the commandments of God.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: “Lord, I Believe”
talks.synopsis: Honestly acknowledge your questions and your concerns, but first and forever fan the flame of your faith, because all things are possible to them that believe.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Followers of Christ
talks.synopsis: Following Christ is not a casual or occasional practice but a continuous commitment and way of life that applies at all times and in all places.

talks.author: Christoffel Golden
talks.title: The Father and the Son
talks.synopsis: At the heart of the gospel of Jesus Christ and its power to save is a correct understanding of the Father and the Son.

talks.author: Enrique R. Falabella
talks.title: The Home: The School of Life
talks.synopsis: Lessons are learned in a home—the place that can become a piece of heaven here on earth.

talks.author: Erich W. Kopischke
talks.title: Being Accepted of the Lord
talks.synopsis: Seeking and receiving the acceptance of the Lord will lead to the knowledge that we are chosen and blessed by Him.

talks.author: Bruce D. Porter
talks.title: Beautiful Mornings
talks.synopsis: We need not fear the future, nor falter in hope and good cheer, because God is with us.

talks.author: D. Todd Christofferson
talks.title: Redemption
talks.synopsis: Inasmuch as we follow Christ, we seek to participate in and further His redemptive work.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Until We Meet Again
talks.synopsis: I pray that the Lord will bless and keep you, my brothers and sisters. May His promised peace be with you now and always.

talks.author: Ann M. Dibb
talks.title: Your Holy Places
talks.synopsis: Whether [your holy places] are geographic or moments in time, they are equally sacred and have incredible strengthening power.

talks.author: Mary N. Cook
talks.title: When You Save a Girl, You Save Generations
talks.synopsis: Your virtuous lives will bless your ancestors, your families now, and family members yet to come.

talks.author: Elaine S. Dalton
talks.title: Be Not Moved!
talks.synopsis: Stand firm. Be steadfast. “Stand for truth and righteousness.” Stand as a witness. Be a standard to the world. Stand in holy places.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Your Wonderful Journey Home
talks.synopsis: As you joyfully use the map your loving Father has provided for your journey, it will lead you to holy places and you will rise to your supernal potential.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Welcome to Conference
talks.synopsis: It is my prayer that we may be filled with the Spirit of the Lord as we listen and learn.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: General Conference: Strengthening Faith and Testimony
talks.synopsis: Oh, how we need general conference! Through conferences our faith is fortified and our testimonies deepened.

talks.author: Ulisses Soares
talks.title: Be Meek and Lowly of Heart
talks.synopsis: Being meek does not mean weakness, but it does mean behaving with goodness and kindness.

talks.author: Carole M. Stephens
talks.title: Do We Know What We Have?
talks.synopsis: Priesthood ordinances and covenants provide access to the fulness of the blessings promised to us by God, which are made possible by the Savior’s Atonement.

talks.author: Edward Dube
talks.title: Look Ahead and Believe
talks.synopsis: In the sight of the Lord, it is not so much what we have done or where we have been but much more where we are willing to go.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: The Windows of Heaven
talks.synopsis: Spiritual and temporal blessings come into our lives as we live the law of tithing.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Come, Join with Us
talks.synopsis: Regardless of your circumstances, your personal history, or the strength of your testimony, there is room for you in this Church.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: The Key to Spiritual Protection
talks.synopsis: Peace can be settled in the heart of each who turns to the scriptures and unlocks the promises of protection and redemption.

talks.author: D. Todd Christofferson
talks.title: The Moral Force of Women
talks.synopsis: Your intuition is to do good and to be good, and as you follow the Holy Spirit, your moral authority and influence will grow.

talks.author: S. Gifford Nielsen
talks.title: Hastening the Lord’s Game Plan!
talks.synopsis: We each must develop and carry out our own personal game plan to serve with enthusiasm alongside the full-time missionaries.

talks.author: Arnulfo Valenzuela
talks.title: Small and Simple Things
talks.synopsis: Let us reach out to others with faith and with love.

talks.author: Timothy J. Dyches
talks.title: Wilt Thou Be Made Whole?
talks.synopsis: As we repent and become converted to the Lord, we become whole, and our guilt is swept away.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: Like a Broken Vessel
talks.synopsis: How do you best respond when mental or emotional challenges confront you or those you love?

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: Put Your Trust in the Lord
talks.synopsis: Become engaged in doing what you can in sharing the great message of the Restoration of the gospel of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: The Doctrines and Principles Contained in the Articles of Faith
talks.synopsis: Each article of faith adds unique value to our understanding of the gospel of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Gérald Caussé
talks.title: Ye Are No More Strangers
talks.synopsis: In this Church there are no strangers and no outcasts. There are only brothers and sisters.

talks.author: Randy D. Funk
talks.title: Called of Him to Declare His Word
talks.synopsis: If you are humble and obedient and hearken to the voice of the Spirit, you will find great happiness in your service as a missionary.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: You Can Do It Now!
talks.synopsis: As long as we are willing to rise up again and continue on the path, … we can learn something from failure and become better and happier.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Bind Up Their Wounds
talks.synopsis: I pray that we may prepare ourselves to give whatever priesthood service the Lord may set before us on our mortal journey.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: True Shepherds
talks.synopsis: Home teaching answers many prayers and permits us to see the transformations which can take place in people’s lives.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: To My Grandchildren
talks.synopsis: There is one overarching commandment that will help us to meet the challenges and lead to the heart of a happy family life.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: No Other Gods
talks.synopsis: Are we serving priorities or gods ahead of the God we profess to worship?

talks.author: Bonnie L. Oscarson
talks.title: Be Ye Converted
talks.synopsis: True conversion occurs as you continue to act upon the doctrines you know are true and keep the commandments, day after day, month after month.

talks.author: Richard J. Maynes
talks.title: The Strength to Endure
talks.synopsis: Our ability to endure to the end in righteousness will be in direct proportion to the strength of our testimony and the depth of our conversion.

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: Personal Strength through the Atonement of Jesus Christ
talks.synopsis: Through the Atonement of Jesus Christ, each of us can become clean and the burden of our rebellion will be lifted.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: “I Will Not Fail Thee, nor Forsake Thee”
talks.synopsis: Our Heavenly Father … knows that we learn and grow and become stronger as we face and survive the trials through which we must pass.

talks.author: Quentin L. Cook
talks.title: Lamentations of Jeremiah: Beware of Bondage
talks.synopsis: Our challenge is to avoid bondage of any kind, help the Lord gather His elect, and sacrifice for the rising generation.

talks.author: Neil L. Andersen
talks.title: Power in the Priesthood
talks.synopsis: A man may open the drapes so the warm sunlight comes into the room, but the man does not own the sun or the light or the warmth it brings.

talks.author: David M. McConkie
talks.title: Teaching with the Power and Authority of God
talks.synopsis: The Lord has provided the way for every worthy Latter-day Saint to teach in the Savior’s way.

talks.author: Kevin S. Hamilton
talks.title: Continually Holding Fast
talks.synopsis: May we continually hold fast to the iron rod that leads to the presence of our Heavenly Father.

talks.author: Adrián Ochoa
talks.title: Look Up
talks.synopsis: Today is the time to look to the Source of truth and ensure that our testimonies are strong.

talks.author: Terence M. Vinson
talks.title: Drawing Closer to God
talks.synopsis: Our Savior wants us to really love Him to the point that we want to align our will with His.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Decisions for Eternity
talks.synopsis: The wise use of your freedom to make your own decisions is crucial to your spiritual growth, now and for eternity.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Till We Meet Again
talks.synopsis: May we show increased kindness toward one another, and may we ever be found doing the work of the Lord.

talks.author: Linda K. Burton
talks.title: The Power, Joy, and Love of Covenant Keeping
talks.synopsis: I invite each of us to evaluate how much we love the Savior, using as a measure how joyfully we keep our covenants.

talks.author: Carole M. Stephens
talks.title: We Have Great Reason to Rejoice
talks.synopsis: When you love, watch over, and serve others in small and simple ways, you are actively participating in the work of salvation.

talks.author: Linda S. Reeves
talks.title: Claim the Blessings of Your Covenants
talks.synopsis: As we renew and honor our covenants, our burdens can be lightened and we can continually become purified and strengthened.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: We Never Walk Alone
talks.synopsis: You will one day stand aside and look at your difficult times, and you will realize that He was always there beside you.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Welcome to Conference
talks.synopsis: Thomas S. Monson opens general conference and tells of his experiences at the dedication of the Gilbert Arizona Temple.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: The Cost—and Blessings—of Discipleship
talks.synopsis: Jeffrey R. Holland encourages us to live the gospel faithfully and courageously, even when it is difficult.

talks.author: Ronald A. Rasband
talks.title: The Joyful Burden of Discipleship
talks.synopsis: Ronald A. Rasband teaches that we can receive joy by serving each other and bearing one other’s burdens as disciples of the Lord.

talks.author: Carlos H. Amado
talks.title: Christ the Redeemer
talks.synopsis: Carlos H. Amado testifies that all who have lived or will live on earth are blessed by the Atonement of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Linda S. Reeves
talks.title: Protection from Pornography—a Christ-Focused Home
talks.synopsis: Linda S. Reeves warns families of the dangers of pornography and explains that the best filter is a strong testimony.

talks.author: Neil L. Andersen
talks.title: Spiritual Whirlwinds
talks.synopsis: Neil L. Andersen encourages youth to trust in God during challenges and promises that they will receive the Lord’s protection and guidance.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: A Priceless Heritage of Hope
talks.synopsis: Henry B. Eyring encourages us to leave an inheritance of hope for those who will follow our example.

talks.author: Kevin R. Jergensen
talks.title: Church Auditing Department Report, 2013
talks.synopsis: Church Auditing Department managing director Kevin R. Jergensen reads the auditing report for 2013.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Let Your Faith Show
talks.synopsis: Russell M. Nelson counsels us to increase our faith by living our religion. He encourages us not to hide our faith but to let it show.

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: “I Have Given You an Example”
talks.synopsis: Richard G. Scott explains how we can follow the Savior’s example and be a loving influence for good in the lives of others.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: “If Ye Love Me, Keep My Commandments”
talks.synopsis: Robert D. Hales teaches of the blessings that come when we use our agency to obey God’s commandments, as the Savior Jesus Christ did.

talks.author: Claudio D. Zivic
talks.title: Let’s Not Take the Wrong Way
talks.synopsis: Claudio D. Zivic counsels us to stay on the gospel path by keeping the commandments and to repent when we need to get back on the right path.

talks.author: W. Craig Zwick
talks.title: What Are You Thinking?
talks.synopsis: W. Craig Zwick encourages empathy for others and teaches that we must strive to understand what others are thinking.

talks.author: Quentin L. Cook
talks.title: Roots and Branches
talks.synopsis: Quentin L. Cook teaches the importance of hastening family history and temple work in our day, including through modern technology.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: The Keys and Authority of the Priesthood
talks.synopsis: Dallin H. Oaks teaches how men and women, though they have different roles, serve and are blessed on the same terms through the priesthood.

talks.author: Donald L. Hallstrom
talks.title: What Manner of Men?
talks.synopsis: Donald L. Hallstrom urges priesthood holders to be willing to change in order to become more like the Savior Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Randall L. Ridd
talks.title: The Choice Generation
talks.synopsis: Randall L. Ridd offers four principles to help young men educate their desires and use technology wisely.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Are You Sleeping through the Restoration?
talks.synopsis: Dieter F. Uchtdorf cautions that selfishness, addictions, and competing priorities can keep us from giving our best effort as disciples of Christ.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: The Priesthood Man
talks.synopsis: Henry B. Eyring teaches men how they can follow—and be—examples of selfless priesthood service.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Be Strong and of a Good Courage
talks.synopsis: Thomas S. Monson counsels priesthood holders to have moral courage in these challenging times and to be willing to defend their beliefs.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Grateful in Any Circumstances
talks.synopsis: Dieter F. Uchtdorf teaches that we can choose to be grateful in any circumstances, including in the midst of tribulation.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: Following Up
talks.synopsis: M. Russell Ballard encourages Latter-day Saints to be faithful missionaries and to follow up on their missionary efforts.

talks.author: Jean A. Stevens
talks.title: “Fear Not; I Am with Thee”
talks.synopsis: Jean A. Stevens teaches how greater faith and trust in the Lord can help us find peace and overcome challenges.

talks.author: Gary E. Stevenson
talks.title: Your Four Minutes
talks.synopsis: Gary E. Stevenson uses examples of Olympic athletes to illustrate how we should conduct our relatively short but all-important mortal lives.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: Bear Up Their Burdens with Ease
talks.synopsis: David A. Bednar teaches that our challenges help us learn to rely on the Savior’s Atonement.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Love—the Essence of the Gospel
talks.synopsis: Thomas S. Monson teaches how small acts of love, kindness, and forgiveness can make a big difference in others’ lives.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: The Witness
talks.synopsis: Boyd K. Packer testifies of God the Father, Jesus Christ, and the Holy Ghost.

talks.author: William R. Walker
talks.title: Live True to the Faith
talks.synopsis: William R. Walker encourages Latter-day Saints to live true to the faith, honoring the legacy of their faithful ancestors.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: Obedience through Our Faithfulness
talks.synopsis: L. Tom Perry teaches that obedience is a choice to trust in God’s unlimited wisdom and power rather than our own limited knowledge and power.

talks.author: Lawrence E. Corbridge
talks.title: The Prophet Joseph Smith
talks.synopsis: Lawrence E. Corbridge testifies of the important doctrine restored by the Prophet Joseph Smith.

talks.author: Michael John U. Teh
talks.title: Where Your Treasure Is
talks.synopsis: Michael John U. Teh teaches how we can make sure to put the things of God first in our lives rather than the things of this world.

talks.author: Marcos A. Aidukaitis
talks.title: If Ye Lack Wisdom
talks.synopsis: Marcos A. Aidukaitis gives guidance for recognizing truth—observing its fruits, experimenting on the word of God, and seeking personal revelation.

talks.author: D. Todd Christofferson
talks.title: The Resurrection of Jesus Christ
talks.synopsis: D. Todd Christofferson shares many of the scriptural witnesses of the Resurrection of Jesus Christ as well as his own testimony.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Until We Meet Again
talks.synopsis: Thomas S. Monson expresses his hope that the spirit Latter-day Saints felt during general conference may abide with them.

talks.author: Rosemary M. Wixom
talks.title: Keeping Covenants Protects Us, Prepares Us, and Empowers Us
talks.synopsis: Rosemary M. Wixom encourages girls and women of all ages to make and keep sacred covenants in order to return to Heavenly Father’s presence.

talks.author: Bonnie L. Oscarson
talks.title: Sisterhood: Oh, How We Need Each Other
talks.synopsis: Bonnie L. Oscarson teaches that we can learn from girls and women of all ages and that we must avoid judging each other.

talks.author: Linda K. Burton
talks.title: Wanted: Hands and Hearts to Hasten the Work
talks.synopsis: Linda K. Burton teaches that we can be devoted disciples of Jesus Christ by serving others and furthering the work of salvation.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Daughters in the Covenant
talks.synopsis: Henry B. Eyring encourages women to keep their covenants, including those made at baptism, as they progress along the path back to Heavenly Father.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Welcome to Conference
talks.synopsis: President Thomas S. Monson welcomes people to general conference and mentions some significant milestones in the Church’s progress.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: The Reason for Our Hope
talks.synopsis: Boyd K. Packer teaches that Jesus Christ and His Atonement are our source for hope, peace, and redemption.

talks.author: Lynn G. Robbins
talks.title: Which Way Do You Face?
talks.synopsis: Elder Lynn G. Robbins of the Seventy teaches us to show courage by putting God first, regardless of peer pressure or difficult circumstances.

talks.author: Cheryl A. Esplin
talks.title: The Sacrament—a Renewal for the Soul
talks.synopsis: Sister Cheryl A. Esplin teaches how Jesus Christ can renew our souls through the sacrament and discusses how to better prepare for this ordinance.

talks.author: Chi Hong (Sam) Wong
talks.title: Rescue in Unity
talks.synopsis: Chi Hong (Sam) Wong uses the story of Jesus healing a man with palsy to teach about the need for unity and faith as we rescue those in need.

talks.author: D. Todd Christofferson
talks.title: Free Forever, to Act for Themselves
talks.synopsis: D. Todd Christofferson reminds us that God has given us both freedom and personal accountability to help us achieve our potential.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Receiving a Testimony of Light and Truth
talks.synopsis: Our personal testimony of the gospel and of the Church will not only bless us in this life but throughout all eternity.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Loving Others and Living with Differences
talks.synopsis: Dallin H. Oaks teaches that as disciples of Jesus Christ, we are to love others and live peacefully with those whose beliefs differ from our own.

talks.author: Neil L. Andersen
talks.title: Joseph Smith
talks.synopsis: Neil L. Andersen praises the character of Joseph Smith, whose name has been had for good and evil, and encourages stronger testimonies of the Prophet.

talks.author: Tad R. Callister
talks.title: Parents: The Prime Gospel Teachers of Their Children
talks.synopsis: Brother Tad R. Callister teaches parents how to become their children’s first and most important teachers of the gospel by both example and precept.

talks.author: Jörg Klebingat
talks.title: Approaching the Throne of God with Confidence
talks.synopsis: Elder Jörg Klebingat gives six practical suggestions to gain confidence before God.

talks.author: Eduardo Gavarret
talks.title: Yes, Lord, I Will Follow Thee

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: Are We Not All Beggars?
talks.synopsis: Elder Jeffrey R. Holland reminds us of the command to care for the poor and needy and encourages us to do what we can to help.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: Finding Lasting Peace and Building Eternal Families

talks.author: Quentin L. Cook
talks.title: Choose Wisely
talks.synopsis: Elder Quentin L. Cook encourages us to make our choices consistent with our goals, the Lord?s commandments, and sacred covenants.

talks.author: Craig C. Christensen
talks.title: I Know These Things of Myself
talks.synopsis: Elder Craig C. Christensen encourages priesthood holders to develop their own testimony of the gospel of Jesus Christ and of the Restoration.

talks.author: Dean M. Davies
talks.title: The Law of the Fast: A Personal Responsibility to Care for the Poor and Needy
talks.synopsis: Bishop Dean M. Davies counsels all members to follow the Savior by caring for the poor and needy through the law of the fast.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: “Lord, Is It I?”
talks.synopsis: President Dieter F. Uchtdorf counsels priesthood holders to humbly examine their lives to ensure they are consistently improving.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: The Preparatory Priesthood
talks.synopsis: President Henry B. Eyring offers counsel to those who help Aaronic Priesthood holders prepare for continuing priesthood service.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Guided Safely Home
talks.synopsis: Using the analogy of a ship, Thomas S. Monson teaches members to steer a course toward eternal life, with the rudder of faith.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Continuing Revelation
talks.synopsis: President Henry B. Eyring testifies that we can receive personal, confirming revelation about the teachings and counsel of our leaders.

talks.author: Carol F. McConkie
talks.title: Live according to the Words of the Prophets
talks.synopsis: Carol F. McConkie testifies of the divine role of prophets and the blessings that come from living by the counsel God gives us through them.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: Eternal Life—to Know Our Heavenly Father and His Son, Jesus Christ
talks.synopsis: Using many scriptures, Robert D. Hales teaches that the Father and Son are separate beings and that we can gain a testimony of Them.

talks.author: James J. Hamula
talks.title: The Sacrament and the Atonement
talks.synopsis: Elder James J. Hamula testifies of the importance of the sacrament and encourages us to make it a more sacred part of our lives.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Ponder the Path of Thy Feet
talks.synopsis: President Thomas S. Monson counsels us to walk in the path marked by the example and teachings of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: Stay in the Boat and Hold On!
talks.synopsis: We will be safe and protected if we follow the teachings of the Church and the counsel of the modern prophets and apostles.

talks.author: Richard G. Scott
talks.title: Make the Exercise of Faith Your First Priority
talks.synopsis: We exercise our faith in Jesus Christ through regular and consistent prayer, scripture study, family home evening, and temple attendance.

talks.author: Carlos A. Godoy
talks.title: The Lord Has a Plan for Us!
talks.synopsis: Carlos A. Godoy teaches three principles that will help us reach our potential and fulfill the plan God has for our lives.

talks.author: Allan F. Packer
talks.title: The Book
talks.synopsis: Elder Allan F. Packer discusses how family history and temple work are essential to the Lord’s work of salvation and how we can participate.

talks.author: Hugo E. Martinez
talks.title: Our Personal Ministries
talks.synopsis: Elder Hugo E. Martinez teaches that our personal ministries begin when we turn to Jesus Christ as our guide to knowing who and how to serve.

talks.author: Larry S. Kacher
talks.title: Trifle Not with Sacred Things
talks.synopsis: Elder Larry S. Kacher encourages us to make choices based on gospel principles to ensure we receive eternal blessings.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: Come and See
talks.synopsis: David A. Bednar explains reasons why Latter-day Saints are motivated to share the gospel.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Until We Meet Again
talks.synopsis: President Thomas S. Monson counsels us to serve others and be more valiant disciples and faithful followers of Christ.

talks.author: Linda K. Burton
talks.title: Prepared in a Manner That Never Had Been Known

talks.author: Cheryl A. Esplin
talks.title: Filling Our Homes with Light and Truth

talks.author: Carole M. Stephens
talks.title: The Family Is of God
talks.synopsis: Carole M. Stephens uses the words of a Primary song to teach about the role of the family—our earthly family and our heavenly family—in God’s plan.

talks.author: Bonnie L. Oscarson
talks.title: Defenders of the Family Proclamation
talks.synopsis: Sister Bonnie L. Oscarson encourages Latter-day Saint women to defend marriage, the divine roles of parents, and the sanctity of the home.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: The Comforter
talks.synopsis: Henry B. Eyring describes how our baptismal covenant inspires us to extend the Savior’s compassion to those who are carrying life’s heavy burdens.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: “Is Not This the Fast That I Have Chosen?”
talks.synopsis: Henry B. Eyring teaches about the temporal and spiritual blessings of fasting and fast offerings.

talks.author: Boyd K. Packer
talks.title: The Plan of Happiness
talks.synopsis: Boyd K. Packer teaches about marriage, the power of procreation, repentance, and eternal families.

talks.author: Linda K. Burton
talks.title: We’ll Ascend Together
talks.synopsis: Sister Burton teaches that as men and women keep their covenants and strengthen each other, all can reach their full potential.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: The Parable of the Sower
talks.synopsis: Dallin H. Oaks discusses the parable of the sower and warns of attitudes that prevent the word of God from growing in our hearts and bearing fruit.

talks.author: L. Whitney Clayton
talks.title: Choose to Believe
talks.synopsis: Elder L. Whitney Clayton of the Seventy teaches that we follow spiritual light in our lives when we choose to believe in the Savior and His gospel.

talks.author: L. Tom Perry
talks.title: Why Marriage and Family Matter—Everywhere in the World
talks.synopsis: Elder L. Tom Perry explains why marriage and family are still a universal ideal and why we must support efforts to strengthen them worldwide.

talks.author: Kevin R. Jergensen
talks.title: Church Auditing Department Report, 2014
talks.synopsis: Church Auditing Department managing director Kevin R. Jergensen reads the auditing report for 2014.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: Therefore They Hushed Their Fears
talks.synopsis: David A. Bednar teaches how we can overcome mortal fears by having faith in Jesus Christ and building our lives on His foundation.

talks.author: D. Todd Christofferson
talks.title: Why Marriage, Why Family
talks.synopsis: Elder Christofferson discusses the importance of marriage between a man and a woman and its place in God’s plan of happiness.

talks.author: Wilford W. Andersen
talks.title: The Music of the Gospel
talks.synopsis: Elder Wilford W. Andersen of the Seventy teaches how we can teach and enjoy the harmonious music of the gospel in our homes, with our children.

talks.author: Dale G. Renlund
talks.title: Latter-day Saints Keep on Trying
talks.synopsis: Elder Dale G. Renlund teaches that being a Saint means to keep trying and encourages us to do so while allowing others the same opportunity.

talks.author: Quentin L. Cook
talks.title: The Lord Is My Light
talks.synopsis: Quentin L. Cook teaches that if we follow the Savior and live in unity, we will flourish despite the harsh realities surrounding us.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: The Greatest Generation of Young Adults
talks.synopsis: Elder M. Russell Ballard encourages returned missionaries and all young adults to live gospel standards of righteous discipleship.

talks.author: Ulisses Soares
talks.title: Yes, We Can and Will Win!
talks.synopsis: Elder Ulisses Soares testifies that if we will stay true to our testimony of Jesus Christ and His gospel, we will win our battles against evil.

talks.author: Larry M. Gibson
talks.title: Fatherhood—Our Eternal Destiny
talks.synopsis: Brother Larry M. Gibson teaches men of the Church about the central importance of their role as fathers, both now and in eternity.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: On Being Genuine
talks.synopsis: President Uchtdorf teaches priesthood holders the importance of humble, genuine discipleship.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Priesthood and Personal Prayer
talks.synopsis: President Henry B. Eyring teaches priesthood holders that as they humbly pray and seek the Spirit, God will help them know what to say and do.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: The Priesthood—a Sacred Gift
talks.synopsis: Thomas S. Monson teaches priesthood holders to appreciate the gift of the priesthood, to live worthy of using its power, and to follow the Savior.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Blessings of the Temple
talks.synopsis: Thomas S. Monson teaches of the comfort, peace, and strength that can come to us as we attend the temple.

talks.author: Rosemary M. Wixom
talks.title: Returning to Faith
talks.synopsis: Rosemary M. Wixom shares the story of a woman who returned from doubt to faith and of the family members and friends who lovingly supported her.

talks.author: José A. Teixeira
talks.title: Seeking the Lord
talks.synopsis: Elder José A. Teixeira of the Seventy teaches three habits that will help us learn about the Savior and experience joy, even in difficult times.

talks.author: Gérald Caussé
talks.title: Is It Still Wonderful to You?
talks.synopsis: Bishop Gérald Caussé invites us to always remember the wonders of the gospel of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Brent H. Nielson
talks.title: Waiting for the Prodigal
talks.synopsis: Elder Brent H. Nielson shares a personal story about how to include, love, and wait for others who have lost their faith.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: Where Justice, Love, and Mercy Meet
talks.synopsis: Jeffrey R. Holland testifies of the Savior’s Atonement and explains its relationship to the Fall of Adam and Eve.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: Preserving Agency, Protecting Religious Freedom
talks.synopsis: Elder Robert D. Hales explains why religious freedom is necessary for us to exercise agency and fulfill Heavenly Father’s plan.

talks.author: Kevin W. Pearson
talks.title: Stay by the Tree
talks.synopsis: Elder Kevin W. Pearson explains how Lehi’s vision of the tree of life teaches us what we must do to endure to the end.

talks.author: Rafael E. Pino
talks.title: The Eternal Perspective of the Gospel
talks.synopsis: Understanding the plan of salvation gives us an eternal perspective that helps us value the commandments, our covenants, and trials and tribulations.

talks.author: Neil L. Andersen
talks.title: Thy Kingdom Come
talks.synopsis: Elder Neil L. Andersen discusses the role Church members have to help build the kingdom of God and prepare for the Second Coming of the Lord.

talks.author: Jorge F. Zeballos
talks.title: If You Will Be Responsible
talks.synopsis: Elder Jorge F. Zeballos shares four key principles to help us be responsible to our Father in Heaven and become like Him.

talks.author: Joseph W. Sitati
talks.title: Be Fruitful, Multiply, and Subdue the Earth
talks.synopsis: Elder Sitati teaches about our roles in the plan of salvation and how fulfilling those roles will help us become like God.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: The Sabbath Is a Delight
talks.synopsis: Russell M. Nelson teaches how we can make the Sabbath a delight through strengthening family ties, doing family history work, and serving others.

talks.author: Rosemary M. Wixom
talks.title: Discovering the Divinity Within
talks.synopsis: Sister Wixom teaches that we each came to earth with a divine nature. Understanding and developing our divine nature helps us know why we are here on earth; it also helps us know that Heavenly Father loves us. The divine nature within each of us motivates us during this life to learn eternal truths and to serve others.

talks.author: Linda S. Reeves
talks.title: Worthy of Our Promised Blessings
talks.synopsis: Linda S. Reeves encourages sisters to remember the blessings that Heavenly Father has promised them for living the gospel.

talks.author: Carol F. McConkie
talks.title: Here to Serve a Righteous Cause
talks.synopsis: Sister Carol F. McConkie invites girls and women of all ages to serve a righteous cause as we help to build the kingdom of God.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: A Summer with Great-Aunt Rose
talks.synopsis: President Uchtdorf shares a story of a young girl who learned about faith, hope, and love while spending a summer with her great-aunt.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: It Works Wonderfully!
talks.synopsis: President Uchtdorf encourages us to simplify our approach to discipleship if we find the gospel is not working in our lives.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: God Is at the Helm
talks.synopsis: Elder M. Russell Ballard reminds us that God is at the helm and that if we keep the covenants we have made, we will be blessed and protected.

talks.author: Richard J. Maynes
talks.title: The Joy of Living a Christ-Centered Life
talks.synopsis: Elder Maynes explains how living a Christ-centered life will help us have peace, happiness, and joy even when we face adversity.

talks.author: Neill F. Marriott
talks.title: Yielding Our Hearts to God
talks.synopsis: Sister Marriott teaches that we can make the Lord’s way our way when we are humble and open to His Spirit.

talks.author: Larry R. Lawrence
talks.title: What Lack I Yet?
talks.synopsis: Elder Lawrence teaches that the Holy Ghost can tell us through personalized revelation how we can improve.

talks.author: Francisco J. Viñas
talks.title: The Pleasing Word of God
talks.synopsis: Elder Francisco J. Viñas teaches that “the pleasing word of God” can heal us in our afflictions and lead us to the companionship of the Holy Ghost through sincere and continuous repentance.

talks.author: Quentin L. Cook
talks.title: Shipshape and Bristol Fashion: Be Temple Worthy—in Good Times and Bad Times
talks.synopsis: Quentin L. Cook shares three ways we can develop personal righteousness and thus enjoy happiness in this life and the next.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: Meeting the Challenges of Today’s World
talks.synopsis: Elder Hales instructs young adults to make wise choices concerning education, marriage, and Church service as they plan for their future.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: Behold Thy Mother
talks.synopsis: Jeffrey R. Holland pays tribute to the strength, dedication, influence, and love of mothers.

talks.author: Bradley D. Foster
talks.title: It’s Never Too Early and It’s Never Too Late
talks.synopsis: Elder Bradley D. Foster teaches us that it’s never too early and it’s never too late to teach our children the gospel of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Hugo Montoya
talks.title: Tested and Tempted—but Helped
talks.synopsis: Elder Hugo Montoya reminds us that though we are tested and tempted, we can help each other overcome our trials through the Atonement of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Vern P. Stanfill
talks.title: Choose the Light
talks.synopsis: Elder Vern P. Stanfill encourages Church members to seek light and spiritual power by heeding prophetic counsel, acting upon spiritual promptings, and obeying God’s commandments.

talks.author: James B. Martino
talks.title: Turn to Him and Answers Will Come
talks.synopsis: Elder Martino teaches how obedience, scripture study, prayer, and fasting help us to feel the Spirit and find answers to our questions.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Strengthened by the Atonement of Jesus Christ
talks.synopsis: Dallin H. Oaks testifies of the power of Christ’s Atonement to strengthen and help us in the pains, afflictions, and infirmities of mortality.

talks.author: Neil L. Andersen
talks.title: Faith Is Not by Chance, but by Choice
talks.synopsis: Elder Andersen discusses how we can choose to strengthen and protect our faith.

talks.author: Randall K. Bennett
talks.title: Your Next Step
talks.synopsis: Randall K. Bennett describes principles that will help us take our next steps back to the loving embrace of our Heavenly Father and our Savior.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Be Not Afraid, Only Believe
talks.synopsis: President Dieter F. Uchtdorf tells us to be like Daniel and have the courage to believe and to resist the cynicism and doubt of a secular world. By doing so, we will have more light, truth, and peace in our lives.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: You Are Not Alone in the Work
talks.synopsis: President Henry B. Eyring reminds priesthood holders that priesthood service is about helping the children of God return to Him and that the Lord is with them in that service.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Keep the Commandments
talks.synopsis: President Thomas S. Monson encourages us to keep the commandments and identifies some of the blessings for doing so.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Be an Example and a Light
talks.synopsis: President Thomas S. Monson teaches us to be “an example of the believers” and a light to the world. I doing so, we will stand out, but as we make Christ the center of our lives, our fears will be replaced by courage.

talks.author: Ronald A. Rasband
talks.title: I Stand All Amazed
talks.synopsis: Elder Rasband expresses gratitude for and testifies of the Savior’s love and Atonement, and he encourages Latter-day Saints to reach out to others with love.

talks.author: Gary E. Stevenson
talks.title: Plain and Precious Truths
talks.synopsis: Elder Gary E. Stevenson describes his call to the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles and bears his testimony of the plain and precious truths of the gospel.

talks.author: Dale G. Renlund
talks.title: Through God’s Eyes
talks.synopsis: Dale G. Renlund teaches that to truly serve others, we need to see them as Heavenly Father sees them.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: A Plea to My Sisters
talks.synopsis: President Russell M. Nelson extols the contributions made by women to the Church and community. He encourages women to keep their covenants.

talks.author: Gregory A. Schwitzer
talks.title: Let the Clarion Trumpet Sound
talks.synopsis: Gregory A. Schwitzer encourages Latter-day Saints to testify boldly and clearly in defense of Jesus Christ’s Church and doctrine.

talks.author: Claudio R. M. Costa
talks.title: That They Do Always Remember Him
talks.synopsis: Elder Costa teaches how pondering the life and Atonement of Christ can make the sacrament more meaningful and invite the companionship of the Spirit.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: The Holy Ghost as Your Companion
talks.synopsis: Henry B. Eyring encourages members to seek the companionship of the Holy Ghost, who provides protection, guidance, and comfort.

talks.author: D. Todd Christofferson
talks.title: Why the Church
talks.synopsis: D. Todd Christofferson describes several reasons The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints is needed to accomplish the Savior’s purposes.

talks.author: Devin G. Durrant
talks.title: My Heart Pondereth Them Continually
talks.synopsis: Devin G. Durrant encourages members to save money each week and to ponder and memorize a scripture each week in order to have increased spiritual power and protection.

talks.author: Von G. Keetch
talks.title: Blessed and Happy Are Those Who Keep the Commandments of God
talks.synopsis: Elder Keetch teaches that the commandments are a source of protection and guidance to help us become what God wants us to become.

talks.author: Carole M. Stephens
talks.title: “If Ye Love Me, Keep My Commandments”
talks.synopsis: Carole M. Stephens teaches that by trusting and following the counsel of our Heavenly Father, Jesus Christ, the Holy Ghost, and the living prophets, we can return safely and joyfully to our heavenly home.

talks.author: Allen D. Haynie
talks.title: Remembering in Whom We Have Trusted
talks.synopsis: Elder Haynie teaches that we must be clean to return to live with our Heavenly Father, and that the only way to become clean is through the Atonement of Jesus Christ. The plan of salvation included a Savior who could help us become clean through faith in Him and repentance of our sins.

talks.author: Kim B. Clark
talks.title: Eyes to See and Ears to Hear
talks.synopsis: Elder Kim B. Clark testifies that if we open our eyes and ears, the Holy Ghost will bless us to see the Lord Jesus Christ working in our lives.

talks.author: Koichi Aoyagi
talks.title: Hold on Thy Way
talks.synopsis: Elder Koichi Aoyagi counsels us to turn our hearts to God in our trials so that we can endure them well and pass the test of this life.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: “Chosen to Bear Testimony of My Name”
talks.synopsis: Elder David A. Bednar shares some powerful lessons of a lifetime that have been shared by prophets and apostles.

talks.author: Cheryl A. Esplin
talks.title: He Asks Us to Be His Hands
talks.synopsis: Sister Esplin teaches how to follow the Savior’s example of love and service.

talks.author: Neill F. Marriott
talks.title: What Shall We Do?
talks.synopsis: Sister Marriott teaches sisters that they can build the Lord’s kingdom by nurturing others and by speaking, teaching, and testifying of gospel truths such as th

talks.author: Linda K. Burton
talks.title: “I Was a Stranger”
talks.synopsis: Linda K. Burton encourages women to help refugees in their communities.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Trust in That Spirit Which Leadeth to Do Good
talks.synopsis: President Eyring invites sisters to serve those in need, in the spirit of love and humility, trusting that God will prepare the way.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Where Two or Three Are Gathered
talks.synopsis: President Eyring promises that the Lord will be near during conference and that listeners’ faith will be strengthened as they listen to and pray for speakers.

talks.author: Mary R. Durham
talks.title: A Child’s Guiding Gift
talks.synopsis: Sister Durham teaches parents how to help their children feel and recognize the still, small voice of the Holy Ghost.

talks.author: Donald L. Hallstrom
talks.title: I Am a Child of God
talks.synopsis: Elder Hallstrom teaches about the importance of knowing that God is the Father of our spirits.

talks.author: Gary E. Stevenson
talks.title: Where Are the Keys and Authority of the Priesthood?
talks.synopsis: Elder Stevenson teaches about how priesthood keys and authority were restored and how they can bless young men and young women.

talks.author: Kevin R. Duncan
talks.title: The Healing Ointment of Forgiveness
talks.synopsis: Elder Duncan teaches that if we turn to the Savior, He will heal us and help us to forgive those who injure us.

talks.author: Steven E. Snow
talks.title: Be Thou Humble
talks.synopsis: Elder Snow teaches about the importance of humility in gaining the blessings of the gospel. He also teaches about learning truths from the hymns.

talks.author: Dale G. Renlund
talks.title: “That I Might Draw All Men unto Me”
talks.synopsis: Elder Renlund shows how drawing closer to God, particularly through the sacrament, can replace selfishness, entitlement, and skepticism with love and gratitude.

talks.author: Kevin R. Jergensen
talks.title: Church Auditing Department Report, 2015
talks.synopsis: Kevin R. Jergensen presents the Church auditing report.

talks.author: Ronald A. Rasband
talks.title: Standing with the Leaders of the Church
talks.synopsis: Elder Rasband teaches that as we choose to follow the leaders of the Church we are following the Lord.

talks.author: Neil L. Andersen
talks.title: “Whoso Receiveth Them, Receiveth Me”
talks.synopsis: Elder Andersen counsels members to be thoughtful and sensitive regarding children and youth whose family life is not ideal.

talks.author: Mervyn B. Arnold
talks.title: To the Rescue: We Can Do It
talks.synopsis: Elder Arnold teaches about the importance of going to the rescue and testifies that the Lord has provided the tools necessary for us to be successful.

talks.author: Jairo Mazzagardi
talks.title: The Sacred Place of Restoration
talks.synopsis: Elder Mazzagardi tells of his conversion. He wondered how there could’ve been crowds of people in Palmyra in Joseph Smith’s time. He visits Palmyra.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: Always Retain a Remission of Your Sins
talks.synopsis: Elder Bednar teaches about how priesthood ordinances help us retain a remission of our sins.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: Family Councils
talks.synopsis: Elder Ballard encourages members to follow a divine pattern by holding family councils, setting aside technology, and listening to one another.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: The Price of Priesthood Power
talks.synopsis: President Nelson counsels the men and young men of the Church about how they can receive and use true priesthood power.

talks.author: Stephen W. Owen
talks.title: The Greatest Leaders Are the Greatest Followers
talks.synopsis: Stephen W. Owen teaches priesthood holders that in God’s eyes, the greatest leaders—like Jesus Christ—have always been the greatest followers.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: In Praise of Those Who Save
talks.synopsis: President Uchtdorf presents basic gospel principles that will help us preserve strong and happy marriages and families.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Eternal Families
talks.synopsis: President Eyring teaches that celestial marriage is central to everything we do and that each priesthood holder should make families the focus of his efforts.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: A Sacred Trust
talks.synopsis: President Monson encourages priesthood holders to be worthy of the priesthood and prepared to use it to bless others.

talks.author: Thomas S. Monson
talks.title: Choices
talks.synopsis: President Monson teaches about the importance of making good choices and of choosing to build faith within ourselves.

talks.author: Bonnie L. Oscarson
talks.title: Do I Believe?
talks.synopsis: Sister Oscarson teaches that to believe in the Church means getting the gospel from our heads into our hearts so we will not be swayed by doubts and criticism.

talks.author: W. Christopher Waddell
talks.title: A Pattern for Peace
talks.synopsis: Bishop Waddell shares a pattern to help us find safety and peace: Learn of Christ, listen to His words, and walk in the meekness of His Spirit.

talks.author: D. Todd Christofferson
talks.title: Fathers
talks.synopsis: Elder Christofferson speaks of the important role of fathers in society, in the family, and in Heavenly Father’s plan for His children.

talks.author: Quentin L. Cook
talks.title: See Yourself in the Temple
talks.synopsis: Elder Cook encourages members to see themselves in the temple and to make any changes necessary to be able to participate in temple worship.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: He Will Place You on His Shoulders and Carry You Home
talks.synopsis: President Uchtdorf testifies of God’s love for all of His children and teaches that the Savior will rescue all who come unto Him.

talks.author: Robert D. Hales
talks.title: The Holy Ghost
talks.synopsis: Elder Hales teaches us about the blessings and responsibilities associated with the gift of the Holy Ghost.

talks.author: Gerrit W. Gong
talks.title: Always Remember Him
talks.synopsis: Elder Gong gives six suggestions for how we can better fulfill our covenant to always remember the Savior.

talks.author: Patrick Kearon
talks.title: Refuge from the Storm
talks.synopsis: Elder Kearon recounts the service of Church members to refugees and encourages members to continue to help.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Opposition in All Things
talks.synopsis: Elder Oaks teaches how various forms of opposition in mortality help to further our growth.

talks.author: Kent F. Richards
talks.title: The Power of Godliness
talks.synopsis: Elder Richards teaches that the power of godliness comes to us through the covenants and ordinances of the temple.

talks.author: Paul V. Johnson
talks.title: And There Shall Be No More Death
