talks.author: Eduardo Gavarret
talks.title: A Mighty Change of Heart: “I Have Nothing More to Give You”
talks.synopsis: Elder Gavarret teaches how to obtain, recognize, and maintain a change of heart.

talks.author: Larry S. Kacher
talks.title: Ladder of Faith
talks.synopsis: Elder Kacher teaches that our faith in Jesus Christ can unlock the powers of heaven and strengthen us as we confront life’s challenges.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Steady in the Storms
talks.synopsis: President Eyring teaches that we can remain steady in the storms of life by relying on the Savior and becoming as a child.

talks.author: Jared B. Larson
talks.title: Church Auditing Department Report, 2021
talks.synopsis: Jared B. Larson presents the Church Auditing Department report for 2021.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: Fear Not: Believe Only!
talks.synopsis: Elder Holland teaches that we can have hope in difficult times because of the gospel of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Patrick Kearon
talks.title: He Is Risen with Healing in His Wings: We Can Be More Than Conquerors
talks.synopsis: Elder Kearon teaches that survivors of abuse are not responsible for the abuse and can seek the Savior’s gift of healing.

talks.author: Marcos A. Aidukaitis
talks.title: Lift Up Your Heart and Rejoice
talks.synopsis: Elder Aidukaitis teaches youth that God will richly bless them as they overcome fears and insecurities and serve Him as full-time missionaries.

talks.author: Gerrit W. Gong
talks.title: We Each Have a Story
talks.synopsis: Elder Gong invites us to find connection and belonging in God’s family through our family history.

talks.author: Adrián Ochoa
talks.title: Is the Plan Working?
talks.synopsis: Elder Ochoa teaches three principles to help anyone who feels the plan of salvation isn’t working in their lives.

talks.author: Kevin S. Hamilton
talks.title: “Then Will I Make Weak Things Become Strong”
talks.synopsis: Elder Hamilton teaches that repentance is necessary and that as we humble ourselves and have faith in Jesus Christ, our weaknesses can be made strong through Christ’s grace.

talks.author: Quentin L. Cook
talks.title: Conversion to the Will of God
talks.synopsis: Elder Cook teaches that conversion includes accepting the will of God, strengthening our testimony of the Restoration, and sharing the blessings of the gospel.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Introductory Message
talks.synopsis: President Oaks introduces this special session of general conference focused on the concerns of women and their organizations.

talks.author: Susan H. Porter
talks.title: Lessons at the Well
talks.synopsis: Sister Porter shares three lessons she is learning and invites the women of the Church to follow the Savior’s teachings to be as salt, light, and leaven.

talks.author: Rebecca L. Craven
talks.title: Do What Mattereth Most
talks.synopsis: Sister Craven teaches that as we strive to focus on what matters most, our relationship with God will be strengthened.

talks.author: Video: “You Are the Women He Foresaw”
talks.title: This video includes teachings about women from President Nelson and President Kimball.

talks.author: Jean B. Bingham
talks.title: Covenants with God Strengthen, Protect, and Prepare Us for Eternal Glory
talks.synopsis: President Bingham teaches that making and keeping covenants with God brings us happiness and safety now and eternal joy in the world to come.

talks.author: Dale G. Renlund
talks.title: Your Divine Nature and Eternal Destiny
talks.synopsis: Elder Renlund uses the Young Women theme to teach about our divine nature and eternal destiny.

talks.author: D. Todd Christofferson
talks.title: Our Relationship with God
talks.synopsis: Elder Christofferson teaches that no matter our mortal circumstances, we can trust that God will fulfill His promises.

talks.author: Amy A. Wright
talks.title: Christ Heals That Which Is Broken
talks.synopsis: Sister Wright teaches that there is nothing in your life that is broken that is beyond the curative, redeeming, and enabling power of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Gary E. Stevenson
talks.title: Love, Share, Invite
talks.synopsis: Elder Stevenson teaches three simple things all of us can do to share the gospel: love, share, and invite. In doing so, we help to fulfill the Savior’s commission to “teach all nations.”

talks.author: Michael T. Ringwood
talks.title: For God So Loved Us
talks.synopsis: Elder Ringwood teaches how Heavenly Father sent His Son, Jesus Christ, as part of His plan to help us return to Him.

talks.author: Ronald A. Rasband
talks.title: To Heal the World
talks.synopsis: Elder Rasband teaches four ways that society and individuals benefit from religious freedom and how this freedom can be a unifying and healing influence.

talks.author: Hugo E. Martinez
talks.title: Teaching Self-Reliance to Children and Youth
talks.synopsis: Elder Martinez explains blessings that come from living principles of self-reliance and participating in the Children and Youth program.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: The Power of Spiritual Momentum
talks.synopsis: President Nelson shares five ways we can create spiritual momentum: make and keep covenants, repent, learn about God, seek miracles, and end conflict.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Divine Love in the Father’s Plan
talks.synopsis: President Oaks teaches that the plan of salvation is founded on Heavenly Father’s love for us.

talks.author: Adeyinka A. Ojediran
talks.title: The Covenant Path: The Way to Eternal Life
talks.synopsis: Elder Ojediran teaches that we come unto Christ through covenants, and he explains how the Holy Ghost and the sacrament help us keep those covenants.

talks.author: Jörg Klebingat
talks.title: Valiant Discipleship in the Latter Days
talks.synopsis: Elder Klebingat teaches about how to be a valiant disciple of Christ.

talks.author: Mark L. Pace
talks.title: Conversion Is Our Goal
talks.synopsis: President Pace teaches blessings that come from listening to the Holy Ghost and being converted to the gospel of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Ulisses Soares
talks.title: In Awe of Christ and His Gospel
talks.synopsis: Elder Soares teaches that when we truly are in awe of Jesus Christ, we are happier, we have more enthusiasm for God’s work, and we recognize the Lord’s hand in all things.

talks.author: Randy D. Funk
talks.title: Come into the Fold of God
talks.synopsis: Elder Funk testifies of the blessings that come to those who choose to come into the fold of God by obeying the gospel of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Our Heartfelt All
talks.synopsis: Elder Uchtdorf teaches that we can offer our whole souls to the Savior through sacrifice and consecration.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Now Is the Time
talks.synopsis: President Nelson teaches that now is the time to live the gospel of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Helping the Poor and Distressed
talks.synopsis: President Oaks teaches that God inspires many organizations and individuals to help those in need and that the Church is committed to work with others in that effort.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Jesus Christ Is the Strength of Youth
talks.synopsis: Elder Uchtdorf teaches that Jesus Christ is the best guide for making choices. He also introduces the new For the Strength of Youth guide.

talks.author: Tracy Y. Browning
talks.title: Seeing More of Jesus Christ in Our Lives
talks.synopsis: Sister Browning encourages us to see our lives from a gospel perspective in order to see more of the Savior in our lives.

talks.author: Dale G. Renlund
talks.title: A Framework for Personal Revelation
talks.synopsis: Elder Renlund teaches how to receive personal revelation through the Holy Ghost and how to avoid deception.

talks.author: Rafael E. Pino
talks.title: Let Doing Good Be Our Normal
talks.synopsis: Elder Pino suggests four habits to help members of the Church stay on the covenant path.

talks.author: Hugo Montoya
talks.title: The Eternal Principle of Love
talks.synopsis: Elder Montoya teaches the importance of loving God and ministering to those around us.

talks.author: Ronald A. Rasband
talks.title: This Day
talks.synopsis: Elder Rasband gives examples of President Nelson sharing the Book of Mormon, describes how he has tried to follow the prophet’s example, and invites all to do the same.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: What Is True?
talks.synopsis: President Nelson affirms the Lord’s teachings about abuse and testifies that God is the source of all truth.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: Follow Jesus Christ with Footsteps of Faith
talks.synopsis: President Ballard teaches us that as we follow Jesus Christ in faith, He will help us through difficult times, just as He did the pioneers.

talks.author: Kristin M. Yee
talks.title: Beauty for Ashes: The Healing Path of Forgiveness
talks.synopsis: Sister Yee teaches that we are blessed as we follow the Savior on the healing path of forgiveness.

talks.author: Paul V. Johnson
talks.title: Be Perfected in Him
talks.synopsis: Elder Johnson teaches that through the Atonement of Jesus Christ we can be cleansed of our sins and imperfections.

talks.author: Ulisses Soares
talks.title: In Partnership with the Lord
talks.synopsis: Elder Soares teaches that as women and men work together in true and equal marriage partnerships, they will enjoy the unity taught by the Savior.

talks.author: James W. McConkie III
talks.title: And They Sought to See Jesus Who He Was
talks.synopsis: Elder McConkie teaches about the importance of learning about Jesus Christ and helping one another come unto Him.

talks.author: Jorge F. Zeballos
talks.title: Building a Life Resistant to the Adversary
talks.synopsis: Elder Zeballos teaches that with the help of the Lord, we can be resistant to sin and temptation and find lasting happiness in this life.

talks.author: D. Todd Christofferson
talks.title: The Doctrine of Belonging
talks.synopsis: Elder Christofferson teaches that the doctrine of belonging includes welcoming diversity, being willing to serve and sacrifice, and knowing the Savior’s role.

talks.author: Gérald Caussé
talks.title: Our Earthly Stewardship
talks.synopsis: Bishop Caussé teaches the duty we have to take care of God’s creations as stewards over them.

talks.author: Michelle D. Craig
talks.title: Wholehearted
talks.synopsis: Sister Craig teaches us three truths that can help us grow as disciples and trust in the Lord through our trials.

talks.author: Kevin W. Pearson
talks.title: Are You Still Willing?
talks.synopsis: Elder Pearson teaches that God expects us to willingly place the Savior at the center of our lives.

talks.author: Denelson Silva
talks.title: Courage to Proclaim the Truth
talks.synopsis: Elder Silva describes his conversion experience and encourages young men and young women to serve missions.

talks.author: Neil L. Andersen
talks.title: Drawing Closer to the Savior
talks.synopsis: Elder Andersen teaches that we can prepare for the Second Coming by making covenants and strengthening our commitment to the Savior.

talks.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
talks.title: Lifted Up upon the Cross
talks.synopsis: Elder Holland teaches what it means to take up the cross as disciples of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: J. Anette Dennis
talks.title: His Yoke Is Easy and His Burden Is Light
talks.synopsis: Sister Dennis teaches that we should avoid judging others and instead be compassionate and loving toward everyone.

talks.author: Gerrit W. Gong
talks.title: Happy and Forever
talks.synopsis: Elder Gong teaches that as we follow God’s plan for us, we will find eternal joy with our families.

talks.author: Joseph W. Sitati
talks.title: Patterns of Discipleship
talks.synopsis: Elder Sitati teaches how we can develop attributes that help us become better disciples of Christ.

talks.author: Steven J. Lund
talks.title: Lasting Discipleship
talks.synopsis: President Lund describes the spiritual strength that comes from FSY conferences and teaches how youth can maintain that strength.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: Put On Thy Strength, O Zion
talks.synopsis: Elder Bednar uses the parable of the royal marriage feast to teach that, through the righteous use of our moral agency, we can choose to be chosen of the Lord.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Overcome the World and Find Rest
talks.synopsis: President Nelson testifies that we can overcome the world and find rest, by the power of Jesus Christ, which we access through our covenants.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Legacy of Encouragement
talks.synopsis: President Eyring shows how his mother and the prophet Mormon encouraged their posterity to qualify for eternal life through all the trials of mortality.

talks.author: Ryan K. Olsen
talks.title: The Answer Is Jesus
talks.synopsis: Elder Olsen teaches that the answer to our challenges and questions is Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Jonathan S. Schmitt
talks.title: That They Might Know Thee
talks.synopsis: Elder Schmitt teaches us that learning about the many names of Jesus can inspire us to become more like Him.

talks.author: Mark D. Eddy
talks.title: The Virtue of the Word
talks.synopsis: Elder Eddy invites us to “try the virtue of the word of God” and “drink deeply” from the scriptures.

talks.author: Gary E. Stevenson
talks.title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
talks.synopsis: Elder Stevenson teaches about what a testimony is and the importance of keeping your testimony strong and bearing it in word and deed.

talks.author: Isaac K. Morrison
talks.title: We Can Do Hard Things through Him
talks.synopsis: Elder Morrison teaches us how the Lord strengthens us and helps us when we exercise faith in Him during difficult times.

talks.author: Quentin L. Cook
talks.title: Be True to God and His Work
talks.synopsis: Elder Cook teaches about the importance of gaining our own testimonies of Jesus Christ, repenting of our sins, and staying true to God and His work.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Focus on the Temple
talks.synopsis: President Nelson teaches about the importance of temples and announces plans to build more temples.

talks.author: Gary E. Stevenson
talks.title: The Greatest Easter Story Ever Told
talks.synopsis: Elder Stevenson testifies of the Book of Mormon’s powerful witness of Jesus Christ and recommends making it part of our Easter celebrations.

talks.author: Bonnie H. Cordon
talks.title: Never Give Up an Opportunity to Testify of Christ
talks.synopsis: President Cordon teaches us to draw closer to Christ, receive a witness of Him, develop holy habits, and testify of Him. Then we will become more like Him.

talks.author: Carl B. Cook
talks.title: Just Keep Going—with Faith
talks.synopsis: Elder Cook teaches us that we can overcome discouragement and receive great blessings if we will just keep going—with faith in Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Gerrit W. Gong
talks.title: Ministering
talks.synopsis: Elder Gong teaches that ministering in the Savior’s way will help us draw closer together and become more like Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Quentin L. Cook
talks.title: Safely Gathered Home
talks.synopsis: Elder Cook teaches that the Lord expects those who have received His gospel to urgently strive to be an example that will help others come to God.

talks.author: Allen D. Haynie
talks.title: A Living Prophet for the Latter Days
talks.synopsis: Elder Haynie teaches the importance of promptly following the counsel of the living prophet.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Finding Personal Peace
talks.synopsis: President Eyring teaches that as we experience the Savior’s gift of personal peace, we can help others find it, and they, in turn, can pass it along.

talks.author: Jared B. Larson
talks.title: Church Auditing Department Report, 2022
talks.synopsis: Jared B. Larson presents the Church Auditing Department Report for 2022.

talks.author: Dale G. Renlund
talks.title: Accessing God’s Power through Covenants
talks.synopsis: Elder Renlund teaches that as we come unto Christ and are connected to Him and our Heavenly Father by covenant, we can be transformed and become perfected in Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Peter F. Meurs
talks.title: He Could Heal Me!
talks.synopsis: Elder Meurs teaches how Jesus Christ redeems us from our sins and heals us from all our sufferings.

talks.author: Randall K. Bennett
talks.title: Your Patriarchal Blessing—Inspired Direction from Heavenly Father
talks.synopsis: Elder Bennett teaches that patriarchal blessings provide inspired direction from Heavenly Father.

talks.author: Craig C. Christensen
talks.title: “There Can Be Nothing So Exquisite and Sweet as Was My Joy”
talks.synopsis: Elder Christensen teaches that we can receive true joy through repentance and faith in Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Evan A. Schmutz
talks.title: Trusting the Doctrine of Christ
talks.synopsis: Elder Schmutz teaches about the blessings that come when we trust the doctrine of Christ.

talks.author: Benjamín De Hoyos
talks.title: The Work of the Temple and Family History—One and the Same Work
talks.synopsis: Elder De Hoyos teaches that family history and temple work are central to Heavenly Father’s plan for His children.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: Jesus Christ Is the Strength of Parents
talks.synopsis: Elder Uchtdorf teaches how Jesus Christ helps parents fulfill their divine responsibilities to teach and care for their children.

talks.author: Mark A. Bragg
talks.title: Christlike Poise
talks.synopsis: Elder Bragg counsels us to develop Christlike poise to help us in challenging times and to better help others through their challenges as well.

talks.author: Milton Camargo
talks.title: Focus on Jesus Christ
talks.synopsis: Brother Camargo reminds us of the blessings of creating a gospel-centered home and teaches that Jesus Christ helps us overcome problems like death, sin, and weakness.

talks.author: K. Brett Nattress
talks.title: Have I Truly Been Forgiven?
talks.synopsis: Elder Nattress teaches that forgiveness is available to all through the infinite Atonement of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Juan A. Uceda
talks.title: The Lord Jesus Christ Teaches Us to Minister
talks.synopsis: Elder Uceda teaches that Jesus Christ is the Good Shepherd and that we can follow Him and His teachings as we minister to one another in love.

talks.author: D. Todd Christofferson
talks.title: One in Christ
talks.synopsis: Elder Christofferson describes how we can achieve unity despite our differences—by individually coming unto Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Camille N. Johnson
talks.title: Jesus Christ Is Relief
talks.synopsis: President Johnson teaches that we can partner with the Savior to offer temporal and spiritual relief to those in need.

talks.author: Ulisses Soares
talks.title: Followers of the Prince of Peace
talks.synopsis: Elder Soares teaches about Christlike attributes that help us promote peace and become true followers of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Kazuhiko Yamashita
talks.title: When to Receive Your Patriarchal Blessing
talks.synopsis: Elder Yamashita encourages members to receive and review their patriarchal blessings, which contain personal counsel from the Lord.

talks.author: Neil L. Andersen
talks.title: My Mind Caught Hold upon This Thought of Jesus Christ
talks.synopsis: Elder Andersen teaches how we can receive heavenly guidance and heavenly power as we catch hold upon the idea of Jesus Christ and His atoning sacrifice.

talks.author: Kevin R. Duncan
talks.title: A Voice of Gladness!
talks.synopsis: Elder Duncan teaches that keeping our temple covenants will strengthen our testimonies and help us access the Savior’s healing power.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Peacemakers Needed
talks.synopsis: President Nelson invites us to examine our hearts and lay aside anything that prevents us from being peacemakers, a role for true disciples of Jesus Christ—especially when under fire.

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: The Teachings of Jesus Christ
talks.synopsis: President Oaks shares scriptures that record the words of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: Remember What Matters Most
talks.synopsis: President Ballard teaches about things that matter most, including our relationships, our spiritual promptings, and our testimonies.

talks.author: Ronald A. Rasband
talks.title: Hosanna to the Most High God
talks.synopsis: Elder Rasband teaches that Jesus Christ’s triumphant entry into Jerusalem and the events of the week that followed exemplify doctrine we can apply in our lives today.

talks.author: Vern P. Stanfill
talks.title: The Imperfect Harvest
talks.synopsis: Elder Stanfill teaches the difference between chasing worldly perfection and becoming perfect in Christ.

talks.author: W. Mark Bassett
talks.title: After the Fourth Day
talks.synopsis: Elder Bassett teaches that as we keep the commandments and do all that we can do, Jesus Christ will work miracles in our lives.

talks.author: Ahmad S. Corbitt
talks.title: Do You Know Why I as a Christian Believe in Christ?
talks.synopsis: Elder Corbitt teaches about the plan of salvation, the doctrine of Christ, and the importance of sharing these truths with others.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: “Abide in Me, and I in You; Therefore Walk with Me”
talks.synopsis: Elder Bednar teaches that when we abide in the Savior, He will abide in us and we will be blessed.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: The Answer Is Always Jesus Christ
talks.synopsis: President Nelson testifies of Jesus Christ and announces locations for new temples.

talks.author: David A. Bednar
talks.title: In the Path of Their Duty
talks.synopsis: Elder Bednar expresses his gratitude for Church members who serve throughout the world and are the strength of the Church.

talks.author: Amy A. Wright
talks.title: Abide the Day in Christ
talks.synopsis: Sister Wright teaches that with the help of Jesus Christ, we can all “abide the day” and meet and overcome the challenges we face.

talks.author: Robert M. Daines
talks.title: Sir, We Would Like to See Jesus
talks.synopsis: Elder Daines teaches principles to help us better see the Savior and understand God’s love.

talks.author: Carlos A. Godoy
talks.title: For the Sake of Your Posterity
talks.synopsis: Elder Godoy asks those who have fallen away or are not as faithful as they should be to turn back so they and their posterity can enjoy gospel blessings.

talks.author: D. Todd Christofferson
talks.title: The Sealing Power
talks.synopsis: Elder Christofferson teaches that the sealing power, which validates all priesthood ordinances and makes them binding both on earth and in heaven, is crucial for the gathering of Israel.

talks.author: Ian S. Ardern
talks.title: Love Thy Neighbour
talks.synopsis: Elder Ardern teaches that humanitarian efforts are ways to show compassion to others and to follow the Lord’s command to “love thy neighbour.”

talks.author: Dallin H. Oaks
talks.title: Kingdoms of Glory
talks.synopsis: President Oaks teaches about the kingdoms of glory after this life and the Church’s focus on helping us qualify for the highest degree of the celestial kingdom.

talks.author: Neil L. Andersen
talks.title: Tithing: Opening the Windows of Heaven
talks.synopsis: Elder Andersen teaches that as we faithfully pay tithing, the Lord will open the windows of heaven to pour out blessings upon us.

talks.author: Jan E. Newman
talks.title: Preserving the Voice of the Covenant People in the Rising Generation
talks.synopsis: Brother Newman teaches that it is the responsibility of parents to teach their children to come unto Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Joaquin E. Costa
talks.title: The Power of Jesus Christ in Our Lives Every Day
talks.synopsis: Elder Costa teaches that we can find strength in our faith in Jesus Christ as we seek to come unto Him each and every day.

talks.author: Gary E. Stevenson
talks.title: Promptings of the Spirit
talks.synopsis: Elder Stevenson teaches the importance of seeking, recognizing, and acting on the promptings of the Holy Ghost.

talks.author: Yoon Hwan Choi
talks.title: Do You Want to Be Happy?
talks.synopsis: Elder Choi teaches that if we want to be happy, we should stay on the covenant path. The Lord will bless us and bear our burdens.

talks.author: Alan T. Phillips
talks.title: God Knows and Loves You
talks.synopsis: Elder Phillips teaches that we are children of God, that Jesus Christ redeems us and brings us relief, and that Heavenly Father is perfect and loving.

talks.author: Ronald A. Rasband
talks.title: How Great Will Be Your Joy
talks.synopsis: Elder Rasband teaches that to gather Israel, more missionaries are needed and invites seniors to take their knowledge and testimonies and go on missions.

talks.author: Gary B. Sabin
talks.title: Hallmarks of Happiness
talks.synopsis: Elder Sabin teaches five ways to find true happiness.

talks.author: Joni L. Koch
talks.title: Humble to Accept and Follow
talks.synopsis: Elder Koch teaches the importance of being humble and trusting in the Lord.

talks.author: Tamara W. Runia
talks.title: Seeing God’s Family through the Overview Lens
talks.synopsis: Sister Runia teaches that there is power and joy when we view ourselves and our loved ones from a big-picture perspective.

talks.author: Ulisses Soares
talks.title: Brothers and Sisters in Christ
talks.synopsis: Elder Soares teaches how to guard against prejudice and treat each other as brothers and sisters in Jesus Christ.

talks.author: M. Russell Ballard
talks.title: Praise to the Man
talks.synopsis: President Ballard testifies of the many blessings we enjoy because of the Prophet Joseph Smith, who restored the fulness of the gospel of Jesus Christ.

talks.author: Emily Belle Freeman
talks.title: Walking in Covenant Relationship with Christ
talks.synopsis: President Freeman compares walking the covenant path with walking the Jesus Trail in Israel.

talks.author: Adilson de Paula Parrella
talks.title: Bearing Witness of Jesus Christ in Word and Actions
talks.synopsis: Elder Parrella teaches that we can take the Savior’s name upon us by bearing testimony of Him through our words and actions.

talks.author: Quentin L. Cook
talks.title: Be Peaceable Followers of Christ
talks.synopsis: Elder Cook teaches that peaceable followers of Christ who keep His commandments will be blessed with peace as they face trials and can look forward to a bright future.

talks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
talks.title: The Prodigal and the Road That Leads Home
talks.synopsis: Elder Uchtdorf teaches that it is never too late to repent and return to the path that leads to God.

talks.author: W. Christopher Waddell
talks.title: More Than a Hero
talks.synopsis: Bishop Waddell teaches that of all heroes, Jesus Christ is the greatest.

talks.author: Henry B. Eyring
talks.title: Our Constant Companion
talks.synopsis: President Eyring teaches that we need to strive to have the Holy Ghost as our constant companion.

talks.author: Dale G. Renlund
talks.title: Jesus Christ Is the Treasure
talks.synopsis: Elder Renlund teaches that as we focus on Jesus Christ and stop looking beyond the mark, we will find the greatest treasures of the gospel.

talks.author: John C. Pingree Jr.
talks.title: Eternal Truth
talks.synopsis: Elder Pingree explains what truth is, why it is important, how we can find it, and how we should share it with others.

talks.author: Valeri V. Cordón
talks.title: Divine Parenting Lessons
talks.synopsis: Elder Cordón teaches that parents should teach their children the gospel culture and help guide them back to heaven.

talks.author: J. Kimo Esplin
talks.title: The Savior’s Healing Power upon the Isles of the Sea
talks.synopsis: Elder Esplin shares a story about a Japanese Latter-day Saint that demonstrates the power we can find in temple covenants.

talks.author: Gerrit W. Gong
talks.title: Love Is Spoken Here
talks.synopsis: Elder Gong teaches how we may use three languages of gospel love: warmth and reverence, service and sacrifice, and covenant belonging.

talks.author: Christophe G. Giraud-Carrier
talks.title: We Are His Children
talks.synopsis: Elder Giraud-Carrier teaches that we should remember that we are all God’s children and should love everyone, regardless of our differences.

talks.author: Russell M. Nelson
talks.title: Think Celestial!
talks.synopsis: President Nelson teaches the importance of having faith in Jesus Christ and making choices with the celestial kingdom in mind.
